name: thomas dunnavant
text: I've know Randy for several years, worked with him on many properties as an inspector and became a client too.  I've been an inspector for many years and have met thousands of real estate folks and Randy is up there is on the top shelf and always goes the extra mile, never gives up and does not shy away form long term projects.  I highly recommend him.

name: Denies Hunter
text: I've  called and called.. I even left messages for someone just anyone to call me about a house I was wanting to buy and NO one called me back.. they are not Interested in selling properties..

name: Rhonda Allen
text: My husband & I had the great pleasure of working with Jessica Smith and she is an absolute doll; a total gem. We cannot say enough great things about her: she is amazing; just fabulous; friendly; motivated; she’s the perfect realtor. We interviewed several realtors to sell our home and when we met her; we knew she was the one & she did not disappoint. Our home was on the market December 20th and we had an offer and it sold 13 days later. Everything she suggested we did and it worked. She is the real deal & we highly recommend Jessica to everyone & not only did we have the perfect realtor but made a great friend. Keep up the great work Jessica; it was such a pleasure working with you.

name: Tornado ly
text: They are the best at work with you on getting you the best vehicle they have.

name: Odell Mullis
text: All calls go to a recording and no one returns messages.

name: Christopher Berube
text: My experience with Charles was great and completely the opposite from the other reviews I'm reading here. Not only was he thorough but he even explained how to properly calculate square footage and other useful information. Thank you!

name: Karen Stewart
text: The rudest, most arrogant person I have ever dealt with.  Not only is he hateful, he waited until the very last day to do our appraisal.  He was so horrible to me on the phone I actually called my lender to request another appraiser.  Unfortunately I was told it had to be him.  We closed 4 months ago and I just received an email with an invoice from Seth showing unpaid!  I pulled my closing documents and of course it was paid.  I screen shot the payment and sent it back in the email.  He is not a person who should be working with the public as he has zero tolerance for questions or people in general. Beware!

name: Matt Love
text: Do not use this appraiser! He waited until the last day of the 10 day time limit allowed for VA appraisals. he did not submit the appraisal until 6 days later because of computer server problems on his end which caused me to incur additional fees to meet our original closing date. He refused to reduce his fee or provide any reimbursement for the fees we incurred due to his late appraisal. According to our lender this appraiser has been a problem for other veterans failing to meet the 10 day time limit for VA loans. Multiple complaints have been filed with the VA for Dettling and Associates.

name: Justin Lasiter
text: RIP miss Carol! She was trying to help me buy a house with less than perfect credit but she passed and no one has contacted me or extended me the courtesy like her! And to add to my last review I want to mention how rude miss Carol's family that took over is! We were approved for a house that they said they couldn't wait till March for us to move in! So I was going to pay rent at 2 houses but they took money from someone else and held the house for them until march!! Miss Carol would roll over in her grave to see her customers being treated in such a poor manner! We tried to forgive them for the rude way we were handled hoping it was an honest mistake but my wife text them about another house and they speak to her like she is an idiot!! You dont do good business handling people like that in the south!!! We treat people with the same courtesy we want to receive! A lesson I'm sure you will learn soon enough!

name: Suzanne Esfeller
text: Don’t EVER use this real estate company! Dawn Elder is the absolute WORST! She is VERY unprofessional and pursued my fiancé, calling him and having very “unethical” and “unprofessional” phone calls that were not related to our rental property AT ALL and then allowed him to start having “sleep overs” until she had him move in her house that she got in her divorce. She’s a liar and a terrible and untrustworthy person. I bought this lady flowers and a card when I rented this house from her because I thought she was a woman who had been through the same things I had been through and she seemed hurt by her ex husband as I was by mine, only to find out she was trying to do the SAME THING to ME the whole entire time with my fiancé! I rented this house through her in April and the key box lock on the back door is still on the door! The rooftops on both storage buildings were covered in pine straw and limbs that she had said would be cleaned along with the yard and they never were. Things weren’t fixed or painted as she claimed they’d be before we moved in and she said later they’d be done upon us moving in. Well that never happened either. Save yourself and your family the drama and the dissatisfaction and go to another realtor or definitely ask for anyone but DAWN ELDER!!!! Mrs Carol would have handled this lady appropriately if she was still alive and fired her home wrecking self!!

name: Vincent Sifuentes
text: Very unprofessional company! I would never rent from them or do business with them again. They were ok when Carol was handling things. However, Dawn in the office was very unhelpful  in following up with those whom we were renting from and getting back with us. It was like pulling teeth to get decent customer service. She did not respond to our emails in a timely manner and was less than professional.  She flat right out ignored our email questions and never cared to get back with us,  I thought that was her job? They joined forces with David Kahn Company and things seem to be getting much worse from a service perspective. We rented from them for 15 months and boy was it a miserable 15 months! Never again!

name: Kenny Hollinhead
text: Great people to deal with. If you are looking for a home or property you should visit Carroll.

name: Patti Mckinney
text: Dont pay their bills

name: Bryana Bowman
text: Nice homes

name: Ken Hargroves
text: No comment

name: Elijah Andrews
text: Mean as a snake.

name: Tommy Lawrence
text: Just opening new location. Really liked.

name: Laura McGuinn
text: My husband and I have worked with agent Mike Lindsay on around 10 properties. He has been extremely helpful in each sale.  Every time we have been in the market for a property, he has always listened to what we need, is willing to help us think through our decisions, and is fantastic at finding places to consider.  We appreciate you so much Mike! (and this was an independent review, we were not given anything in exchange for our opinion).

name: Celina Celmo
text: Alex helped us find and purchase a dream home! He was there every step of the way and made the process extremely easy for us. The Jason Secor home advisors team kept us informed throughout the process, answered any and all questions that we had, and were very fun to work with. They go out of their way to help you and make sure you are happy! We would strongly recommend working with this group!

name: Amanda
text: Jorge helped us find our home. The experience was amazing. He was responsive and really listened to what we were looking for. It was incredible to work with him and we would recommend him to anyone!

name: Troy Jordal
text: If you are looking for a team that puts in the work and stands behind there message I would not hesitate to go with the Secor team great group of people do there job well.

name: jeremy archer
text: Jason and his team were great to work with he sold our home for more than we listed it for also had a plan and steps to take to make sure we got as much as we could from our house. He also kept us informed on what was going on and always answered his phone or called back when we had a question or issue. I would recommend Jason to anyone.

name: trumpsflood
text: Thanks Jason.

name: Julie Christofferson
text: We had a wonderful time at The Collonades last month! The location was perfect, condo was spacious and clean, super convenient to stores, shops, restaurants and there isn't a better view of the beach! My granddaughters loved the pool and crab hunting at night. We will be staying again! Thank you!

name: Joey Duckworth
text: We just found our “go to” spot every year!!  We had a great time and thank you to Simpson Properties for promptly answering our questions. I can see why you guys have an excellent reputation in the area!  I will recommend this property to anyone who is looking. Great location with plethora of amenities for families. I honestly can’t think of a negative remark to leave about this experience. Thank you and see you next year!

name: Bonnel Seyler Eggspuehler
text:
My brother’s family And I spent a week at Phoenix West 2 and both condos 2403 and 1609 were very nice and had plenty of sleeping space for his boys families and me! Right off the beach both with beautiful views of the ocean!!
Very nicely furnished and kitchen has all you need. Had a large laundry room with sink and counter with a large shower!!! Each bedroom had a full bath,
We had a great time and will do this again!!
Simpson properties were very accommodating!
We will be back!’

name: Lynn Crosser
text: We loved our vacation to Orange Beach, AL. Our stay in Admirals Quarter Unit 1201 was exceptional! It was the perfect condo for our two-family vacation. The views from our balconies were beautiful! The condo had everything we needed to make our stay a great vacation.  The Simpson Properties Group made it easy to book, check-in and check-out. They were quick to respond when I messaged them. All in all, our stay was fantastic!

name: Kary Royer
text:
Condo was exactly as advertised and there was nothing unexpected.  They sent information when promised and had everything ready when we arrived.  A simple text message here and there made it very manageable to our schedule and without interruption.  Our family enjoyed our stay and the amazing views from the balconies.  We've stayed with other companies before,  but Simpson properties made it even more stress free and less hassle than anywhere else we've stayed. We had no issues,  although if there had been.  I know they would have been responsive to our request.

Sincerely,

The Royers

name: Pat Schellenberg
text:
After coming down to Gulf Shore for a few years we have finally found exactly what we are looking for, the right location, condo and property management group, Simpson Properties Group.
We never knew how wonderful it could be with such a responsive, helpful property management team!  They answered all of our questions immediately and responded immediately to the one issue we had.  The building we were in was having work done and we were pleasantly surprised when they notified us of all work and when it was to be completed prior to building management posting notices!  You never know how important this is until you have had poor property management teams that did not do this and you were caught in very poor situations.  We have and will continue to recommend Simpson Properties Group to everyone who is looking for a vacation location.

resp.text: Pat, thank you for your kind words! We look forward to seeing you again next year!

name: Kayla Brehm
text: I can't say enough good things about our experience! Booking was effortless and the communication with the property manager was impeccable! Forms needed prior to arriving were sent with detailed information. We arrived to our destination before check in, but we got a text from the property manager  nearly 2 hours early providing us a simple code that allowed us access, couldn't have been more pleased! There were parking forms on the counter ready for us to put in our car and there was everything we needed supplied in the condo! Check out was just as easy! Simply clean up after yourself, shut the door behind you and text the property manager that you are out! I would highly recommend this property group for so many reasons!

name: Kaitlynd Nichols
text: Had a great experience with Simpson Property Group. They were very active in letting us know when the condo would be ready and what was expected of us. The condo was very clean and they notified us that the guest bathroom would need fixing before we arrived. It was a smooth experience and would definitely stay with them again!

name: Angie Rodgers
text: This is our second year using them for our vacation rental and we will use them again next year.  We are very happy with their customer service.

name: daniel wiggins
text: Thanks Simpsons properties for putting our only families auto in a flood zone! Btw i know you dont care only about the money but no insurance isnt going to take care of all of it. Feel horrible for the people on that day that had liability and the people you all still screwing over. Lookup Edgewater west 93. Molded rooms in a flood zone!!! Beware!

name: Jo Ann Snyder
text: We really enjoy staying at Crystal Shores West. The Simpson Properties Group is always very professional and responds very quickly. Everything is always so clean and of great quality.

name: Erika Albin
text: We enjoyed staying at our condo! It was the perfect location on the beach in the Gulf Shores!

name: Tim Bradford
text: This was a nice, but old property. It was clean and well taken care of. It just needs an upgrade of counters, showers, beds. The balcony area is nice.

resp.text: You're right this is an older property but thank you for noticing that it is clean and well cared for. The owner is currently in the process of updating so we hope you'll stay with us again!

name: Ryan Griffin
text: Management was responsive. We were able to check in well before check in time. Check ok and out was seamless.  Location is fantastic.

name: Tina Henson
text: Only complaint was having to check in late because of a cleaning issue but I was notified of this in a timely manner.  Overall a great experience.

name: Tiffany Aragona
text: Our stay was amazing! Great booking experience from check-in to check-out. Everything was clean when we arrived and the cleaning staff checked in on us at arrival to make sure everything was satisfactory. The condo had an amazing view of the marina and watching the sunsets every evening was a favorite for us. The kitchen was well appointed with everything we needed and we were pleasantly surprised to find a separate ice maker and beverage cooler in the bar area. My kids love all the pools at the Caribe and I love the lazy river... ice chests are allowed which makes a day at the pool with a large family so easy. We had a blast and I definitely plan on booking this unit again!

name: Daniel LeBreton
text: We very much enjoyed our stay at this property. The condo was spacious, had a very large balcony with a nice view of the beach and Gulf.  The condo suited all our needs and we enjoyed the trip. The location is also great. Close to The Shrimp Basket and only a 10 minute drive from the Gulf Restaurant. Very family friendly. Loved it and would stay again, for sure!

name: Caroline S
text: Absolutely LOVED the condo we stayed in on Orange Beach. Wind Drift unit 710S was awesome. So much more spacious than other condos we’ve stayed in, amazing view on the 7th floor, and we loved the spacious balcony with a high table and sofa. So roomy for my husband and I and 2 teenage girls. Will most definitely book here again. We loved the empty beach next to us as well! Definitely recommend!

name: David Jenkins
text: My sons and I chose to vacation in Orange Beach in June 2020 and, having not visited in several years, reviewed multiple sources for condominium recommendations.  We chose a Simpson Properties condominium at Mariner Pass and could not have been happier with the quality of the property and the service provided.  The condo was convenient to the beach, restaurants, shopping, and other amenities.  Additionally, the property manager was very responsive to the few requests that we made during our visit.  We will definitely consider staying at a Simpson Properties condominium during our next visit.

name: Misty Waide
text: We had a great vacation. Simpson Property was great to work with. They were easy to book with and loved receiving updates via text. They let me know when our condo was ready via text. Our condo was ready to check in 2 hrs earlier than check in time. You will be very pleased booking with the Simpson Properties Group.

name: Cristy King
text: Excellent experience with Simpson Properties!!! The customer service was excellent with easy communication and easy booking. The entire process was made simple which is not always the case with other rental managers. I would recommend using Simpson Properties to everyone - we will definitely use them again. Thanks for a great Mother’s Day vacation!!!

name: Lauren Stewart
text:
I found Simpson Properties Group through a friend on Facebook and I’m so glad I did. They were great to work with from booking to check out! I loved receiving text updates along the way and the info via text for check in. Hunter answered all my questions promptly.
We had a few minor issues at the condo and they handled it quickly and professionally.
Overall I was very satisfied with their company and our stay, would highly recommend and will definitely use them again.

name: Misty Burdan
text:
We thoroughly enjoyed our beach trip to the Phoenix.West II. The condo was beyond amazing.  We had a crazy week and even had a skim board accident and had to have surgery in Foley our week down there.   The Simpson Properties Group (Hunter) was in close contact from booking to check out.  I will not hesitate to book with them again next year. Five stars without a doubt !
Misty Clower (Arkansas)

name: Jennifer Cooley
text: Easy access to everything. We loved the view from the balcony! Our room was everything they said it would be. As a family of 5 we had plenty of room. The check in process was easy. We would definitely stay here again.

name: Laura Parker
text: We loved our Vacation booked through Simpson Properties.  Working with the staff was very easy and they did everything they could to make our stay enjoyable.    They have fabulous properties and the price was great!  I will definitely use them again in the future!  Thanks for a great vacation!

name: Jennifer Fletcher
text: The booking process was great. They were very quick to respond to all of my questions. The check in and check out process was even better. They texted me a code as soon as the condo was available. No huge list of things to do before departing. I will definitely use Simpson Properties again!

name: S Walker
text:
Used the Simpson Group several times and have been completely satisfied each time, never a problem.

They helped us get the best deal we could for the dates we were going to be there and that saved us some money.

Check-in and check-out was a breeze.

Any questions we had were responded to.

I will use them the next time we go to the Gulf Shores or Orange Beach area.

Try the Simpson Property Group, you will like them.

name: Angie Houloose
text: Simpson Properties is an honest company that is doing the best possible thing right now for those unable to travel.  I knew I was going to have to cancel my trip to Gulf Shores, but was reluctant to have to make the call.  Instead, Simpson Properties stepped up and sent an email with revised cancellation guidelines which allowed me to cancel.  I called and left a message that I was cancelling and quickly received an email with notice it had been cancelled and when I should expect to receive the refund.  I commend Simpson Properties for it's timely response and understanding.  When the time is right to travel again, I will be staying at one of their properties in Gulf Shores, AL as I value a company that is proactive, transparent, and cares about their clients.  Thank you.

name: jason stringer
text: Manager was quick to respond via phone call, text, and email. Booking process was quick and easy. Unit was as described and clean. Gulf Towers is a great location. I would have no problem using Simpson Properties for future rentals.

name: Rick & Diane Schulze
text: Very positive experience booking with Simpson Properties. There were quick responses to all my questions and an easy solution to a change I made in my itinerary. They kept me informed of all the updates and closings in the area due to the nationwide health concerns. Even though I had to cancel this trip, we hope to schedule another in the near future. I would not hesitate to book with Simpson Properties again.

name: Nicole Busam
text: Simpson Properties Group was amazing to work with. We booked last minute and they were prompt to respond to all my questions.  Lagoon Tower 1502 was beautiful. Fully stocked with everything a family could need. The location was perfect and the view was amazing. The walk across the street to the private beach area took 3-5 minutes at the most. The condo was clean, modern and spacious. We loved our time spent at the indoor and outdoor pool too. We definitely plan to make this a new tradition and can’t wait to work with this company and stay at this property again in the future! Our favorite family vacation yet!

name: S Dier
text: Beautiful condo that easily accommodated 3 families! Simpson Properties was so great to work with- answered all of my questions super fast and made sure check in was a breeze. We would definitely stay here again- the facility was amazing!

name: T Troutt
text:
Simpson Properties is a “customer first” kind of business! Whether in booking or cancelling, I have always been treated like I am valued and appreciated! They listen first, and then try to accommodate,  instead of coming up with reasons why they can’t help!!
I can highly recommend them, their customer service and promptness is top notch!

name: Sherry Curtis
text: Beautiful condo. Tastefully decorated. Fully stocked. Amazing view of the ocean. Owner responds quickly. Very helpful. Highly recommend this place.

name: Susan Janes
text: Thank you so much Hunter for the wonderful stay at Admirals Quarters .  We had a great long weekend for Spring Break and with the schools closings we ended up staying an additional 4 days.  Hunter was great to work with.  He was super quick in responding and will definitely book with him again when we come this summer.  Thanks Hunter

name: John Richardson
text: Booking at Simpson Properties Group was through Vrbo.  I didn’t realize they charge a fee.  Book directly with Simpsons if you can.  They sent a detailed email with policies, suggestions, recommendations and check-in and out info. Read it all.  Lots of good stuff there.  All communication was through text.  Very easy and painless.  The door code was provided in plenty of time before check in.  All questions were answered quickly and professionally. Overall an excellent experience and we would stay there again (beach was about a 2 minute walk).

name: J F
text: We had a wonderful experience booking our condo through Simpson Properties. They were very quick responding to emails and also through text. Unfortunately we had to cancel due to the Pandemic and they were so understanding and gave us our full refund. We are going to book with them again for next year’s Spring break!

name: robyn lanier
text:
Great condo. Great location.

This was definitely the way to go! I booked online and received a big discount! I received a text letting us know that when the condo was ready as well as the door code. The condo was clean and cool upon our arrival. The ac froze overnight and I texted Simpson Properties when we awoke to a warm condo. I received a reply within minutes and a repairman was on site within an hour or so. Checking out was a breeze- sweep the floors, start the dishwasher, pile the used towels in the bathroom and set the ac to requested temp. That’s it. No keys to return bc of coded lock! Simpson Properties were so easy to work with and quick to respond to any questions I had before and during our stay. I would definitely recommend Simpson for you rentals!

name: Lacee McKellar
text: Absolutely loved this place. The patio was our favorite part - it was huge and overlooked the ocean. Perfect place for a cup of coffee in the morning. Condo was clean and very spacious.

name: Bob Burris
text: The property was everything we expected. The rental process and check-in were easy. Pat Simpson of the management group was readily available and attentive, and responsive to questions about the unit. Highly recommended!  Wonderful visit!

name: john machost
text: We stayed for a week in 105c it was fabulous. It was clean and ready on time. Slept our family of 5 wonderfully. Can’t wait to rent again

name: Cindy Ruchin
text:
From the first phone call to inquire about properties for rent, this was a wonderful experience! Everyone i spoke to was SO knowledgeable and attentive. After booking, i called on and off to ask additional questions, for example, to get the name of a family photographer to take our family photos on  the beach, and they had immediate answers.
I plan to use Simpson properties again for our family vacations!!!!!

name: mary spiegel
text: We were treated very kindly from the point of our reservation. Any questions were answered very quickly with customer service. We will use Simpson Properties in the he future.

name: Mary Clausen
text: I can’t say enough about the professionalism, promptness and flexibility of the people at Simpson Properties. They reached out before others in this industry and relaxed their cancellation policy so that people like my family would not need to worry about losing their investment in their vacation rentals. When all calms down, I will definitely re-book with Simpson Properties!

name: JD Mervis
text: Simpson Properties was a great source for renting a condo at Orange Beach. Hunter was great to work with! I would recommend them for any Orange Beach of Gulf Shorrs rentals!

name: Ashley Lovain
text: I booked a condo at The Palms room 512 and expected it be like any other beach condo. Tacky floral furniture and all. But I got the opposite! My 5 friends and I walked into a huge kitchen with granite countertops and an island. The tile floor was so pretty, the furniture and living room rug was something I’d put into my own home. The dining room table was very nice and had amazing leather chairs. The decor was great and not at all what I expected! (Aka the typical try too hard beach house and overwhelming floral) Checking in was a breeze and I even made the mistake of not remembering the time difference and arrived an hour early. I texted the manager and told them about my mistake and got a response that our room was ready for us to check in early. The communication was impeccable and I was impressed. The master bedroom had a king bed and we still had plenty of room to unload our suitcases. The bathroom in the master had a great walk in shower. The other 2 bedrooms were very spacious and clean. The best part about this entire trip is how SPOTLESS the entire condo was. I expected to have black feet walking around barefoot as that seems to be the usual beach condo thing. I checked my feet daily and was amazed! All the girls including myself kept bragging about how nice and clean our little home away from home was. I’ve told family and friend back home to rent this condo next time they visit the beach! STAY AT THIS CONDO!!!

name: Cookies and Cream
text: We have booked beautiful condos in Orange Beaxh for years. We were so looking forward to a wonderful Spring Break 2020, but good ole Covid19 really had other plans. Simpson Properties went out of their way to help us cancel our reservation, providing many options. We chose a refund and received our funds Immediately. We can’t wait for life to go back to normal so we can call Simpson Properties and head to the beach!

name: DeAnne Friar
text: What a wonderful company to work with! Whenever I had a question about my reservation , there was always someone to directly talk to who had easy answers. I highly recommend Simpson Property  Group!!

name: Mike Creasy (Mike)
text: We have been staying at this property for many years and are completely satisfied with the quality and the amenities there. Simpson Properties is an excellent group of people to work with. Completely satisfied in every way. I would rate them a A+.

name: Heather Keenan
text: Seriously a great experience booking and getting all my questions answered. I will always reach out to Simpson Properties for my travel accommodations. I so appreciate the excellent customer service!

name: Jan Root
text: They made everything very easy and clear.  Check in and out went very smoothly!  Whenever I had a problem or question they were right there and very responsive. I would rent from them again!

name: Doreen Musial
text: We stayed in Condo 1502 in Lagoon Towers in Gulf Shores.  The condo and the property amenities went beyond our expectations.  The view was phenomenal and having access to a private beach was fantastic.

name: Brenda B
text: They make everything easy. Booking was a breeze and every question answered quickly. We plan to book with them in the future. Above and beyond what I expected.

name: Nikki Bajor
text: Easy to work with. Great condo! Clean, excellent location.

name: Olivia Young
text: We enjoyed our stay at Gulf Tower! Love the sliding doors on the balcony for small children!

name: Sherry Owens
text: We enjoyed this condominium and the location. We would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Dylan Thriffiley
text: Wonderful experience with Simpson Properties Group and their unit at Shoalwater. There was some confusion over the WiFi password, which they resolved immediately over the phone.

name: Nicole Hardekopf
text: Great communication and wonderful group to work with! Look forward to booking with them again.

name: Maggie Boyles
text: Simpson Properties is a wonderful agency to work with. They are as friendly, prompt and professional as they come!

name: Richard stoey
text: Hunter was very helpful and responsive. Great service when calling the office.

name: brooke vickers
text: The condo we stayed at wasn’t anything to write home about, but this property group was great to work with. We had to reschedule and they were very responsive to emails. When the internet/cable went down during our stay they sent someone out right away to fix it. I would book through them again.

name: Rickey Meadows
text: Great communication and easy check in for a condo.

name: Kimberly Lambert
text: Took care of us and kept us posted with the circumstances that were changing day to day.

name: Gary Whiteside
text: Great appraiser. Fast, accurate and dependable.  Would use again.

name: COREY WRIGHT
text:
Hey love 💘 the restroom design
Lighting. And very. Clean. Place

name: Jeffrey Morales
text: Zero communication. The "Madden Team" are lazy, unprofessional,  and offer no communication, assistance/advice, or support. If they sense you are eager to sell they will sell you out to get sale. There's 100's of agents available so no reason to use this garbage company. If you do, you do so at your own peril. I could go on but some people need to learn for themselves.

name: Tim Caldwell
text: Marrissa Rennaker and Bellator are great!!!  My go-to agent for anything related to residential purchases/renting in Baldwin County!!!

name: Kyle Klenck
text: Just don't use Marissa Peyton Rennaker

name: XxFmjx33
text:
We had the best experience with Sloan at Bellator in Spanish Fort. He is very knowledgeable, professional and all around great person to work with when buying a home. My family can't thank him enough.
Thanks Sloan!

resp.text: Hi Lisa, thank you for taking the time to stop by and tell us about your home buying experience! So good to hear that all went well with you finding the home that is right for you. We love what we do for you here at Bellator! Thanks again.

name: C I
text: Hanh was a referral from a friend. She was very highly recommended. In fact, we had someone in mind but after we met her, Hanh had to be our realtor. She understood immediately what we were looking for on our first home. During the whole process, Hanh was very informative, knowledgeable, professional, positive, and on point. Within about 2 months, we closed our home. She answered texts, calls, and emails very fast. She met with us on last minute calls, any day of the week. We feel very blessed to have such a great person to work with. Hanh made sure we were offering the write amount and not what the seller wanted. I cannot say anything bad about her. I would definitely recommend her if you are looking for someone that is passionate and truthful to her job.

name: grace DeFee
text: Less than pleasant.

name: sefako tidwell
text: I went into the office today to inquire about a rental unit that stated it was available in May 2021 and the receptionist was quite rude. She stated that all units are occupied and to only look on the website. I stated that a unit on their site was available, she was dismissive. I didn’t feel welcome at all. Not a good impression at all!

name: Nicole Finley
text: We’ve used multiple realtors from Prestige to purchase 3 homes, 1 commercial property & sell one home. Each time the staff goes above & beyond to make the closing easy. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Wow!! Thanks so much, Nicole, for your kind words!! It's truly an honor helping people with one of the biggest decisions they'll ever make in their lives! So thankful for amazing (repeat!) clients like you and your business!

name: Esther Lande
text: Helpful when you need them, rental properties are kept in good condition.

name: E K
text:
I called Cecilia at Prestige Properties earlier today to confirm receipt of our application documents to her email which she had used to send us information about the property (it was a Gmail account, but it was clearly from Prestige because I had just called her about the property). When I called her to confirm receipt, she told she had not received it and that I had used the wrong email address (even though I had replied to the email that I had received from her). She gave me her "correct" email (still a Gmail account). I confirmed this with her several times. I then sent the applications to that address instead. I later received an email back from a Cindy saying that we had the wrong email. I have now sent both of our Social Security Numbers and personal information to a random person, because Cecelia could not give me her own contact information.

Extremely unprofessional. Very disappointed.

name: Ebony Herndon
text: I had a wonderful experience with this company! We rented a property that they managed and Prestige handled any repairs/concerns promptly. I would recommend this company to anyone looking for a great company to work with. In particular, Amber in the rental department is amazing! She went the extra mile to make our experience a good one... she really cares about her clients. We were new to town at the time and she made moving to a new city so much easier! Please go see Amber... again she is wonderful.

name: Charlotte Wahl Cassenta
text: I am loving living in my 2 bedroom duplex leased from Prestige Properties. They are an extremely personable group and I have loved my experiences. Amber Sapp always quickly addresses my maintenance issues which are very few and she has always gotten back to me quickly if I have questions.  My duplex is an older, quaint and sweet place and has been taken care of very nicely. The maintenance crew have been great to work with as well. They always call before they come and are willing to complete my request even  if I cannot be there. I'm staying..

name: Susan Crain
text: I love them!

name: Matt Galaska
text: They deserve a plus for their receptionists that were always extremely friendly.  With that being said, I have had a horrible experience with this company and highly recommend that you do not do business with them.  They don't fix damages in any timely fashion and they hit me with obscene "damages" out of my deposit.  Cindy (who did my walk through) claimed that I "had pet damages and there was a cat in my place when she showed it to potential new renters" which was the most blatant lie I've ever heard of considering I'm EXTREMELY allergic to cats.  Seriously, save yourself some trouble and rent somewhere else.

name: Philip Dugas
text: These guys/gals are extremely nice and professional.  If you need to find a place to live this is where to go.

name: Megan Lupek
text: I had a horrible experience with this company. Communication was terrible. Despite that as the renter, you are giving them money, they don't feel the need to take action or do their job. When things were asked to be fixed, they weren't or it took weeks for service to occur. They will scam you out of money at the closure of your lease after promising that you were in the clear (this has apparently happened to others as well as myself). Basically, they feel that nothing is their responsibility to help you, and even when you go out of your way to gain information from them, they lie to you. I do not recommend renting from them unless you wish to fork over your money to them and make/pay for all repairs out of your own pocket.

name: Lucas Kerby
text: Absolutely the worst experience I've ever had in my life  dealing with a property management/real estate company.  I would not recommend this company to manage anything of mine EVER again. I am still owed $3000. Terrible communication and terrible customer assistance dealing with every facet of managing my property. Disgraceful company

resp.text:
Mr. Kerby,
Our Property Management department doesn't recognize your name. Where was your property located?

name: Kastanchor
text: Office staff is nice, but maintenance is horrific. Put in a maintenance request 2 weeeks ago for leaking bathtub, sink, and AC unit. Someone came looked at it and told me he didn't have proper tools and hasn't been back since. Went by the office on the 5th to pay rent and brought up the issue and nothing yet.

resp.text: Hi! Can you please let us know what address this is for, or just call our office at (334) 887-5274 at your earliest convenience? Thank you!

name: Anthony Hamilton
text: Great rental staff! Maintenance was swift! I would rent from them again.

name: John Rockett
text: Tracie West is the realtor we have ever worked with.  We have bought and sold many properties and she by far is the best resourceful person we have worked with.  We thank you Tracie.

text: Prepare to live in roach and flea infested housing and pay to much money for rent and god forbid your a day late on rent theyll tell you you have to move out faye smith is extremely rude and always has an attitude towards you unless your rich i would not suggest you rent here you will be treated like garbage and scammed out of money you shouldnt have to pay..oh and if you neef repairs you better forget that cause they will make you wait months maybe longer then make you pay for it and dont expect a deposit back either. THIS IS THE WORST RENTAL AGENCY IN THE COUNTRY!!!!#!#

name: Joseph Jette
text: Good people and helpful services.

name: Samuel James
text: I contacted Jessica Parker about a year ago and told her my plans of retiring from the military and purchasing a home. As time got closer she was very eager in helping me find the perfect house. I'm currently stationed 6 hours away. I made two trips and we viewed 12 or more homes until I found the house that felt like home. She made every trip worth it by being so organized and knowledgeable of the homes she was showing.  If she didnt know something about a home she looked it up on the spot or got back with me within a matters of minutes. She even emailed me the adresses in order the night before to save time with the route. I thought purchasing this home would be hard. Once I picked it out Jessica really made this process go smooth. She constantly stayed in contact with me and the seller with updates. She even helped me negotiate with the seller by sharing her past experiences and things she seen be negotiated as a realtor. I got a very good deal thanks to her. It only took 22 days to make this deal and close after I selected my house. I don't know much about real estate but as the buyer I am completely satisfied.  I can't speak for the seller but if I had to guess we are all happy. Thank you Jessica!! I really appreciate all your hard work and dedication as a realtor.

name: Robert Roth
text: If you are on the Eastern Shore, you need to contact this realty company. Finally, had a great experience! Thanks Donna!

name: Adam Hosto

name: Danielle Blake
text:
Our story dates back to the beginning of the pandemic.  After spending three months in quarantine, we decided to take a road trip to Lake Martin.  My great aunt and uncle owned a home there when I was a child and I have very fond memories of our lake adventures.  In July 2020, we rented a house to escape the "new norm" and after spending one long weekend on the lake, we set out on a new adventure - house hunting.

I wanted a Realtor who was up-to-date on market conditions and knew the area well, so I took a chance and reached out to the president of the local Realtor association.  That was Jimmy Baker, broker/owner of Lake Dog Realty.  He was responsive, knowledgeable and most of all patient.  In a hot market, with extremely limited housing inventory fueled by record low interest rates, multiple offers is a given.  We looked at over 25 properties in 8 months, and finally....the stars aligned.  Our offer was accepted on "THE ONE!"  Our family now owns a little piece of heaven to relax and enjoy time together.

Thank you, Jimmy and Kim, for all of your assistance.  Your knowledge and patience was invaluable.

resp.text: Danielle, It was our honor to work with you and your family. Welcome to our Lake Martin family!

name: Nancy Alexander
text:
I can recommend Jimmy Baker and Lake Dog Realty with no reservation. Jimmy is a true professional with a thorough knowledge of the ins and outs of the real estate business and the area he represents.
He worked with my family through a long and complicated situation and was unfailing helpful and accessible. Jimmy genuinely cares for his clients and shows it with a Lake Dogged determination to get results!

resp.text: Thank you, Nancy! It was such a pleasure getting to know you and your family. It was honor to help you. And I love your witty phrase! I'll have to remember that one!

name: Andrew Platt
text:
Okay, so this is going to be a long one but I assure you that it's very worth your while to read.

After going through some personal stuff, I needed to buy a house. Jimmy and I spoke on the phone and that's how he and I started working together.

I had a pretty good idea of what I could afford and I had previously owned a few homes over the past 10 years. From the first time he and I met I knew he was the best realtor that I had worked with. He was always punctual, polite and wanting to get to know me beyond just what kind of house I wanted.

He explained everything to me, every step of the way and never once made me feel like a question I had was silly. He never once gave me the run around or didn't call me back. That's Jimmy, he's incredibly easy to get a hold of and he's incredibly caring about his clients.

So, after seeing a few houses he helped me settle on one that I was really interested in. Now, in less than 72 hours, I'll be closing on my first house for myself.

Jimmy, his wife and his business partner John are without a doubt the ideal people you want to work with when looking for a new home. It's not all about his commission or the money, they each really do care about you as a person.

There may be a lot of agents in the area but I swear you won't find an agency like Lake Dog anywhere. These people care about their clients and they treat them like family.

To Jimmy, his staff, John.... Thank you for getting me the house of my dreams. I could not have done it without you all and I will never be able to tell you thank you enough.

So in closing, yes... I would recommend Lake Dog and Jimmy to anyone and everyone!

name: Ashley Tyler Harris
text: Jimmy is the best realtor anyone could hope for! We lucked out and got set up with him through Zillow and I'm just so glad we did! We were looking to buy our very first home - a process we were obviously not very familiar with. Jimmy walked us through each step with patience, care, and experience. He genuinely cared about us and our goals, and he made sure we took the appropriate steps for our best interest. He was always accessible via text, phone, and email...there really wasn't a single time throughout the whole process that I couldn't reach him on the first try. I just can't express how sincerely I appreciated his immediate correspondence, reliable answers, and dedication to closing on the house of our dreams! I would recommend him to EVERYone that's looking for an attentive, sincere, and fast-acting realtor. He's your guy!!

text: The folks at National Land Reality work hard to sell our timber property.  While we owned it they also managed it for us.  I highly recommend them.

text: Best land based Realtor

name: Home Mission
text: Seth Thompson helped us tremendously with the sale of our land in Alabama! He walked us through the process every step of the way!

name: Kenyon Gradert
text:
Edit: seems like Hayley boosts its google reviews by rating itself. (See pic.) Appears that one of their own property managers left a five-star review.  And four of their five-star reviews come from people with the last name Hayley, same as the owner. (Maybe it's a coincidence!) It's almost funny.

Read through these reviews and you'll notice a trend that explains Hayley's poor ratings everywhere: they start with poor quality and end with scamming you out of your deposit. My pregnant wife and I spent 3+ hours on our hands and knees scrubbing our rental house top to bottom before we moved out. It was far cleaner than when we moved in. We discovered $100+ was kept from our deposit because we "didn't have it professionally cleaned" -- which is not even a requirement of the lease. I provided photographic evidence that we cleaned up messes that Hayley had never addressed when we moved in, proving that we left the place cleaner than Hayley did. (See photos below for before and after.) Their lawyer said our photos were selective and that we were "belittling" their efforts -- says the person who penalized a pregnant woman for cleaning 3+ hours. Nor did Hayley specify what we failed to clean, much less photographic evidence to prove it. All this to say that Hayley appears to automatically deduct $100+ from deposits for cleaning yet doesn't use that fee to clean the place to their own supposed standards.

This was just the last of many frustrations. Ants and roaches were present when we moved in. Here too we picked up for Hayley's slack and hired exterminators. Hayley's lease requires tenants to maintain the yard but when we moved in, we discovered the yard filled with bamboo and 1+ foot of pine straw (no wonder there were bugs). We asked Hayley to fix it; they sent a maintenance crew that cut the bamboo and left everything else. I spent all week raking it up.

Finally, the property was quite literally rotting on the outside. (Again, no wonder there were bugs.) The owner clearly was attempting to put as little maintenance into the property as possible. I think Hayley is coasting on the Auburn housing market, but it won't take much for a competitor to pick up their slack.

name: Marc Newbern
text: Let’s start in the beginning.  A week after I moved in I had to go pick up the garage door openers because they didn’t give them to me when I moved in, the also didn’t have two keys and had to go get one made.  The office told me that they thought my wife and I had funny relationship.  One, my wife is black and I am white so I am not sure what was even meant by that and two,  it’s none of their concern what kind of relationship we have.  Secondly they cheat you out of your deposit, doesn’t matter if that was the way it was when you moved in.  I have pictures to prove and the move in sheet.  They took $600 for touch up paint. I would be curious to know if they actually painted because they sure didn’t paint any walls when we moved in.  Keep moving, don’t rent from them, it isn’t worth the hassle.

name: Heidi Smith
text: Nice places to stay, but you have to put up with unprofessional office staff.  I am furious and would not reccomend them to anyone.  Takes forever to fix anything, they have their deposits all mixed up and allow folks to move in even if they havent signed lease for that time period.  they make me sick

name: Ann-Braxton Mann Smith
text: Follow the rules and dont destroy the home you live in and you may get different results when ya move out. I had absolutely no issues while living with them. Always nice when i called the office and never had any problems! Highly Recommend them if you know how to follow rules! :)

name: Elias Moritan
text: Do not respond to calls and applications in timely fashion. Hard to work with. Would not recommend.

name: Meredith Kemp
text:
We purchased a condo two years ago for our sons to live in while at college. The current tenets had four months left on their lease so we had Haley stay on as property manager since we were not living in the area. About two months later we received an email notifying us that an upstairs toilet had leaked but it had been handled and everything was dry. Since they had eyes on the situation we trusted them when the email said they had handled it and everything was dried. We had insurance, if they had informed us how bad the leak and water damage was we would have contacted them to come in. Instead two years later we have reports from an environmental mold specialist ongoing us that the upstairs and room beneath where water leaked is covered in black mold. Testing shows that it clearly originated from the bathroom leak not dealt with two years ago and the specialist also told us this does not happen when fans and dehumidifiers are brought in to properly dry everything out.
We owned a home in Virginia that had been handled by a property manager for 7 years before we could sell and they were always clear about communicating and honest with handling any issues. Haley was paid to do a job and clearly did not. My guess is because they knew we would not be extending our contract at the end of those four months when our sons moved in. We now have $20,000 worth of mold damage and our son with asthma health to worry about because of their poor management of our property.

name: Brent Butts
text: Rented from Hayley management for over 4 years. Not all of it was bad, but I wouldn’t recommend them. When we first tried to rent from them they told us to come sign because they were holding a spot for us. Only for us to come in and they told us it was given to someone else. They wouldn’t do anything about it until I had my dad come up there and speak to the manager and show them the text. Just over all unprofessional. Then upon move out they racked all these charges on us. Some were warranted and completely understandable. Others were not. A professional company would call you and explain the situation. They basically told us through email that our case was closed and to pay. They would not provide any proof of the work done or proof that fault was on us for certain damages. Not the worst place in auburn but you can find better for sure.

name: Edward Branchhill
text:
I've tried contacting Haley Management on multiple occasions to try and set up tours of available units. I always got the same response that they were "shorthanded" that day and to leave my information so that they could call me back to set up a showing. I've never been contacted back even after leaving my information on four separate occasions. The first time that I contacted them was over 3 months ago. Your experience may differ, but if the way they handle tours is any indication about how responsive they are to their current tenants then I would avoid them if at all possible.

Also, it appears that at least some of the 5 star reviews are left by representatives of Haley Management. For example, the most recent review by "Ann-Braxton Mann Smith" appears to be from a person that works for Haley Management (just do a quick search of her name). On its face, it appears to be a conflict of interest.

name: Matt King
text: I’ve been renting from Hayley for 3 years now and have had no problems. The staff is friendly, helpful, and they are super flexible on rent payments which is great if you are a student. The two leasing agents, Kelli and Ann Braxton and are always happy to help and answer any questions I have. They actually care about their owners and tenants. If you are a student and need a place to rent in the Auburn/Opelika area, I highly recommend renting from Hayley Management. Fantastic establishment.

name: Evlyne G
text: Friendly informative. Easy to work with cross country. Was given other options when the first choice wasn't available

name: Arthur Bosswell
text: Super trash!  They have employees and family boost their ratings.

name: Maxi Roberts
text:
I lived with Hayley for 5 years and literally didn’t have a SINGLE problem. I see a lot of reviews concerning security deposits. They give you a check list to
Go by when you move out. I followed the check list just like my lease said to and I got my entire security deposit back. I know this is a college town so maybe all of these mad people are just college kids who don’t understand how the move out process worked...? Not sure but I’m just here to say that they were all great and very professional to me.

I’d be curious to see the conditions of the homes that these “bad” reviews were left in. I can only imagine what some people lived like!

name: Adrian Buice
text:
Absolutely terrible to work with.  Would not recommend to anyone looking for a rental property.  We moved into a house that was poorly painted; single coated, holes in the walls were terribly patched up and not painted.
Upon receiving our deposit statement, they charged us $450 for them to repaint.

Edit: After sending in photos of what the paint job looked like BEFORE we moved in, they asked us to provide MORE documentation because apparently their team has NO documentation whatsoever on the unit.  A complete asinine request.  They also stated the grass wasn't cut and charged us $200 to cut the grass.  We provided photos of the yard the day we moved out which shows the lawn was in good shape.  A month went by before new tenants moved in.  I'm pretty sure they did have to cut the grass again between that time but we shouldn't be responsible for those cuts.  Disgusting company.

name: Mallory Mitchell
text: I love Hayley Management! They have been super accommodating to me and my family since renting with them in 2018. Ann-Braxton has been soooo helpful in getting my needs met and I’m so thankful to rent with them!!!

name: Jessie Mann
text: Where do I begin... we subleased an apartment and after being promised the place would be cleaned and carpets professionally cleaned we moved in. Well months went on and I stayed on the phone with their managers about the damages that were there. Moveout time comes after discussing it many many times with them they send me a bill for 7k dollars wanting me to pay for damages the previous tenant caused. They are so very unprofessional.... I SEVERELY wouldnt recommend renting from them!

name: Georgie the sweetest
text: First time ever writing a review in my life..Lived here for a year. WORST place to live. All good reviews are fake..Worst part is when you move out. They will check everything on their move out check list dirty and will charge you $450 for painting, $200 for carpet cleaning, $150 for “unprofessional cleaning” when the apartment was not painted and cleaned at all when I first moved in.. Absolutely worst worst place to live

name: David Aguiñaga
text: Unprofessional place, called them every day to check for any updates on my application and at the end they ended up leasing the property without notice they told me to look for other options on their web site and they will call me back... which they didn't. I didn't even rent here and I do not even recomend it because of their service.

name: DaJon McIntosh
text: They have a lot of nice housing options, but bad communication between their different offices. I submitted my application before my roommate and he got a response of rejection before me. And this was after we had already made an appointment to see the house, and on the way to see it. They should really suggest doing the application first before setting up an showing. It cost us $70 for application fees and $15 in gas and a waste of a day.

name: callie morris
text: Hayley Management has been so quick to respond to any questions that my roommates and I had during this pandemic about our future living arrangements. They have also been very polite and worked so hard to make sure that we got the answers we needed.

name: Kenneth Beard
text: Worst rental company to ever do business with. They will rent your property out from under you giving you little to no time to find somewhere else after you have discussed trying to renew your current lease. They never call you back when they say they will. The tenants right to a peaceful enjoyment will constantly be broken with them trying to find the next renter. They care less about the properties structure or maintaining it so they can make you pay for it. Everything is half way complete with anything they do. I would give them ZERO stars if possible. Also, if you do try to do business with them read the fine print cause they will try and pull a fast one on everyone of their tenants. It's not a personal basis with them only a number and dollar sign. Beware for you have been warned.

name: Brittney Johnson
text: They full of it. They want you to have a high credit score when alot of dont have that! We have good.

name: Jeffrey Webb
text:
Smooth move in and worked with us if someone was a couple days behind on rent. I would give them 5 stars but....
They gave us a check list of stuff to do to get back out deposit. The place was sparkling when we left but we were still charged for everything on the checklist. I would have been better off not cleaning at all. Hope they enjoy the bonus month of rent money.

name: Kim Spencer
text: Discriminatory with mixed couples

name: Ted Cook
text:
I don't normally write reviews, but I feel like I need to warn people about this company.

I lived at a Hayley property for two years and actually enjoyed the property itself. The size and location weren't bad for the price, and the one time pet fee made having a dog in college actually plausible. Unfortunately, that was pretty much all Hayley got right.

The yard was always a mess, with massive patches of dead grass and poor irrigation that caused the yard and our sidewalk to flood whenever it rained. There was also an issue where the owner of our property had requested that Hayley not sign anyone to a lease after our first lease ended so that he could sell the property, but Hayley signed us to a second lease anyway. This lead to confusion between us and the owner over whether we would be able to even live there the next year at a point in the year were most properties in town were already taken.

However, the worst offense was their predatory security deposit handling. During our second lease, our new owners would visit often and always thanked us for taking such good care of the property. On moving out, we followed Hayley's checkout list in full and left the place better than we found it. Despite all this, instead of getting our security deposit back, we received a bill stating we owed $1600 in damages BEYOND what our security deposit covered.

We were surprised to hear this based on how we kept the property, so we requested proof of the damages we were being charged for from Hayley. We were told that we would have to schedule an appointment for that, but any subsequent attempts to schedule an appointment were ignored.

Funnily enough, a friend in the same neighborhood who also rented from Hayley received a very similar bill upon moving out and has had the same experience in being ignored.

It seems as though Hayley's strategy is to scare young tenants out of their security deposits by asking for a ridiculous amount of money and then silently slinking off with an extra month's rent. To make things worse, this money isn't being used to clean or renovate the properties either, if the state of our property when we moved in is any indication.

So in summary, just avoid this company. Don't be fooled by the reviews here (if you look closely, almost all of the good reviews are years old with no comments and the recent reviews are much more scathing). You may not have problems right away, but they're bound to arise at some point.

name: James Hayley
text: I highly recommend these people. I rented from them for 2 years. They gave me a check list of their expectations once I left. It was super helpful and I got a my deposit back. They responded to my work orders in reasonable time. The rental was very spacious and comfortable.

name: Side Track
text: Been living any their space for over a year and it’s been very easy. People are nice and respond quickly. They fix things as fast as possible. No complaints. Gonna keep renting from Hayley.

name: Smith Smithson
text: This company has to be one of the worst managed rental agencies around. They do not care about tenants at all. It can take weeks at a time to get a reply and answer for any questions you may have. If your question regards anything dealing with money, you will unfortunately never receive an answer. However if you're looking for a job though, I would highly recommend trying to become a manager for Haley Management. This is because every time you ask to speak to a manager the receptionists say that they are on "vacation". Sometimes they can be on "vacation" for weeks at a time. So if you're looking for a job that pays you to do nothing at all and gives you more paid vacation time than any business around, being a manager at Haley Management could be the right job for you. I would suggest only working for them though because living in a property owned by them is not half as rewarding.

name: Nicky Bravo
text: Unprofessional and drug their feet and lied to me. Would not recommend at all! If you have any other choice try to find arrangements with a different company

text: This company is one of the greatest! We have rented from them and now rent our condo through them. They are always helpful and get things done fast when needed! I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a rental company!! All of the office staff is wonderful and very helpful!

text: Their service is Good and I love working with Brandon, but some of the staff is so rule and I feel like I was discriminated. I cannot remember her name but she is white. She was so rude and racist. I can feel that by The way she talk to me because I am an Asian and don’t speak English well. She used to gave me some tours to the house but when I was not pleased with the house and then she had a bad attitude to us. Whenever I call to talk to Brandon, she never let me talk to him, and try to ask me why I call, and then answer impolitely. I feel bad. She is Really mean to me. Please respect your customer, I pay the rent on time, I didn’t take any one money. Please learn how to answer the phone if you are as customer service agent. Because of you, I give your company zero star.

name: Stephanie Greene
text: I called and asked to see a property, they were very polite and very prompt in sending me the access code. However, I was very disappointed to have found out that the house in question Had another interested party. In fact, I didn’t find out that somebody else put an application in on it until I called back about it, which wasn’t even 24 hours later. I am slightly disappointed of course. It was beautiful home and would have been perfect for my husband and I. However, I’m more frustrated that they wasted my time and as a former real estate professional I would have expected them to at least let me know that somebody else was interested in the home, had put an application in on the home, so that I would not have wasted my time. I think I’ll look for a more customer focused office for my future needs.

name: Trish Cooper
text: Very knowledgeable

name: Kathy McBride
text: The management is very rude. They don't respect their tenants at all. We don't mind to pay maintenance fee if it was our fault to clog the tub drain by fallen hair ( I tried my best to collect these hair while taking shower and threw them to trash can), but you don't have to send a complaining email and attached a picture on what you unclogged and warn us not to do that anymore! Sorry but I won't call for maintenance anymore!

name: May Chen
text:
I like the work of Hayley Management Company very much. They are very professional, responsive, efficient and considerate. They not only consider the demands of the property owners and handle management affairs efficiently and effectively, in the process of collecting lease and providing management service for the property, they are also very considerate for the tenants with the greatest goodwill. It is not easy to handle the balance of effectively solving problems and considering all relevant parties with a humanitarian spirit, but they can do it very well and balance them very well.

All the staff working there I have contacted, no matter over the phone or actually going to the office,  are very polite, professional and responsive to your inquiries and requests. So far, this is the best management agency I  have seen. I definitely highly recommend this property management company to my friends.

name: Brice Hilyer
text: I rented from Hayley Management last spring and their service was exceptional. The rooms were impeccable. Customer service is the best around! I would recommend Hayley Management for everyone!

name: Donna Burnett
text: Brianna is a great representative for your company.  She assisted me in finding a great place to live on short notice when I moved to Auburn!  I have every reason to recommend Haley Management Company to help others with their housing needs when moving to Auburn or the surrounding area!  Thank you, again!

name: Hannah Anderson
text: Rented from this company for 6 months. They were always prompt when I called for maintenance. They even repaired the fence for the backyard before move in, so my dog would be safe. They added a pay rent online feature that makes renting from them much easier.

name: Chris Jefferson
text: I always thought organized gambling was illegal in the state of Alabama, that is until I signed a lease with Hayley Management. You see, Tom Hayley and his band of thieves run Haley Management like that of a casino. When you sign a lease with them you are gambling with what service you will be provided. If an appliance ranging from a refrigerator to an air conditioning unit quits working, you have a chance at them fixing it in either 1 try or 10 tries. Sometimes these issues can raise your power bill up tremendously high. If you call their offices to try and figure out an issue with money of any value, your chances of receiving any kind of help are around 10%, the house has 90% in this particular game they offer. But rest assure every December and January their employees try to reel you back into the Hayley Management casino just like a pit boss does in Vegas or Biloxi. So unless you’re a degenerate gambler I’d steer far away from Hayley Management.

name: Maddy Carroll
text: Very helpful staff, I have enjoyed working with this company, especially through this stressful situation of COVID-19!

name: Andrew Orman
text: Not very good on customer service. Absolutely robbed us of our security deposit, deducting for ridiculous reasons. Our unit wasn’t nice to begin with, and we had to get it cleaned after we moved in, even tho they claimed it was done before hand. Overall terrible. Would choose Northcutt any day of the week.

name: Mona Johnson
text: R&R rentals is by far the best company I've ever rented from. My duplex was clean and in great condition when I moved (and when I moved out). My roommates and I never had any maintenance problems, but Kurt (the owner) was always just a phone call away if we had any problems/questions at all. I would definitely recommend renting from this company, it was a good experience.

name: Stephen Hughes
text: Highly recommend!  Impeccable work ethic.  Rented many properties over the years and have never been so satisfied with the staff.  Very personable and easy to work with.

name: Brett Nelson
text: The owners here are very friendly and very helpful.  The way the run things here flows smoothly and without a hassle. Highly recommended!

name: Ben Burkart
text: R and R (Hayley Management) took over management of the house we were renting right before our lease ran out. The company that was managing our unit did not provide Hayley management the total initial deposit amount that we put down. They also did not provide them with our initial unit inspection sheet. Because of this when we got our deposit refund it was much lower than it should have been. After explaining the situation to Kurt, and providing him copies of all our initial paperwork,  he was very willing to refund us the deposit amount that we deserved. Excellent customer service and they put their customers, both renters and owners, first.

name: DopeAMean (DJ Dope)
text: Unable to make contact, used someone else.

name: Farm House
text: Hayley management company is a great group of people to work with. They care about their customers and work to make their customers satisfied in everything they do. They really care about their work and the customers they serve.

name: ribbon ribbon
text: Do not be fooled by the close-to-perfect reviews of this rental company. The majority of the reviews come from random accounts who ONLY review Hayley Management AND Tiger Iron Gym... hmmm, the owner of both of these companies is Kurt Hayley, who only wants to boost the reviews of his places. I personally leased with them BECAUSE of these reviews, and while the quality of the duplex was sub-par, they don't have upkeep of their rental properties. People have dogs and don't even pick up after them... Not the worst rental company in Auburn for sure but I think it's really shady that the good majority of these reviews are from the owner hidden behind a computer. *disclaimer: This isn't my main e-mail account as I do not want to be harassed by places where I provide my HONEST review.

name: Andrea DeWitt
text: I was very disappointed a number of times working with Haley Management. I had accepted a job in Auburn and was looking to move relatively quickly. It was very difficult to get a reply to the emails I would send about available properties and viewing appointments. I still to this day have yet to receive an email from Charity about a property that I was later called for. I was told it was no longer available by phone call on my part but then called by Brandon the next week after I had accepted a property with a different agency. I understand that emails can pile up and get lost but after three months of working with them I would not recommend them if you are in any type of time strain.

name: Tfoles4Life
text: We have had a fantastic experience with R & R rentals. We had bad experiences with several other companies in looking for a house initially, but Kurt with R & R was very personable and easy to work with. We found a great place to live owned by R & R, and we've had great service ever since! When we first moved in there were several issues with the house, but within a couple short weeks R&R got them fixed. When we had a problem with some of the maintenance workers, Kurt went above and beyond to figure everything out for us. It is rare to be truly taken care of and looked out for as renting college students, but R&R has done a fantastic job!

name: Katelyn Johnson
text: Not much managing going on here. More interested in collecting a paycheck than ensuring and managing quality properties.

name: Glenn Lamb
text: Hayley Management is great! They really work hard on finding the right spot for you. Plus the lady up front is smoking hot!!! Makes you look forward to coming in every month to pay your rent!

name: Angela Tran
text: Stay away!! They give you a dirty unit to start with and when you live in the unit for two years you clean and fix everything that they didn’t. And once you move out they want to charge you for every little thing just to keep your security deposit! Money hungry. They don’t care for anyone. They have a bunch of college kids working for them and no one even seems to care. Just stay away from this place!

name: Sierra McNeel
text:
First of all, if I could leave Hayley Management 0 stars, I would. I lived under Hayley Management for 2 years. I enjoyed the property for the most part, but the office is very unorganized. Maintenance was also disrespectful to our belongings when they would come maintain the grass on the property. Grass was not cut as often as it should have been, multiple times it was knee high. They’d consistently leave the gate open and throw our yard furniture near the house. The bushes in front of the house were probably trimmed twice the entire time that I lived there. If you cannot maintain all of your properties, maybe you should charge less for rent and not offer this service.

Multiple times they called me saying I had not paid my rent when I had and even had a receipt to prove so. I was a very loyal resident who always paid my rent on time. The lease ended on the 20th of July and they would not offer us a pro-rate for the month. Although we had to pay the entire month’s rent, we were required to keep water and power on 7 business days after moving out, and if we turned it off, then we were charged a $95 reconnecting fee. Aside from all of that, Their move out checklist is insane. They are trying to have the tenants clean the entire property so that they do not have to pay a cleaning service to do it. Tomorrow is 60 days since we moved out and our lease stated that after move out if applicable we would receive our security deposit and could request a list of damages.

Back to being unorganized, no one in the office is able to provide me that list or amount that I am receiving back. I asked to speak to a manager and I spoke to Kurt who told me that this was a ridiculous question to ask. What's ridiculous is speaking to you clients like this. Is it really a ridiculous question to inquire about my money? Anyone who is leasing here or planning to lease here, be wary, because they make everything seem really nice in the beginning but really screw you over in the end.

name: Crispy Cloak
text:
I have rented from 3 other companies in the Auburn area. This is hands down the best realty company I have been with.

We had a flood here on Christmas Eve. When the realty manager Kurt comes out here himself on Christmas Eve with boots and shovels to dig trenches and rip out carpet and help us take care of the problem, you know you're in good hands.

I don't think I need to say anymore, but I will.

They are super easy to rent from, maintenance will come same day if you report a problem. Rent is a fair price and the office is always friendly. Coming from Alice Henderson realty before, this is paradise.

name: Ellis Kennedy
text: I got my full security deposit back. Great people and management. Definitely will rent from them again.

text: it's been 72 days since I've moved out and haven't gotten any information on my deposit refund. I didn't get any sort of checklist upon moving out. It seems like it's managed by undergrad students. Look at Northcutt reality instead.

text: Loved renting from Hayley management. Great people and always were quick to come fix something if it broke. Highly recommend renting from them.

text: My back door knob jammed after hours and I called and they were here within minutes. Changed the knob like a NASCAR Pit crew. Much appreciated.

text: Most of the good reviews are from friends of the Hayley family, family members themselves, and employees. They're the ones that treat the tenants poorly. Maintenance never fixed my leak, mold was present in unit and after requesting it to be taken care of and speaking with the ladies in the office along with Kurt they just said sorry. When I first moved in the floors were filthy, walls were missing paint,  window pane and blinds were already torn, light bulbs were not working, air filters were dirty, toilets constantly ran etc. Did I mention the unit and other units are invested with spiders. When I moved out they were frustrated because i told them I was not resigning my lease due to their lack of care for their tenants.

I am sure HM will keep this boys deposit but they are refusing to use any of those funds to fix the damage and mess he left behind.

text: Hello all, I'm a recent customer of Haley Management Company (HMC) after the homeowner I currently rent from began to use their services. I first want to state HMC was very point blank and aggressive and I find them to be unreasonably rude, making use threats and unnecessary means of manipulation to obtain rent EVEN THOUGH I WAS READY AND WILLING TO MAKE A PAMENT. After a recent Identity theft and a severe life threatening illness that left me homebound for several months I was very hesitant to send large amount of money to a company that I had never heard of. All this happened over text message too at that, though they Implied that I(who have had a great rental history prior to my current very difficult landlord) "Had just been ignoring them and they had been trying to make contact". All their problems were my fault. They show absolutely no desire and put forward effort to make my rent payment easy to make, just threats. even after the check I wrote them was RETURNED TO ME DUE TO SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY. Excuse my language but i didn't even know where the goddam office was. This is an inexpensive company that at the moment appears to care nothing at all about about the well being of their tenants. This is just a personal note, but I can give the impression of that of a low income person in trouble (when in reality that was not the case) and I get the impression that this company has been using the fear and threat of security as a means manipulate their "less desirable" clientele regularly for some time now. they seem very practiced. My advice, don't do business with people who use fear as a business model. I will be living my very well enjoyed home to work with a company that values my business and perhaps more importantly, value me as a human worthy of respect. Spend your time, happiness, and money with better people. You (or your tenants) will thank you.
