name: Jody Weston
text: Clean comfortable condo with more of what we needed to feel at home than we expected. Phoenix on the bay was beautiful and relaxing. Spacious for our family of 5 and quiet all week. Definitely hope to visit unit 1527 again.

name: Tina Mcnelly
text: We had a wonderful experience with White Shores Realty. Every time I called with a question , they were friendly, helpful. The Condo we rented was clean, beautifully decorated, very up to date on everything. We had a great experience with them, and would definitely recommend renting property through White Shores Realty. 😊

name: Ciara
text: Easy to book and work with! They were available on the phone if I had questions. I really enjoyed my experience renting with this company. The property at the phoenix west 2 was better in person than the photos. I'll be calling them for all of my orange beach rentals in the future.

name: Amelie Zeringue
text: I did not have a good experience with this company. We stayed at Phoenix on the bay and the unit was not ready with blowers and appliances pulled out. Reality company did not answer phone. Never got back to me in regards to the issue. Pots were dirty and light fixtures were blinking on and off. The front desk told me they couldn’t help and had nothing to do with my stay. This was an inconvenience as I traveled by myself with 2 young kids. I work in the hospitality industry and was very disappointed in the customer service. This company contacted me a week before my trip asking me to come a day early at a discounted rate as well. I would have never came early if I would have know the issues I had to deal with. I asked for a refund for one night and no one would respond.

resp.text: This guest was allowed into the unit 2 hours early. The HOA had 1 blower and 1 small fan in the unit to dry out a previous leak on an under counter ice maker. The icemaker was the only appliance pulled out. The problem was solved and equipment taken out promptly that day. The unit is a gorgeous two bedroom 5 th floor unit with awesome views of the bay ,sunset, and the lazy river and pools.  It's a cute, cute, fun professional decorated unit.  We love our awesome owners that keep their units so beautiful!!

name: Terry Hamm
text: Debbie recently helped me with a beach condo purchase.  She is a great realtor!  She knows her business and is very responsive.  To be fair Debbie is an old friend, I've known her since high school. I trust her. What more do you want in a realtor, than someone you TRUST?!  She runs a small operation which I like because you don't get lost in a corporate jungle.

name: michael johnston
text: The house was very nice. The rental company was easy to work with. There were a few billing issues that they quickly addressed and corrected.  I would definitely stay here again.

name: Kelly Kleinfeld
text: We recently stayed at a condo in the Bel Sole complex in Gulf Shores that we rented through White Shores Realty. While it was made clear that there may be construction going on at the complex as the result of hurricane damage last year, it was NOT made clear that there was a possibility of construction going on IN the unit we were staying in. We were only there for 5 days, 2 of which we had construction workers IN OUR CONDO WITH US. One day there were workers at our condo at 7am resealing all the windows, and another day there were workers in the living room & bedrooms for several hours vacuuming water from the walls and floors and repairing the electricity in half of the condo. Apparently water had gotten into the floor receptacles during the hurricane and shorted out the electricity. Per the electrician, this was a known issue that they had attempted to prolong fixing. These items should have been repaired prior to renting the unit, or at the very least, scheduled when renters were not there. Very disappointing.

name: Sheila
text: I booked a month before travel but was sent an email the day of travel that a photo ID was needed ( apparently I missed this in the registration).  All money was collected and I checked in and provided ID, but I was not permitted access to condo. When I asked, I was told to check for an email. I went to my car and through my luggage and found my iPad to retrieve email. No access was provided in the email, so I called. The attendant laughed when I explained my frustration and that really felt like he was unconcerned.  He then persisted to blame me for being upset and insisted I knew the license copy was needed because he had sent an email. On property,  I was told this company is known for such and maybe beware. Of course, I will not use this company in the future. The condo was great. The location was perfect for my plans. I will book through other agencies in the future.

resp.text: We do collect by email ID confirmation for all our guest and we send out GLAD TO HAVE YOU e-signature when booking is made. Most of our properties are KABA lock and guest that send in ID and e-signature  receive all kaba codes by email for the guest convenience. This guest did not check emails and she made a trip to our office without having to.  If she would have just read her confirmation email it would have saved her time and inconvenience. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and that the unit was perfect.  The traffic is heavy here this time of year and we try our best to accommodate our guest to the best of our ability.

name: Lucinda Mccree
text: I booked a reservation for island towers for Oct 17 thru Nov 8. After hurricane Sally I contacted the agency to inquire about the condo. Was told they didn't have any info.  They charged my final payment after I had contacted them the first time. The first of October family members had their reservation at another condo cancelled 2 weeks before their stay. I tried to contact them to see if there was a possibility of condo not being available. No response.  Oct 15 I called to inquire about picking up the check in packet after hours and was told to call the afternoon I was to check in and they would make arrangements. I received a phone call the next day ( the day before my arrival) telling me my reservation had been cancelled. I think it is unacceptable that they did not let me know that there was a possibility that this could happen. I would have no confidence in the integrity of this business.

resp.text: We are so sorry for your inconvenience.  We do not like to cancel reservations.  The HOA ran into bigger issues in the building on repairs and we let you know as soon as we were alerted. The storm damaged our area really bad. We again apologize that this process was completely our of our hands. We pray you had a great trip even though this property was not available!

name: Troy Johnson
text:
We had a very negative experience with White Shores Realty. We stayed at the Rookery complex and here is what we experienced:

1. Sly and Misleading: The listing and the pictures were intentionally very misleading. It was actually a duplex instead of an individual cottage.

2. Unresponsive and Poor Communication: The realty office did not return nor answer any of our email inquiries and questions prior to our booking and never did respond to any of them. In addition, the realtor would not ask the property owner nor let us directly contact the owner to discuss our negative experience.

3. Unaccessible: The realty office hours are posted online and on their office door as open from 1:00 to 5:00 on Sundays. When we arrived on Sunday afternoon to discuss the situation, the office was still not open at 3:00.

Overall, they were very unprofessional and they successfully "ruined our vacation." We highly do not recommend booking a vacation rental with White Shores Realty!

resp.text: We are so sorry you did not realize the complex were all duplexes at Fort Morgan.  They are very cute cottages. We in no way were misleading and sly. All pictures displayed are exactly what you get at The Rookery!   There is no need to intentionally mislead anyone!  Some people are repeat guest to this property and love Fort Morgan.  We are so sorry you were so unhappy!  We hope you enjoy your next stay on our beautiful Gulf coast!!!

name: dan shiner
text:
Our experience has been poor.  BE CAREFUL!!!!!

We rented a condo, mid January through Home Away, And the web site indicated we were corresponding with White Shores Realty Property Manager.  The condo advertised that it accommodates 13 guests for dates  of June 19-23, 2020.

The COVID lock down occurred.  Now Alabama is reopening after the COVID shut down, but there are limitations per unit, for gatherings, pool use and on the beach limiting gatherings to 10 people.  We have 11 guests in our party and just cancelled our reservation 38 days in advance of the time limit for cancellations.  We paid $631.00 in deposit and have been told we will only get $300.00 back.

Things have only PARTIALLY reopened and we are not leaving family members at home.  I believe our refund should be $531.00 which would cover the minimum $100.00 non refundable charge for cancellations within the specified time limit.

This matter is not resolved!

resp.text:
Currently it is mid May.  As of May 11, there are no longer restrictions on gathering size, beaches are open, condos are open, and restaurants are open.   While we never know what is going to happen,  by mid June, we are expecting to still be open.
However, we agreed to cancel this guest and refund their stay, that is over a month away.  This guest booked on VRBO and they charge a "booking fee" when you use their site.  VRBO does not refund that fee.  We do not receive a portion of it, nor do we have control of that fee.   We encourage all our guests to avoid booking site fees by booking direct on our web site at whiteshoresrealty.com!  We hope everyone is staying safe and look forward to a great summer!

name: Todd O'Brien
text: Nice rental property easy to coordinate with.

name: nicholas felch
text: I do not recommend white shores realty. Was on the phone with the “Manager” and he was not very considerate. Especially at a time like this we rented a condo on 5/04/20 for the date of 5/11/20 - 5/17/20 for the price of $1008.52 on 5/5/20 we contacted them explaining the reasoning for the cancellation because work won’t allow it at the moment even though we have vacation time planned we still have to remain on call due to (COVID-19) we didn’t know that before hand. But to make a long story short we called to cancel today (today) 5/05/20 but was told by the “manager” because it’s not within the 30 days there will be no refund. Now you think a company like them would be understanding and willing to work with us but no. To top it all off they had the nerve to repost it on the dates we had rented it for and never even sent us a cancellation notice. Now to me they are just trying to take advantage of a situation and pocket more money I would understand if I booked this 3 months ago and canceled last minute but I was trying to cancel within the 24 hour mark. So once again I would not recommend at all.

resp.text: This guest has not told the whole story! Although, per the contract they entered in to, we did not have to refund money back. We  did rebook this unit and we did send them a refund promptly! This review was written on the day they cancelled before we had time to work it all out for them.  People are so easy to judge and it has been a hard year for us all. The guest didn't even have the courtesy to rewrite a positive review for us!!

name: Chris Adkison
text: I’ve had the best time staying with White Shores Realty! These guys went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable! Easy communication, great details, and even offered some great advice about the area!  I would recommend them to anyone! Definitely will be back! Thanks for a great stay!

name: Jordan McDuffy
text: My wife and I had a great experience renting our condo from White Shores. Everyone was very generous and very helpful throughout the entire booking process. The condo we stayed in was very clean, really nice, and a great price. This was our first time visiting Gulf Shores so the young man, Darell, was very helpful in telling us nice restaurants to eat at and cool places to visit. Overall it was a great experience and we're definitely going to continue using White Shores Realty!

resp.text: Mr. McDuffy, we are happy you enjoyed your vacation and we hope to see you again soon!

name: Casey Franks
text: Great location, awesome customer service. Will definitely rent from again!

name: Charity Sienkiewicz
text: I booked my vacation condo through trip advisor and encountered some problems with them, but as soon as I contacted White Shores Realty they we're able to answer all my questions and addressed my concerns. I had never vacationed in Orange Beach before and they were very helpful in recommending places to go and things to do. The condo was beautiful and very clean. We had 9 women in a 10 person condo and we all had plenty of room to get ready everyday and slept comfortably in the large beds and couch pull-out beds. I don't have any complaints about our vacation rental but will be sure to rent directly through White Shores Realty next time instead of a third party.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Charity, we love hearing from our guests! Come back to see us any time, we'll save you a spot in the sand!

name: Maria Gonzalez
text: Really good experience with them

name: Ann Barber
text: I can't give enough stars for this realty company. Me and my family have come down to the beach 3 years in a row in different units each stay. White Shores has been hassle free and very accommodating to make our stay comfortable and affordable. I like the fact that they have a wide range of rentals either beach front or bay front. Thank you White Shores for being easy to book with and so helpful with recommendations of good restaurants! We will be back!

name: Maci Harris
text: I would recommend White Shores for anyone trying to book a place! They were very helpful while booking my stay, super kind and sweet when I checked in, and guided me to all the wonderful food locations around town! I will definitely book my vacation with them again!

name: Kristin Ward
text: We have used White Shores Realty to book numerous vacations and have always had positive experiences! The properties are easy to book online and have consistently been clean upon arrival. The management staff has been quick to answer any questions we have had regarding our stay. We love the Gulf Coast and will continue to use White Shores for our beach vacation rentals!!

resp.text: Ms. Ward, thanks for visiting our beautiful coast. We are glad you enjoyed your stay!

name: Placito Miceli
text: We’ve had 4 families stay together at Phoenix West II for the past 5 years and love the property.  I had a small problem at my stay and the realty company worked it out.  Every company will have a glitch every now and then, it’s how they handle it that makes the difference.  Cliff and his team are awesome and I’d highly recommend using them in the future (already planning to use them again next Easter).  Who Dat!

name: C Ward
text: I stayed at the turquoise place and absolutely loved everything it offered. The white shores team was very easy to work with, they recommended so many good restaurants and things to do. I would recommend white shores reality to everyone, especially tourist that have never visited the gulf shores/ orange beach area!

resp.text: Mr. Ward, thank you for your recommendation. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Ray Johnson
text: Awesome is experience with white shores realty and a gentleman named Cliff Robertson. Very courteous to our every need. Would definitely recommend to everyone for such great hospitality!!

name: Sunny Jones
text: We just left a stay at Turquoise Place in Orange Beach, it is by far our favorite condo.  Of all the units we have stayed in at Turquoise Place,  this was by far the cleanest unit and best stocked unit.   When I booked I  told the reservationist it was my husbands birthday.  White Shores had a cake for us on arrival to celebrate my husbands birthday!  Thank you,  White Shores for helping make our vacation so special!

name: Belinda White
text: Thank you Debbie for alleviating all the stress of securing a wonderful condo for a much needed vacation!  My stay was very relaxing and exactly what I needed.  A very professional company! I will be back!  Thank you again!

name: gloria nelson
text: l I must say White Shores Realty has been very helpful in trying to make our stay comfortable. They have gone out of their way to help fix the problems . I really appreciate all they have done . I would use this Realty again. thanks  Gloria Nelson

name: Nathan Grandahl
text: Booked a place in oyster bay at bay john dont recommend this property at all when we arrive  to condo the mold stale  smell as so bad we had to open all windows and doors and go to target to get air freshener the tiles were all cracked and it felt like they went in and did a quick clean cause the sheets were kinda dirty so we ended up washing all sheets and pillow cases the same day we arrived the TVs were the hard to figure out how to watch anything or find a channel we also found pool and hot tub to be cold anyway some good things were the people there great people in condo which were helpful with our trip we also seen dolphins pretty much every day and the fishing was good but for what u pay there is way better spots in the area so I dont recommend this location to anyone but is a great area to visit

name: Missy Bain
text: White Shores Realty has the best rates! Their condos are clean, beautiful and well appointed with beautiful views of turquoise water and crystal white beaches. Hands down best customer service

name: Megan Parker
text: Stayed at The Moorings and the condo was decorated so nice. It was very clean and we had an easy check in and check out. I always check White Shores for prices first.

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed The Moorings Megan! You can't beat that bay view from the pool. Thanks for the shout out!

name: Joshua White
text:
This company did a horrible trick in our opinion. Here is what occurred to a friend of ours this month:

So, I rarely, if ever, use this page for personal items, but I’m going to make an exception here.

For my son’s Christmas and birthday, we bought him tickets and made travel arrangements for Hangout Music Festival, which is next weekend. The condo was booked in DECEMBER, for May 17-21.

Today, the week before the festival, we received a voicemail from White Shores Realty, asking for more money (for a condo that had been paid for months in advance.) They claimed a mistake had been made. Additionally, we found out that White Shores Realty had already canceled the reservation, without our knowledge, and with no recourse for us, other than to pay 250% MORE than what we originally were quoted and paid.

I expect nothing to come of this post, other than to warn others who might be thinking of using this realtor.

Caveat emptor, my friends.

resp.text: Good morning Joshua. Thank you for voicing your concerns about your friend's vacation. Unfortunately, it seems as if you do not have all the facts. Your friend did not book with us directly, he booked his reservation with a 3rd party discount travel site that provided him with an incorrect rate. We are currently working with the 3rd party company to find out how and why this happened. Thank you for understanding the complexity to this issue. In the future please have your friend book with us directly to ensure correct rates and help avoid additional fees. Feel free to contact us directly via email with any further concerns. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

name: Gus Delafuente
text: Great service! Treated very well and very prompt service.

name: Mamie Phillips
text: I don't, normally leave reviews.but in this case I must.iy was such a pleasure working with the team at White Shores  Realty. Especially Cliff. From the booking to checkout each member of their staff was very knowledgeable &professional! We stayed at theThe  Amazing Turquoise Place Condos &belive me the units did not disappoint!! " Each unit  has its own hot tub.

name: Daniel Noebel
text: Highly recommend this company! They were professional and helpful! Thank you for helping us find the perfect condo!

name: Kristy Hoffman
text: RENTERS BEWARE!!! I booked a reservation 5 months in advance for the busy summer season. My reservation was cancelled BY WHITE SHORES due to the condo I that I had booked being sold by the property owner. Due to all of their similar properties being rented already I was told they could with nothing other than refund my money. This left me with NO PLACE TO STAY!  Now there are very few properties to choose from left on the rental market and I am responsible for paying additional money for the shoddy places that are left. THEY OFFER NO PROTECTION FOR VACATION RENTALS! (I did receive an apology- unfortunately that does nothing to remedy my current situation.) This could happen to you if you rent through this company.

resp.text: Ms. Hoffman, we apologize for the owner selling their property. However, as most know, this is their right to do so as it is they do own the property. Being two months away from your dates, we did offer you comparable units at our other complexes, unfortunately you declined. So we in turn refunded all of your money. We hope you are able to find a vacation property and would be happy to assist you in any way possible, as we still have units available for those dates.

name: Jerry Wilks
text: Would leave a 0 star if it was an option! The property manager cursed my son and was very rude to him! He parked off site for two days and the day he had to leave, he parked beside us and was there maybe a half hour as he loaded up and said goodbye to all of us as he left! The property manager was rude, unprofessional and very disrespectful to our son as well as myself! The elevator didn't work half the time we were here and the reality company couldn't be reached! I'd advise you pay $100 more and go elsewhere! I hate the experience we had and we will never use any of the companies again when traveling! What the shores realty and the gulf towers are a negative five star experience period!!!!

resp.text:
Mr. Wilks, we have had similar experiences with the on site property manager at Gulf Tower. He is in no way affiliated with our company, but works for the condo and enforces the condo parking rules.  We are sorry to hear that the on site Home Owner Association Manager was unprofessional and rude to your son. Please know that we at White Shores Realty would never act in this manner and do not support those who do.
We contacted the HOA manager as soon as we heard of the elevator issue.  The elevator repair company was sent to fix the issues as soon as they could.
We hope that you will reconsider utilizing our company and stay at one of our other properties for your next vacation.

name: Rebecca Wallis
text: These people are very lovely to deal with and went above and beyond to make sure my family and I had an exceptional stay. They exceeded our expectations and I will definitely use them to book our next vacation.

name: Christina Harris-Sullivan
text: We used this company last year and were very pleased. Debbie was a tremendous help! Highly recommend this company!!

resp.text: Ms. Sullivan, thank you for your recommendation, we are happy to have helped you.

name: Kaelin Cobb
text: I LOVE WHITE SHORES!!!!!!! They always have the best rates & best customer service. Family owned business that cares to meet your needs!

name: Ronnie Falgout
text: Great beach realtor

name: Angela Sills
text: Be aware.... This company's cancellation policy states that a minumum of 30 day notice is required to cancel your reservations and they will refund you all but the non refundable processing fee and trip insurance.  What they do not tell you is that the processing fee is $100.  So, if you need to change dates, or anything on your reservation, they charge you a $100 processing fee even if you cancel 3 months before your check in.  Don't waste your time with White Shores Realty.   Go to Brett Robinson.  Change in reservations, cancellations 30 days prior to check in, no hassle!  They do charge a $25 dollar processing fee, BUT it states the amount in their policy.  Also, they have more properties to choose from.

resp.text:
Ms. Sills,
As you said, our cancellation procedure is stated plainly in our reservation policy. We moved your dates and unit multiple times, per your request. You then decided to ultimately cancel your reservation and were in turn charged the processing fee. This was mutually agreed upon on the original reservation document and this fee goes towards costs we incur upon cancelled reservations, it is not for profit sake. You then in turn threatened us with "I'll make your business pay because you have made me pay." We handle our guests and owners with professionalism and respect and unfortunately those traits were not returned to us in this situation. We strive to provide competitive pricing and competitive properties. We hope that you enjoy your future vacations booking through other companies and wish you the best.

name: Willie Tino
text: I highly recommend. They are very welcoming!! Love staying at white shores!!!

name: Alexia Noebel
text: Wonderful establishment with great customer service! Would definitely recommend using this agency!

name: Rich T (Richie Rich)
text: They advertise availability and then come back and say you must book two months to get the rate. Very deceptive.

resp.text: Thank you, Richard, for your feedback. We noticed you have never stayed with us. We hope to have the opportunity to host you soon. Some of our properties do require both January and February, together, during the Winter months to qualify for the advertised monthly rate, which is common practice with most properties in our area. However, if a property is still available in December and the property allows monthly rentals then we will try to accommodate your request for February only. We will continue to work hard for our guests and property owners. December is approaching quickly and we will be glad to try and accommodate your request. Thank you, again.

name: Haley Stewart
text: Such a friendly staff to work with! Highly recommend booking your next beach trip with White Shores!

resp.text: Glad to hear that our staff was able to take care of you Haley! Come back to see us!

name: Sonya Parkey
text: I booked a condo for $1526 on 1-2-2018. I called to add an extra day today and they informed me that there "IS NO RESERVATION"!! They blamed everything on VRBO-HOMEAWAY-EXPEDIA...even though they refused to accept it!!!!! Bottom line..the White Shores agent listed the condo at the wrong price!! The big problem is that NO ONE CALLED or EMAILED ME to tell me they made a mistake. They just cancelled the reservation. THANK GOD I called to add the day and found out. White Shores listed the condo at the wrong price, and they need to honor that price. A lot goes into planning a vacation. THANK GOD we didn't drive for 11 hours and find out we had no place to stay with 3 little girls!

resp.text: This isn't exactly how this went down. This guest booked on expedia and the reservation was never excepted by our company because expedia had the wrong property and wrong pricing. She never was booked on our platform. We are so sorry for the confusion expedia caused. Please book directly through us next time!

name: Kathy Brewer
text: Very clean grandkids love the closest to the ocean hopeful to stay here again in warmer weathet

name: Debra Conaway
text: COMPANY DOES NOT TELL HOMEOWNERS WHAT THEY ARE CHARGING CUSTOMERS/DAY. THEY DO NOT SEND RECEIPTS OR CALL YOU WHEN THEY SPEND IN OUR CASE OVER $600/MONTH. WHEN QUESTIONS ARE ASKED THE REALESTATE AGENT/OWNER BECOMES VER BELIRGENT AND CONDESCENDING. A VERY SCARY SITUATION IF YOU NEED TO KNOW WHERE YOUR MONEY IS GOING AND WHY. HE MAKES MANY PROMISES THAT HE CAN NOT FUFILL.

resp.text:
Ms. Conaway,
We discussed all charges for your units while you were in our program. The majority of those were due to you having pet friendly properties and flee and ticks being a constant issue. We replaced bedding due to complaints of dog hair and dog urine. Also, due to your decision to defer necessary maintenance, we had multiple renter complaints. This is a scary situation as a property management company due to safety and health concerns for our renters. These issues ultimately led to us not being able to keep your units, Sailhouse East and West, in our rental program. We hope that you have gotten the pest situation under control and maintenance complete, and have the besk of luck renting your units in the future.

name: cody crandall
text: Stay away from this company. Very unprofessional

resp.text: White Shores Realty has never done business with this person. Mr. Crandall you called our late night answering service looking for appliances to buy the other night at 10:00. You must have us confused with another person/or company. We don't sell appliances. Hope you have a good day today and we hope you find your appliances.

name: Simply Sophie
text: Awesome Experience!

name: Dawn Smith
text: Awesome place. They even have some of my pool supplies.  Close to my home and I love shopping small business.

name: Micheal Wilson
text: I was the only one in the store got great service the person on duty help me find what I needed pleasant attitude

name: Adam Stevens
text: Great place for bolts screws paint supplies PVC even renting bobcats and skidsteers and they also have a little bit of fishing supplies and crickets

name: Pat Pat
text: Very nice service

name: Cindy Tennimon
text: Rented a uhaul truck, could not have been nicer!!

name: matthew mattson
text: Great people, be sure to check out the turtle and pet the dog 🐕

name: W.R.
text: Great people.  Great service!

name: Jessica Meuse
text: I rented a U-Haul for a move about halfway across the country, and my concerns and questions were all acknowledged and needs were met. Customer service is great here, and I had no issues whatsoever with renting/returning the truck!

name: J. Patrick Smith
text: The staff is friendly. Nice to have a U-haul rental this close to home.

name: Gary Gerhard
text: For a non spiritual person oh, this is the most spiritual place I've ever encountered in my entire life. I've been coming here for 27 years. Each time I go east and west on I-10 no matter what time day or night I stop. if the doors are open I go in. If the doors are closed I write a note put a $20 bill inside and slip it under the door. I can't tell you how many times I've done that at 2 or 3 or 4 in the morning on my way from Houston Texas to Tampa Florida. If you can see the inside of this place please put it on your to-do list. You will know that you're in the presence of something special when you step inside the doors.

name: Jim Hanna
text: All members of the team are Pros.  They've been responsive, knowledgeable, a great sounding board, know the market, and just good people.  I'm sure there are a lot of good agents around the lake, but you can't go wrong with the India Davis Team.

name: Andrew Duckett
text: Sawyer Davis helped us find the perfect lake property for our family.  It was an older cabin that needed some work.  Sawyer was instrumental in helping us come up with an appropriate offer and to close the deal.  He also help us find the right team to renovate the property.  We feel very fortunate to be able to rely on Sawyer's experience and local knowledge through every step of our process.  We are now settled in our home, and could not be happier.  But, I still call on Sawyer from time to time to get his advice on all things to do with Lake Martin!

name: Gregor Nussberger
text: Dealing with the India Davis team is refreshing. They are very professional and responsive. I also like how they embrace new technology to move quickly. I highly recommend them.

name: alanchristianday
text:
Great Site. Seriously,these are the only people you should be talking to if you are interested in Lake Martin.

So friendly and so knowledgeable about so many different aspects of property and life on the lake

name: Rick Graydon
text: This site is well though out, It contains all the elements one wants to see. Sawer you can build my website any day I am jealous of your creative ability's.

name: John West
text: GREAT SITE!!!!!

name: Robert Calhoun
text: I lived in downtown Auburn, renting from Badger Properties.  Without a doubt, it was one of the best rental companies that I have used in Auburn.  Apartment complex was very well maintained.  The atmosphere was quiet, perfect for a serious student.  Also, I loved how convenient it was to walk to central campus and downtown.  I recommend Badger Properties to anyone looking for housing in the Auburn area!!

name: J. Keith Maxwell
text: I stayed in Center Court this summer for a temporary situation. I had top notch service from Chris Kearns and Jason at Badger Properties. I would highly recommend Badger if you're looking for a quiet place to study or just to live. His rental policy is great for older students. Also, the customer service is superb.

name: Amanda Weaver-Laird
text:
My experience with Chris as a landlord and Badger Properties has been nothing short of an excellent experience. I moved to Auburn 2.5 years ago for my job in property management and have only lived on properties that I worked at. When I decided to move away from my student housing property I wanted to move somewhere that was close enough to campus that I could walk for game days, but that wasn't full of young students and this was the perfect place (Park Hill cottage). It was secluded and quiet, but just a walk away from downtown and all the fun that Auburn has to offer. The biggest downfall for this property was that there is no dishwasher (not a huge deal), no washer/dryer (but there is a laundry mat on site and down the street at Thatch Hut) and it has cinder block walls so it gets really cold in the winter.

I made the decision a few months ago to move to another newly renovated apartment that Chris also managed (Broadway Apartments) that were a few minutes farther down the road. I was so excited about the price and the location is still great, a littler farther from downtown but the apartment is so worth it! The renovations that Chris did are great, I love the flooring, paint colors, it had new carpeting and the room and closet sizes are great, it also comes with a (very small) dishwasher and a washer/dryer. The only issue that I have with this apartment is the amount of noise that I can hear from the people upstairs. Maybe keep the dogs on the 1st floor! ;-)

Chris has been a great landlord and I would absolutely recommend him to any serious students or young professionals looking to be in a great place in Auburn.

name: ASHLEY MURPHREE
text: Badger Properties is a diamond in the rough when it comes to realty companies in a college town. During my four years at Auburn, I used four different realtors. Badger Properties was by far the best! Chris, the owner, is a very kind and respectful business owner! He does not allow freshmen to lease at any of the properties, which is great for studying. I lived in the complex on W. Glenn, which was great because I was able to walk anywhere that I wanted to go (including class and the library)! You will not regret renting from Badger Properties!

name: Clay Grisetti
text:
If you need a place to stay in the Auburn area contact Badger Properties. Myself, the best man at my wedding, my sister, and many of my friends have been incredibly impressed with Chris Kearns and his locations.

Extremely fast repair or response time if you need anything. Friendly management that does a great job taking the worry out of renting.

If you enjoy Auburn life you can find Chris around campus, town, and even at Sporting Events across state lines.

My wife and our families have moved away from Auburn now but we have recommended Badger to many students and professionals and everyone has the same thoughts: if you need a place to stay, call Chris at Badger Properties.

name: Ashley L.
text: Probably one of the most humiliating rental experiences I've ever had as a renter. I went to Badger Properties because I read good reviews on Google and had heard generally good things from people. I went to the office in person and told Chris "the badger" my situation. I was just getting out of a 12 month rehab program, and had been working for a Christian Ministry and looking for an apartment in Auburn since I was a student at Auburn University at the time. I was very up front about my bad credit but was working 7 days a week and had many references etc to back up that I was honest and good for the rent every month. After seeing me alone in his office after hours, and asking me to come along (still alone) with him to see one of the properties (still after hours) I agreed because I was desperately in need of an apartment. He took me to an apartment to collect rent from a girl around my age, then he took me to another apartment where he basically showed me a place and then just sort of "visited" with some tenants. Every one seemed to like him, the apartments were pretty nice for how old they are, regardless, I was impressed at the time. We then went back to his office (once again, all happening after business hours) and he gave me an application, but before he did that he sat me down in the seating area of his office. We were completely alone and it was very dimly lit, and the front door was locked. He asked me extremely probing and personal questions about my past drug use. Mind you, I was sober for over a year at this point, active in church (still am) and admittedly hadn't even smoked a cigarette in over a year. He asked me questions like, "So what led you to do drugs?" "what kind of drugs have you tried?" "how did you do your drugs? did you shoot up? snort them?" He just kept asking SO many invasive and frankly, inappropriate questions; it was almost sadistic. I answered them as honestly as possible without divulging too much, because I really needed an apartment, I was impressed by the ones he had shown me and I thought that being as honest as I could would show him that I was a good tenant despite my bad credit, etc. After filling out an application and getting my credit checked through the program he said he uses to run credit (which gave a very vague summary of ones credit) I went back to his office once I had submitted my credit report and application. He said he didn't think he could rent to me because my credit report showed that I was $25k in debt; I explained that those were my student loans and that the program he uses wasn't showing exactly WHAT the debt was, just the amount. He said he couldn't rent to someone who was that far in debt. I explained that I am a student and that those are my student loans. I said, I would get a more in depth credit report and bring it to him. He gave me back my money order with the application fee on it and said to come back with a new credit report. My aunt is a real estate agent and she ran my credit for me, this time I had a complete credit report with every single student loan showing in detail, but because I had now ran my credit twice in one week, my already poor credit score was even lower. Despite that I went back to "the badger" and told him that the large amount of "debt" he saw was indeed my student loans, which were not even in collection because I was still attending Auburn at the time. He said then said he couldn't rent to someone with a credit score as low as mine and with a history like mine (due to my past drug use I had a criminal record. I have not had a single run in with the law in almost 4 years). So all in all, after wasting time, money, energy and being thoroughly humiliated, I would say that Badger Properties only serves those they deem worthy, and they don't believe in giving people second chances, only sadistically probing and dissecting the past of people who have made mistakes despite turning their lives around. A huge waste of time.

resp.text:
After 15 years of running Badger Homes and Badger Properties, I stand by my record of treating all applicants fairly in terms of their qualifications for an apartment.  They area 1) Credit score, from a tenant or direct relative, 2) Academic progress, and 3) good references from their previous landlord.  As stated above, our screening reports DO only show a credit score, they do not show a full report - meaning, we don't know the type of debt.  Our screening criteria is designed to approve or deny based on the SCORE, regardless of the type of debt.

If this dispute ever got serious, *I could produce a chain of emails which would explain and clearly show the reason for Denial*.  There was never any "trade" or "back door" approval process offered, and their never has been since I started the business.  We document every case of approval or denial, so we are ready to defend against accusations such as these.  That is not how we operate.  To have one negative review in 15 years should be evidence of how we do things.  Are we perfect?  No.  But we don't run the kind of business we are being accused of in the allegations above.

On the rehab comment: I can confidently say that we have rented to people coming from / still in rehab programs.  We have also rented to gay, straight, and many different religions and ethnic backgrounds, as well as singles, married couples, singles with kids, and families.  We have rented to people with low credit scores, also, but they must have a direct relative with a qualifying score be screened and sign as a Guarantor for their lease.  Our records are clear on that as well.  The "second score" that was brought to me to qualify was well below our minimum qualification.  We require a 650, the score presented was well below 600.

As stated above, there was not a qualifying score, and possibly not the required academic progress - but maybe
she met that qualification, I honestly do not recall.  We do not search any Applicant's criminal record, only our employees.

As stated above, I DID refund the Application Fee, and provide a true explanation of the reason for denial.  I do not remember asking questions about shooting or snorting drugs - I don't even know enough about drugs to know what that would mean anyway.  I have never even had a beer in my life, which everyone I've known for 41 years can verify.

After hours, most (not all) of the lights are off in our storefront office, and the door is usually locked, but it is a full glass storefront on a busy street full of shoppers - so hardly a threatening or scary place.  I admit I probably asked questions that I didn't officially need to ask, true.  I am sorry if doing so had a worse impact than I expected.

I do remember that the reviewer above and I did go to see an apartment and collect rent from a neighbor, but in most cases our rent is paid online, and has been for years.  I always thought that giving tours after hours and visiting with tenants after hours was a sign of good customer service, not something I would have to defend later.

If an independent auditor surveyed all of our current and previous tenants - male and female - over the last 15 years, they would come up with a conclusion that we are a little slow on maintenance, tough on noise, but that's about it.  If they surveyed everyone that has applied and that we have turned down over the last 15 years, they would find that there was a clear reason for each denial, and it was based on our written requirements of Credit Score, Academic Progress, and References.  That's it.  There is no evil, juicy story to report.

Ashley applied to rent from Badger in Sept 2014 for a Dec 14 opening..  I admit, I could have done better with the questions or the office lighting(?), but I have made no further attempt to contact her or to be in her life in any way beyond the Application period.  I am not sure why in April of 2016 she has decided to bring these accusations/allegations.

name: Jenneffer Fenyes
text: Very friendly and kind staff. Ginger is lovely and was a big help in putting in work orders for my unit, plus helping me to figure out how to change out my air filter.

name: Dave Hunter
text: I have had the pleasure of having this company manage my house for 10 years. They have done a fantastic job of protecting my house and keeping it in great shape. Any needed repairs were dealt with quickly and at a reasonable price.

resp.text: Thanks Dave, we will sure miss talking with you and Sue.

name: Matt Lowther
text: Ginger is AMAZING! I rented for 3 years and I did not regret one day. They were always fair, honest and easy to work with. I highly recommend this company. Thank you Alabama Coastal Rentals! I truly appreciate your service!

name: Dewayne Boatwright
text: Rented for over a year. Very responsive to the very few issues I encountered. Would rent again. Ginger, Melba, and Daniella were great!

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We try to be as responsive as possible.

name: BRITTANY BIG FACE!!!!!!
text: She showed me three houses never got me in one got denied for every single one of them it's not willing to help find you a place to live just want to collect application fee to make money never go here

resp.text: I am so sorry you were not approved.  These properties are all individually owned and those owners have the final say in who they approve.  With such limited inventory, we are getting multiple applications on most homes.  The application fee covers the costs of credit report and processing of application to present to owner. I wish we had another property that was suitable for you.

name: Michael Myers
text: I have to say, for the 2 years I rented with Alabama Coastal Rentals, my experience couldn't have been better. The staff, especially Ginger & Jessica, always went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure I was satisfied with their service. They all have great personality,  great sense of humor, and genuinely care. 5 Stars from me!!!!

name: Lawrencia Ratcliff
text: Great customer service

name: SRB
text:
I would like to thank Ginger for all the hard work she did finding us a house in a HURRY!!
Definitely recommend this company!
Unlike the other rental companies in the area, they answer the phone when I call and they called us back when the were supposed to. She listened to what we wanted and found the perfect house for us to rent. We couldn’t have asked for a better representative. Great job and thank you so much.

name: Gina Bush
text: I have rented from Alabama Coastal Rentals for over 5 years and have had Awesome experience from them.  They helped find me a home that meets my families needs and if anything ever went wrong they immediately came out to get it fixed.  I know they can only do so much with having to get permission from owners before doing anything major, which is understandable.  I love this company and would highly recommend them to my friends or family. Ginger is AWESOME!!! If you need a place to rent or buy Alabama Coastal Rentals is the place to go first.

name: Yuki
text: We've rented from Ala coastal rentals for over 5 years. The staff is like family and always accommodating and friendly. Ginger and Andrea would always be there to assist us. The property was exactly what we needed and we were sad to leave due to relocation.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the nice words.  We hate you had to move.....

name: Elizabeth B.
text: From the time I called with interest in leasing a property from the time I moved out...5 stars all the way! ACR staff was so easy to work with, the owner of the property was very accommodating, simply a great experience! Highly recommend!

name: Roberts Dale
text: My name is Tracy Hidalgo and I have rented from Alabama Coastal Rentals for almost a year.  Unfortunately due to circumstances beyond my control, we are having to break our Lease 3 months early.  I have thoroughly enjoyed my stay and can honestly say that any issue I had was met with promptness and professionalism.  Ginger is awesome and so helpful, as is the entire staff.  They have been the best and I would highly recommend anyone looking to lease in Baldwin County to call Alabama Coastal Rentals.  If my circumstances happen to change, I will be calling them again!  Great homes, great service, and great people.  Two thumbs up!!

name: Lisa Mitchell
text: I personally rent from Alabama Coastal Rentals.  I can honestly say that I have NEVER experienced ANY issues such as the ones described.  I recently had a plumbing issue after hours.  I contacted the owner and within 10 minutes received a call from the plumber.  He (the plumber) was working another call at the time but would call once he was on his way.  My issue was resolved VERY professionally and VERY promptly within 1 1/2 hours.  I have lived in apartment complexes where they would not have handled this issue until the next day!  Our lease is up for renewal this next month.  We plan to renew our lease and continue our relationship with Alabama Coastal Rentals as we are VERY pleased with our experience. ------ A side note------ I have never been asked to pay with cash.  I pay my rent each month with a personal check.

name: Zac Smith
text: The staff at Alabama Coastal Rentals, are very helpful, knowledgeable, and personable. Its a small enough business that you are able to deal with the same people each visit, but also large enough to have a great selection of properties to choose from. Overall they are very helpful, quick, concise, and up front about everything. I will definitely use them again and would highly recommend them in the future.

name: Hannah Turner
text: I would highly recommend renting through Alabama Coastal Rentals! The ENTIRE staff was not only extremely polite they were also "for the people" so to say. They are not just looking to bring in people and their money, Alabama Coastal Rentals cares about you and your needs. The apartments I lived in were built long ago but you would not be able to tell do to great upkeep. I had no problems with broken appliances or any hidden errors you might find the longer you stay at a residence. When I did have a tiny shower leak they were incredibly helpful and not rude. I think sometimes you can go to a front desk/office and tell the workers your issues and they feel a bit attacked as if it is their fault and this causes them to have an attitude which in turn makes them not as dedicated to resolving your problems. This WAS NEVER the case with Alabama Coastal Rentals, they never took insult to any problems and truly were genuine with assisting you and giving the proper help you might have needed. I am unsure if they are a family run business but they most definitely care about you and your stay with them as your own kin would.

name: Gooseman Ducky
text:
Zac..... who are you kidding?? I would love to know WHO there is helpful and knows what they are doing??
There is no way you are talking about the same people. Just like all these other people who wrote there experiences...nothing has changed and nobody there cares about helping folks. I would not use them for anything. Makes you wonder why all the money they take up front has to be cash or money order??

name: Nikki Paxson
text: Rented from this company for a year. Extremely pleasant experience. Never had any issues and only moved because I needed a smaller/cheaper place. They are very easy to work with! Andrea and Ginger both are super sweet! I saw a lot of negative reviews once I moved in and thought "oh no what have I gotten myself into" but at the end of my lease I found if you pay your rent on time, follow rules, take care of the property, and do things the right way when you move out you will have no issues! Received my full deposit back with no trouble whatsoever! It was a pleasure working with y'all. Thank you!!

name: Tayler Johnson
text: If possible, please do not rent from this company. I rented from this company for two years. There were problems after problems. When I moved in, nothing was cleaned. The carpets were VERY disgustingly dirty. The walls had dirt ALL OVER THEM. The outlets were hanging out of the walls. The counter tops had burnt spots all over when we moved in. A couple of months before we moved out we had issues with termites. It took the company three weeks to get somebody out to take care of it. They were more worried about getting the cheapest price than about take care of the problem. The best advice that I can give you is that if you have to rent from this company, take as MANY pictures AS POSSIBLE of when you move in and when you move out. If not, they will find EVERY LITTLE thing wrong to keep your security deposit. Also when you move out, make sure to get Ginger and Clayton's approval of how the carpets look because if they do not approve of it and you spend the money on getting them cleaned, they will hire their own carpet company (family members) to come and reclean them and charge you out of your security deposit...

name: Jane Bruton
text: Very Good service from AL Coastal Rentals.  Ginger and Andrea are professional, knowledgeable and  courteous.  Overall great experience.  Would recommend.

name: amanda davison
text: Amazing Company. Ginger and staff are Phenomenal! I wish all rental companies were as professional and good as Alabama Coastal Rentals.

name: Richard Krebs
text: Rented a house in Summerdale from Alabama coastal rentals for over 4 years, if ever there was a problem in the house  it was handled usually the same day..everytime I called people were friendly and helpful . when I bought my own place and had to move,i want to  give a special shout out to Andrea and Ginger who helped me through all the loose ends of moving out and I can not thank them enough, they were great......you can not go wrong renting any place from Alabama Coastal Rentals  5 stars plus... A+A+A+A+A+

name: Ken Woolard
text: I rent a small apartment from these people in Stockton, AL. We have rented from them for 3 months and they have been very nice and understanding. Few that they are, when a problem has arisen, they were quick to send someone to fix it (even if that problem came up late in the day, it was fixed same day). I would recommend to anyone looking for a place to rent from these guys

name: CTaylor
text: I've rented a few properties from them over the past 10 years and have always received great customer service with any issues I had. Most recently came home on a Saturday night to a major plumbing issue that was fixed within 3 hours of me calling!!!👏👏😁😁

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words,

name: Dan
text: I have rented a home in Lake Forrest from this company for 8 months. The staff was incredibly helpful in helping me to locate a single family home for me and my 2 children and is always pleasant and timely with any issues or concerns that have come up. I couldn't have been more pleased.

name: Anne
text: I had a great experience with this company. They were very nice and understanding. Ms. Ginger is the greatest!

name: Miyuki F.
text: When we first moved to the area they helped us locate a great home in Fairhope! Anytime we needed any maintenance they were very quick to get it done. We appreciate the staff at alabama coastal rentals. Even when we moved out they truly had our backs.

name: Sarah Barrett
text: Great experience and friendly staff. No issues with rental throughout stay. Would use this rental company again.

name: sharon Skoglund
text: You people voting 5 stars that haven't ever trusted them with your money shouldn't be rating them! If you haven't signed or ended a lease with this company your giving opinions not facts about how they do business.

resp.text: I am not sure why you are posting this.  You damaged the house upon vacating.  You did not dispute the charges until the front door that you damaged was not replaced .  The owner compensated the new buyers for the damaged door in their purchase contract for them to take care of in the future. When you took the owners and us to court, the judge did not side with you.

name: Pamela Rawdon
text:
While utilizing the services of Alabama Coastal they spent MY  money to repair a major problem.  They never sent anyone to do the job correctly.  The ceilings were ruined downstairs due to a large leak.  The persons they placed in my property were calling me and screaming about the leak.  I tried to explain that this is the reason one hires a rental company.

Alabama Coastal's work is poor at best.  They also make you sign, as part of your contract. that if the property is sold they receive a real estate commission.  That is fine if you don't have another realtor you choose to use.

name: Megan Marley
text: Great company!  They have found great families to keep my house rented for the last 2 years.

resp.text: Thanks Megan!

name: Amy Hoyt
text: These people are a joke!! No one knows what in the hell is going on, they have a red neck woman that smells like train smoke, foul mouth, with a low cut shirt at the front desk , the agent  says she doesn't know the answer to any of our questions because she has only been there for a few months.... we go in and talk to the so call "Owner" of the company and he is a complete idiot , dresses like the maintenance man and wants to start talking football with us instead of the issues at hand! Would NOT Recommend this place!

name: Steven Wetzonis
text: Great people!  Everyone that I have encountered at alabama coastal rentals has been very friendly and straight forward.  They showed up on time for the showing of the unit and did so with very short notice.  Ginger has been great to work with and we look forward to seeing her everymonth.

name: Jennifer Boone
text: ACR Manages one of our properties for us. We have never had any issue with them. If there has been any issue, they have always called and got permission for repairs and have used owner funds very conservatively. We are happy with their service and the speed and at which they place qualified renters in our home.

name: Amanda Shaw
text: Lived in a unit owned by this company for over one year. The keys we were given did not access the front door. The problem was never fixed. Other problems we reported were addressed within a reasonable amount of time. They were fair with returning our security deposit after we moved out, though it took a very long time (more than two months after moving) to receive it, and several calls from my husband.

resp.text: Our records show that you lived in a property that we manage in Bay Minette. You were the first tenant we placed there and the Owner had not given us a key to the door you are describing - but you had a key to the door that was closest to parking.  We show that you paid full July rent.  We were not aware if you moved out prior to Aug 1.  We show that your deposit check was sent to you Sept 14th (45 days).  I am sorry that you were disappointed with your move-out. We wish you the best in your new home.

name: Billy Brown
text: Great staff I have known the owners for years and operate with honesty and integrity. Great inventory to choose from and great for new people on the area

name: Paul Turner
text:
I've leased property through these guys for about 3 years with zero issues.

Any time something fails and needs repair they send a service guy almost immediately. I appreciate they take issues so seriously and respond like they do...I give them a 10 out of 10.

name: cedric goines
text: Ginger has to be the hardest working person in Baldwin County! Whenever we had any issues, no matter what time of day, she was there to help. From what i hear, she does this for everyone. I rented from Alabama Coastal for two years and can honestly say that we didnt have any problems at all.

name: Hewitt Ballard
text: This is a great company. I have used them for 6 years.

name: Samantha Lynn
text: Awesome place to rent from

name: Jasmine Hopper
text: Rhonda gaskins is an amazing women! She has sold 2 of my homes. She made it such an easy experience. I've been so at ease knowing she has been the one to sell my homes. She has answered all of my questions and been available anytime to talk.  Next time I  look for a home in the area she will definitely be the one to call. If your looking to buy or sell i highly recommend rhonda gaskins at Century 21 lake area reality. She has your best interest in mind!

name: Anne Vallely
text: Our Alabama Realty Contingency Law clause does not protect you but Rhonda was instrumental in getting my money back!  I am very grateful for her perseverance.

resp.text:
We have had many conversations about this since  your property fell out of contract on the sale.  As I stated many times, this was a real estate commission rule and not my own the following has been copied from the real estate commission’s website.
790.X.3.03 paragraph 5 states -If for any reason the transaction is not consummated, or if for any reason there is a disagreement involving to whom trust funds should be disbursed, the qualifying broker shall not disburse any trust funds except pursuant to a written agreement signed by all parties or pursuant to a court order.

name: Glyna Humm
text: If you need to find a great home on the lake - Lake Area Realty is the place to start. Rhonda Gaskins knows the area better than any realtor and can help you find the perfect home.

name: Bruce McClendon
text: House hunting made easy.

name: melvin brazier
text: Con man!!!! Do not trust!!!!

name: Melissa Cooper
text:
CJ is un cooperative, unprofessional and does not handle pressure well. Wastes a lot of a person's time.

Response: not true. I was able to secure a source to verify my rental. I was in process of sending you all documents that I received this Morning and as I was doing the email. Your meltdown came across.

resp.text: I am sorry you feel this way. I feel my time was wasted since I sent you the rental requirements prior to your application coming in and you knew that you did not meet the requirements. We wish you the best of luck with your home search.

name: Timtimtimtim Timtimtim
text: I THINK I RODE BY ON MY BIKE BUT I'M. SURE THEY BE GOOD

resp.text: Why thank you! I'm not sure how we served you, but we are always happy to help in any way we can.

name: Scott Edwards
text: Excellent team of professionals who go out of their way to provide great service!

name: Austin and Britney Parker
text: Great people,  have done business with Kristal, Dianne, and Gloria and all were fantastic

name: Robert Long
text: Have tried to contact this place no response from anybody I think they have closed the business down.

name: Liberty Crane
text: We would not recommend, ever.

name: Austin and Britney Parker
text: Great people you can trust!

name: Denny Cole
text: Beautiful place to visit for great business

name: Harper Puckett
text: If you’re renting in Troy, please try to rent through them. I have never had a single problem. They’re responsive, they’re helpful, they’re understanding, and they’re compassionate. These qualities are so rare with landlords. I can’t think of a single problem to write about them. The apartment was well cared for and any issue I stated was fixed, usually that day. I wish my landlord in my current city was half as great as they were to rent through. I wish I found them at the start of my college experience instead of using anyone else in Troy. I moved out of my BlueKey property and broke my lease to live with them, and it was the best decision I could’ve made. They were absolutely a joy to rent through because I never worried about a thing in my whole time there. I genuinely knew I could ask them for anything!! If I could give them more than 5 stars, I would in a heartbeat.

name: David Pouncey
text: Best Reality service in the area. They are dedicated to helping you in finding that perfect property or in selling your property quickly. The staff is the friendliest and most personable in town. Five star!

name: Rebecca Byrd
text: Excellent company to rent from. Sarah Little is amazing and does everything she can to work with you as a tenant. Rebecca, her assistant, is also amazing.

resp.text: Well thank you maam! Its been a pleasure working with you too!

name: Sarah Little
text: Love the historic office and the wonderful people that work here.

name: Tim Holcomb
text: Absolutely a pleasure we had working with Cathy. She covers all the bases, and made our experience a great kne with no bumps in the road. HIGHLY RECOMMEND HER!

name: Julie Brown
text: Cathy was such a pleasure to work with from the beginning to the end. She was professional and very friendly. She helped us every step of the way! I highly recommend Cathy. She is such a wonderful agent and an amazing person. I truly loved getting to know her and consider her to be a great new friend.

resp.text: It was my pleasure!  I feel the same way.  You are going to be a great addition to our community and I'm so glad I will be able to see you around town.  I can't wait for us to get together.

name: Tracy Hall
text: I listed with Lake Weiss Alabama Reality and I closed on my lake house in just 4 months, and got more money than I expected. Cathy and her group made selling a house seem so easy! Everyone was very professional and at the same time they made me feel like I was a part of the family! I trusted them to handle my selling needs and they did! I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to list your beautiful lake house!  It was a pleasure working with you.  I wish you the very best in the future and hope our paths cross again.

name: Garnet Staton
text: Cathy always goes the extra mile to get the sale done while remaining positive and cheerful.    Her honesty and integrity along with her energy are just without equal.  Would definitely work with her again.

name: Tom Mclemore
text:
Cathy has been our realtor for years and more important a good friend.
Nobody knows the Weiss Lake properties like Cathy. She and her team reach way beyond Cherokee county to buyers from all over the country.
List with Cathy and you'll get the best price for your home and service second to none.

resp.text: Thank you Tom for the kind words and friendship!  Serving my neighbors, my community and those new to our area is a joy.

name: Donna Brombacher
text: Cathy sold our home while Covid restrictions were in place; she was professional and very supportive as she answered our questions throughout the process. We couldn't be more pleased with Cathy and her team!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you both!

name: Gene Parsons
text: Cathy always goes out of her way to help you.

name: George Kastanias
text: Cathy Is a very professional agent. We worked with her for over a year to find the perfect house and she never gave up. Together we found the house that we will retire in and stay in forever.

resp.text: It was my pleasure working with you and putting you in the perfect home. I truly have enjoyed every step and gained lifelong friends!

name: Rich Cole
text: Cathy Griffeth sold our Lake Weiss home and we are extremely happy with her service. She kept us informed of every phase of the sell and took care of a lot of details beyond what would be expected of an agent. We were not living in the home or the area and she looked after many important details for us. I highly recommend her.

name: Jennifer Hampton
text: Great job getting out house sold

resp.text: Thank you!  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Joie Lister
text: Helpful and friendly would use them again

name: Allen Baker
text: Cathy Griffeth is the best. if you are looking for a house or lot , give her a call she spent the time to help me look at several different properties before I found the one I wanted also helped me determine if it was a good deal for me or not .

name: Amber Bell
text: Cathy was a joy to work with! She got the deal done in record time! Went above and beyond with personal care.We would highly recommend using Cathy if you are looking to buy or sell in the Cherokee County area.

name: Melinda Hester
text: Cathy Griffeth found the perfect house for us in March. I love it more everyday. She understood,and listened to what we wanted. The price was perfect,the neighbors are wonderful. Its only7 min. From the lake. So easy to pack the boat,and go fishing. Alabama is so beautiful that we fell in love. Cathy goes above and beyond. She helped us through the whole process.

name: ClaytonandChristy Thompson
text: Luxury at its best

name: Philip Puryear
text: Zero service, did not return my call.

name: Mark Collins
text: Best realtor on Weiss Lake Alabama

name: Kerry Devose
text: So I asked what's the requirements before I fill out an application and they said its up to the agent. I asked was it a certain credit score I have to have and the lady told me no. So now 4 days later I called to check on my application and they told me that I'm $93k behind on child support which is not true. I don't owe child support then they go on to say you got to have a 650 credit score. I said well I asked what the requirements are before I did the application. Well the phone said click. Not just that, they wouldn't give me my check studs back. Application fee scam

name: Abby Cook
text: After renting one of Tom West's properties for 2 years, I can say I've had a great experience overall. They made it very easy to go look at any of their properties initially and were quick to get everything situated with a lease, especially since I was out of state at the time. I found a wonderful little home that was a little older, but anything that came up was handled promptly with good communication. Alyson and Tabitha both have always been nothing but helpful and friendly throughout my 2 years. Really appreciate them and would rent from them again in the future!

name: amy Elliott
text: I wanted to look at a commercial property for rent. I went to get the keys from their Office to let myself in and there was an obstruction in the key hole. They said they would call me as soon as it was fixed. They never called. I was suppose to be top of the list to see it so I was told. Just not good business.

name: Kim Nunley
text: Mr West is a very professional and sincere person.

name: Ashley McGee
text: Allyson Powell was so helpful with selling our house and purchasing another one. She was very easy to deal with and handled all the details! I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.

name: FL Coast
text:
Loved working with TWC!   They have a wonderful, friendly office and staff.  Alyson Powell is beyond helpful and always goes above and beyond for her customers.  She is very knowledgeable about the Dothan area and puts her customers interests first.
If you are looking for a realtor you can trust, look no farther than Mrs. Powell.

name: Kayley McCall
text: If I could give zero stars I would. The townhouse was disgusting upon moving in and the list of things I asked to be fixed was ignored. If anything broke it took weeks to get it fixed. The dumpster stayed piled with trash and there were used feminine products laying out where I was expected to walk to throw my trash away. They came into my house on multiple occasions without any notice. The women in the office have terrible attitudes and are absolutely no help. If you're thinking about using Tom West, DON'T!

name: Jermaine Dawsey
text: It's a pretty good company to rent from

name: Sheaba Griffin
text: It seems to me that he only rents to the middle class and upper class white folks! Not only are his staff rude, but unprofessional! And it seems that they don't rent to people that work and make a honest living, your credit shouldn't be the only qualifying factor in renting from this company! But it is, not to mention being African American.

name: Scarlett Vinson
text: My husband and I have been renting with Tom West since March of 2016. From the beginning, the women that work there were very short and snooty with us, especially a young girl that worked at the front at the desk with short brown hair. Her nose was so far in the air, I don't even know if she knew what earth looked like. I got the vibe of "I'm better than you". No one is better than anyone no matter how much money you make, or what you wear, or what you do for a living. We haven't really had that many issues except a few. First of all, we own a dog. A well trained amazing dog. When we saw the house at first, the carpet was terrible. There was a huge black stain on the carpet in the living room and it was coming up at the seams in some places. You could tell the carpet was cheap and old and quite frankly plain nasty. They (owners/tom west) refused to replace the carpet because we had a dog. Also, the kitchen tile was terrible and in some places of the house, you could tell needed to be replaced. Second, We called Tom West a couple months back about a bed bug infestation. When we moved in, we had noticed little bugs a few places, but in the lease agreement, it stated we were to take care of pest control, not realizing they were bed bugs. We did not have bed bugs at our apartment and had verification from the previous landlord. We never called until about a year later when we couldn't get rid of them and they refused to pay to get them removed after we had tried just about everything. Its laughable now because we are moving out and they are still going to have to pay to remove them. Also, in the moving out procedures, you have to pay to get the carpet cleaned. They want me to have that cheap, stained carpet to get professionally clean knowing they are probably going to remove it anyways. We brought our newborn into this home thinking this could be our home for a bit, and now we are moving out 7 months later because it's just what's best. Over all, I would say the company is ok, but pick them last if you have to. When I rent again, they will be last on my list of companies to go through just mainly because of customer service and not taking care of their customers the way it should be and maybe it has a lot to do with the owners of the property as well in which case they need to be realistic as well.

name: Donna Harbert
text: I've never been so upset at one company in my entire life. I rented a home that was left in wonderful condition! 1 small repair and 1 blind was all that I had trouble taking care of before I left. I asked the front clerk the day I was turning my keys in if I could purchase a new pair of blinds and drop them off or even borrow the key to replace them myself because I wanted to do the right thing... she so RUDELY told me she would have to charge me another day. As a customer coming to you and WANTING to do the right thing, I was beyond upset to know this was so rudely handled. My security deposit that was mailed to me is literally NOT EVEN a quarter of what I paid up front because of the "repairs & blinds installment" I was charged for. I will never ever again deal with this scam company who rips people off and so rudely present themselves to their customers. I also will never recommend them. If you pay a security deposit with them and leave them with a decent home as when you moved in, don't expect your deposit back. They will find "repairs" to get you with. Completely & utterly disgusted with this company. Worst in Dothan.

name: Cornelius Clark
text: Tom West is probably one of, if not,  the biggest company in the Dothan area when it comes to renting or buying homes in the area. For starters the customer service in the main office is by far the WORST I have ever dealt with. Everyone is short and snobby especially the females that work at the front desk. I was renting one of their properties for close to 5 years. I travel a lot with my job and that was the only reason I stayed there so long. When I moved in I immediately had issues with things that were suppose to be done but wasn't. Had issues with things breaking and not working properly. It took forever to get some one out to take care of the issues. Then I move out and I have to get the carpets cleaned and provide a receipt only to be told that the carpets weren't good enough and they would have to have the company they use to come out and clean it again and charge it to me. They will not do a walkthrough inspection with the tenant before moving out. Then as I expected, my $575 security deposit is taken for painting the townhouse, so called repairs and cleaning. I paid to have the place cleaned as well but they have no plans on returning your security deposit. They make up whatever they can with no explanation. Just a horrible company to work with and I would NEVER recommend to anyone..Avoid at all cost. I notice all the 1 star reviews with the one 5 star review...that had to be a mistake!!! If I could give 0 stars I would!!!!!

name: Brooke Kelley
text: Horrible customer service. They do not take care of their properties or rental customers. We were told upon moving in to do a walk through and make a list of things that were wrong. We did, and we took pictures and gave them a list of about 15 issues we noticed. We rented a property from them for a year and in that year they fixed one thing off our list. Upon moving out we followed all procedures listed in our rental agreement. Most of the things on our list upon moving in we were charged for when moving out!!!! On top of that they made things up along the way in order to keep our initial deposit of $1150.00. They said that the property had leaks, mold and that we didn’t turn in the keys and garage door opener all of which was untrue. We did not receive ANY of our deposit back plus they tried to tell us we owed an additional $500 +! When we called to tell them to take it out of the deposit they kept they informed us that it was over and beyond that. Then they changed their story to say that when we didn’t turn in our keys(which we did) that we forfeited our security deposit?! When we asked what the additional money was for we also got a different story every time we called....first it was for removal of items(we left hangers 🙄) then it was for carpet cleaning....call me crazy but last time I checked neither of these cost 1600 dollars! They then sent us invoices that they had that they said we were being charged for cleaning fees???! Entire house was cleaned and left in better shape than when we moved in. Funny thing being, the three invoices they sent for the work done which was all minor cleaning around the house didn’t even total 500.....do not rent from these lying thieves that cannot keep their stories straight!!!!
