text: Under new management. The new owners/management are really cleaning Pine Tree Estates up and have made alot of changes.

name: Brad Smith
text: Many improvements since new owners took over.  Warm and family friendly environment.

name: Shannon Tyson
text: Good

name: Kody George
text: Donna Lushington is the best realtor in town! She helped my wife and I buy our first home and made us feel welcomed and loved. We did most of the process remotely from Alaska and only spent one weekend actually in T-town looking at homes. Donna was our eyes and ears here in town and made the process easy. She had great recommendations for ways to make the process go smoother and helped us find a wonderful home. Couldn't recommend her highly enough! Thank you Donna and the Hamer team!

name: Carolyn Williams
text:
I have used Katherine Manderson to sell two homes and to purchase two homes, and I will never use anyone else because of my experience with her!  When purchasing my new homes, Katherine anticipated what my family and I needed and didn't stop until she found us home that was the perfect fit. Maybe an even better testament to her work is the fact that she has kept me from "jumping the gun" or settling for a home that wasn't the right fit, and this level of guidance and professionalism is priceless!
When selling homes through her, she makes the entire process easy and stress-free — from the listing and showing to inspection and negotiation to closing. Being a professional, single mom who travels regularly for work, this means the world.  To say Katherine goes above and beyond would be an understatement. I can't recommend anyone more highly!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your praise Carolyn. Katherine is very special and we always love to hear about one of our agents doing a great job.

name: R G
text: We rented with Hamner recently for about a year and a half and my experience with them is very positive. They respond to maintenance requests quickly and are very professional in their communications. I recommend them to anyone in the Tuscaloosa area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We hope we can be of service to you in the future.

name: Allyson
text: Jacob Hines was the BEST agent for us! We couldn’t have found our perfect home without his awesome help and advice!

name: CampHorne Staff
text: Very informative

name: Claudia L Murphy
text: I hired Wes York and never met him face to face. Instead he assigned me someone on his team who didn't have a lot of experience as a seller. For all the hype I had heard, I was sorely disappointed: I expected a more personal relationship, an open house showing, and suggestions that didn't include a firesale offer.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Murphy, Thank you so much for reaching out to us. We really appreciate feedback of all kinds! We are sad to hear that you were not thrilled with your service from Wes and we are going to reach out to you to make it right.

name: Billy Helmandollar
text: Enjoyed our experience with our agent.  She made our house buying journey pleasurable.  Thank you Anna Kay Springer.

name: Mary Baugh
text: Wow, the most rude, pretentious, obnoxious people I ever met! Ann Spring... whatever her name is. She's a horrible beast who plays games and tries to destroy your chance to sell your house if you don't choose her. With her horrible attitude it's better to just avoid Hamner all together. She's suppose to be this amazing agent? Then why would she quote a house for nearly $100 thousand less than it's worth?!? Just to be a petty child, that's why! If you're in a situation where you need 2 quotes to establish value, don't pick this woman/group! She also calls classic vehicles, dilapidated junk, so she has no idea of value. God forbid she sees your house while you're packing. The mess packing makes, to her, means you are just beneath her! I've never met a more horrific person in my entire life! I hope to save you the drama of Agent Ann!

resp.text: Ms. Baugh, we are so very sorry to hear that our performance was disappointing to you. Please contact our office, 205-345-0654, to let us know what we can do to remedy this situation. As always, we are at your service and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Ernest Ragdale
text: Caitlyn Tubbs took my wife and I to more homes, some more than once, than should be legally allowed. She was a true professional thru all of it.

name: jack griffith
text: Great company! Great group of people to work with!

name: Thomas Karrh
text: Kind people

name: Peri Finkel
text: I spoke to to an agent named marrisa because people were parking in my parking places that are rightfully mine and that I pay 200 dollars for a month and she was so incompetent and she spoke to my father and kept telling him to change his attitude and lower his voice and she never even got it towed not to mention she hung up on him .I'm very unsatisfied.

name: Casey Benefield
text:
Also known as RealtyNet...

Finally got a mutual release out of this RealtyNet brokered home purchase deal (I was going to be the buyer).

If you buy a house where this guy is the agent, be SURE to get a GOOD home inspector...Ours highlighted some potential discrepancies in the listing. It's definitely good money spent to use Timberline Inspections, though we felt misled by the MLS listing (regardless of accuracy of the questionable date).

Hardwoods? Yeah, vinyl hardwoods.
Built 2008? Yeah, with 90's floor tile, 1999 HVAC and water heater, and central vacuum.
Gas fireplace? That utility wasn't on for the inspection.

I told my agent that we will not be buying any home where Mr. Welch/RealtyNet is the agent after the experience, foot dragging, and attitude that this broker exhibited toward us.

I tried HARD to convince my significant other to look past it all, but the seller's Realtor, is what made this sale fall through. We would have accepted the counter repair if it weren't for that.

name: Andy Clark
text:
I have used Jill twice now and I am currently using her for the third time. They say that repeat customers who sing your praises is the most sincere and highest form of affirmation of a job well done. Well Jill gets the job done very well every time! The first time I used Jill I was in the buyer position. She was always quick to respond, showed me everything that met my needs and was always on time and communicated with me very well. She was able to secure me the first showing in a competitive market and helped me structure a offer that landed me my new home amongst many other offers. Then due to fortunate circumstances (married my sweetheart) I was needing to sell my house less than a year later. Jill helped me get the house staged and advised me perfectly on how to get top dollar for my home. Jill worked harder than any agent I have seen she even enlisted her husband to help. In the first weekend she had gotten over 60 showings lined up! I had 20 offers and walked away with $19k over ask!

I cannot say enough about Jill. I think she is a constant professional who has her finger on the pulse of the market and will never steer you wrong. She has the patients of Job showing you homes and answering your questions. She is creative and understanding when helping you structure deals or choose between offers. Jill will shoot straight with you and help keep you centered when your  emotions (inevitably) get involved.

My wife and I are currently as I am writing this review are using Jill to find a home for our new blended family. The funny thing is Jill has worked with my wife before and was fantastic with her as well.

There is no better agent than Jill. She knows the market, the agents, and will work hard to learn you, and your needs. All I can say is book a meeting with her now, you cannot go wrong with her as your agent!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Andy.  I have so enjoyed getting to work with you and your sweet family.  Clients like yourselves make real estate so rewarding to me!

name: kathy norris
text:
We have tried selling our home several times over the past 8 years.  We never had success until Jill Fleck was our realtor. Her strong work ethic and endless energy are a recipe for success. She had our home sold within 5 days. The whole process was a breeze.

I must say what stands out for me the most is the way Jill represents her client(s). She doesn’t hesitate to speak up and take action on behalf of her buyers/sellers. She is an incredibly strong advocate and that is exactly what you want from your realtor.

I highly recommend Jill Fleck... I can’t say enough good things about her!

resp.text: I so appreciate the kind words Kathy.  I'm so glad I could help you and John with the sale of your home.  Congratulations again on your new home.  Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else.

name: Mindy Sommers
text: Jill is a wonderful realtor!  She helped us find our perfect forever home in the ideal location and negotiated the best price and contract.  She was very patient with us as we toured several homes and walked with us through every step of the home buying process.  We will be using Jill for any future real estate needs and highly recommend her for your real estate needs.

resp.text: I so appreciate the kind words Mindy.   I'm so glad I could help you and your sweet family with your new home.  Looking forward to our next closing in the not so distant future.

name: Kyle Lynch
text: Jill helped my wife and I find our first home together and the experience couldn't have been any better. She was there with us every step of the way and continuously offered guidance as this was our first home. We were very happy with the entire experience and highly recommend her!

name: April Showers
text: You can't go wrong with Jill as your realtor. She's tireless, professional, and super knowledgeable. She always picks up the phone when you call and she always has the answer you need - and if she doesn't, she'll get it for you right away. She works super hard and puts her clients first. She will always be my go-to realtor!

name: Nathan Kirkpatrick
text: Jill was incredibly friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and hard-working. We thoroughly enjoyed working with her and getting to know her, and she was very loyal and dedicated to helping our family 100%. We are very grateful for her and she has our highest recommendation!

resp.text: Thank you Nathan for your kind words!  I throughly enjoyed helping you and your sweet family with your new home.  Wishing you and your family wonderful times in your new home and praying for great memories to be made there!

name: Randy Blythe
text: Jill was very knowledgeable, helpful, and prompt even though she was undergoing some health issues. I couldn't have chosen a better person to help sell my house. I would recommend her without hesitation.

resp.text: Thank you for your sweet words!  I’m happy to say I’m back at full speed now and 100%.  Loved working with you and helping you get your home SOLD so quickly!

name: Doug A
text: Jill did an outstanding job of walking us through the entire process of selling our home. She was not only very professional, but she was very helpful at recommendations on things we could do to make our home more attractive to potential buyers. In the end, we had 20 showings on the first day the house was on the market and had a fantastic contract the next morning. We couldn’t have been more pleased with the entire process! Jill is an outstanding agent and we’d highly recommend her to anyone selling their home!

name: Adrienne Dowhan
text: Jaime Lyon Cooper of Exit Realty was incredible to work with.  She listed my home as "coming soon" and then sold it the first day that it hit the market for full price.  I have bought and sold a lot of real estate and this is the first time I've gotten a full price offer and on day one!  She was also extremely helpful in the purchase of our new home.  She is the most responsive realtor I've ever worked with, immediately responding to us no matter the issue.  I would recommend her to anyone buying or selling and would work with her again in a heart beat!

name: Consuelo Marshall
text: Stacy Sloan, Exit Realty, did an excellent job working with us to sell our townhouse. Everything from the posting of our property on line to the closing, she executed with enthusiasm and great attention to detail.  We moved across the county before the property sold and Stacy kept the ball rolling and communicated all the details to us. We highly recommend Stacy to anyone selling their property on the Eastern Shore.

name: Sarah Waddell
text: Renee Marshall is the tops in Baldwin County! She goes beyond the clock and the job description to get the transaction complete --  and exceeds both parties' expectations. I currently hold an active real estate license in another state, and I'm incredibly impressed with Renee's professionalism, knowledge and communication. Renee has been a huge part of our successful transition to our new community. Thanks Renee and Exit Realty!

name: Melinda Bruscato
text: Jaime made the process seamless, again!  We have used her in the past and highly recommend her to everyone!  Thank you, again, Jaime Cooper and Exit Realty Lyon Fairhope!!

name: Steven Chance
text: Exit Realty Lyon worked hard and was very knowledgeable on how to sell our house.  I chose them because how fast several house they list in our neighborhood sold very quickly.  I recommend them to anyone considering selling their house.

resp.text: Thank you Steven for our good review! We appreciate your business. remember to tell your family & friends about EXIT Realty Lyon when thinking of selling, buying, or just if they have real estate questions... we are a full service resource company;-)

name: Sandy Dulion
text:
They were very professional and hard working team
Loved them.

name: Ricky Louis
text: Everyone there is incredibly nice!! Jenny and Diane are AMAZING!!!

name: Susan Fonger
text: Diane Martino and Jenny Carr are a terrific team - professional, dedicated, and smart. Their enthusiasm and experience are evident in all that they do. I enjoy doing business with them!

name: Tom Aiken
text: Dianne Martino and Jenny Carr are a power team.  They know Fairhope.  You will not get better customer service.  Trust me.

name: Ridge Fell
text: Diane Martino & Jenny Carr are the definition of Hustle. If you need to sell FAST for the most $$, you must call them!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for letting us know what a good job our agents Diane & Jenny did! And remember - they are never too busy for your referrals:-)
Sue Lyon - Broker/Owner
EXIT Realty Lyon - Fairhope

name: Trey Davis
text: Jaime is a top notch realtor

name: Svetlana Pavunko
text: Lacey Valdez who currenttly works for Exit Realty Lyon Fairhope was our realtor for the recent purchase of our vacation house in Foley. We know Lacey back from Colorado where she was my realtor for several years, have purchased and sold two properties for me. With this recent purchase Lacey performed 5 transactions in total for us. She always delivers the best service. Her professionalism, responsiveness,  kindness, rediness to help in any way she can makes your real estate experience pleasant and hassle free. She works really hard to make sure you are completely satisfied. With our vacation house she went above and beyound her primary responsibilities as real estate agent. Since we were not physically present to see our house built, Lacey was communicating and negotiating with builder and financial institution, scheduling and rescheduling inspections. She made numerous trips to the construction site taking photos and videos of work in progress on our house. She organized Zoom meetings and conference calls. She did 2 walk through with builder for us. She is our favorite REALTOR. If you  hire Lacey as your realtor, she will not disappoint. She is a great asset for the company. Thank you so much!

name: Kevin Allen
text: Nice size units Very expensive!

name: G W
text: Brea Ingram is an amazing realtor. She works tirelessly, is very knowledgeable and is a great business woman. She is very honest and she cares about helping you find your forever home.

name: Jim McAlister
text: Brea Ingram was great in finding us a beautiful house.  This is the person to contact to buy or sell.

name: CYNTHIA DAVISON
text: Love them..Late Mr.Hollis blessed us to lease at last minute then made room for us...miss him...his children are nice too.

name: dcasey
text:
Wade helped us sell our home in Hoover, Al. We listed our house in late November and had a contract by mid-December. Our buyers had a contingency (to close on their home)  but we still closed by end of January (so from listing to closing was just 2 short months)!
Everything went as smoothly as one   could expect.
Wade expertly answered every question (texts, emails and phone calls) promptly.
We especially appreciate Wade's patience and that he communicated with us every step of the way.
Wade is pro who offers excellent advice and really cares about his clients.

name: Jay Clyce
text: I have been in the mortgage business for 5 years (2019).  This is a great real estate broker business.  I highly recommend Wade Dollar.  He cares about your well-being, is professional and wants to make sure you find what your wanting.  Smart guy.  Call Wade TODAY!

name: Rebecca Conner
text: Great office with friendly people. Michael Dollar is a wonderful realtor. Call him today if you are ready to buy or sell a home.

name: LaToya Avery
text:
In the beginning I was a little worried because I hadn’t gotten any information leading up to the trip. I called a week before and the information was sent to me. I was told I would get one parking pass and that I couldn’t purchase another, but later found out from another guest that they were able to purchase was one. We had to pay $25 to park a few miles away in some random lot. When arriving, we weren’t given a gate code, so we called to get it, but there was a line of cars behind us and that was little embarrassing. The code didn’t work, but a guy came to let us in the gate. When using the code later, it still wasn’t working, but the guy happened to be there again.

When getting inside the condo, it was AMAZING! Very, very clean!!

resp.text: LaToya, we are so sorry there was some confusion getting your information to you for your vacation. It looks like the number we had on file for you was not a mobile number, and we do a lot of this communication via text. But we are so glad you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Susan Perry
text: We stayed in Unit # 1102 at the Tidewater Condos in Orange Beach AL from 3/1-3/26/21. We loved it here & the condo was perfect. It was very well kept up & stocked with plenty of cooking supplies & linens for all 6 of us to feel comfortable during our stay. The view is awesome for both sunrises & sunsets from the living room & master bedroom! The doorwall to the master bedroom was not functional due to replacement parts for the door track being ordered when we arrived. We can't wait to return next year & have already booked our trip!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Susan! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life and your time at Tidewater. We were so grateful to be able to host you for your beach vacation! Our team is so excited to host you again next year!

name: Melissa Cornett
text: On arrival, we had a lot of difficulty obtaining parking spot for our party  of 12. Apparently, Liquid Life only allows 1 regular parking place and 1 over flow for a 12 person condo. Next, once we entered the condo, the hot tub was disgusting brown ( we weren’t able to use it the entire stay), after the hot tub maintenance guy came, he i formed us the it needed to be drained and cleaned. Which would have to be scheduled. Our bracelets for entering the condo and grounds, we received 3 for 12 people, the kitchen sink was literally falling from under the counter ( maintenance was able to repair), the refrigerator wouldn’t stay cool (even after being serviced), the ice maker wouldn’t stay working. We paid $3,000+ for our 3 night stay and will NEVER BE BACK!!! Even after all the issues we had, we were never offered any amount of refund or retribution. I think this would be a minimum of pleaseing the guests that have dealt with all the problems of trying to enjoy the property that was falsely advertised! Please, take heed and pass this condo! It literally ruined the first 2 days of our family vacation!!

name: John Nowlin
text: We stayed at Four Winds in Orange Beach,Unit 103. Unit was nicely decorated, wonderful views of the beautiful gulf, 93 steps from condo door to sand.....perfect! It was just my husband and I for a 4 night stay. Unit sleeps 4, however, 2 things caught my attention. #1 Unit needs a bigger mirror in bathroom or full size mirror placed in hall.#2 we only had 2 wash clothes (4 towels was fine),which prompted washing towels everyday. Suggestions would be 4 wash clothes/4 towels. Other than that, it was a perfect location for our get-away!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, John! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Four Winds. We will be sure to pass these suggestions along to the owner and our housekeeping team. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Tracy
text:
We have actually stayed here before. I didn’t realize it until after I booked it and saw my own review!! We really enjoyed our stay!!!
Positives: great location, easy check in and check out. Beautiful condo, smart tv, great experience.

Negatives: small room bed mattress was hard and bed squeaked, no hand soap or soap for the shower. There was one roll of toilet paper for each bathroom and it was on the roll!!. These are just basic things to have… soap, toilet paper. The pool is small and didn’t feel inviting.

Having said all of that, I would stay there again. The price was right and beautiful condo. We enjoyed our stay.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Tracy! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We will be sure to pass along your suggestions to the owners and the correct teams. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Chasity Blevins
text: We rented through Liquid Life for the first time.  We had never been on vacation in Alabama.   Initially when calling, (Alex, i think) was very professional and answered all of my questions.  I called back 3 times with additional questions before we booked and he was still very professional.   When we arrived at the 3:00 p.m. check in, our condo was not yet ready.  We were not given a time frame, just said that we would get a text when it was ready.  An hour later we received the text that the condo was ready.  I was aggravated at first then realized how long it would take to clean that condo once we got in.  I would suggest moving check in to 4:00 p.m.  I did really like that we only needed a code to get in and checked in directly at the condo. We stayed at Blue Water (1504).  It had an amazing view.  Everything we needed to cook.  The kitchen was fully stocked.  All of the beds were comfortable and the condo was clean.  Convenient shopping and grocery very close by.  The only 2 issues were the toilet in the master bath was loose.  Was afraid we were going to fall off.   There was a really dirty chair in living room.  No one sat in it.  It may need steam cleaned or thrown out.   Even with these minor issues I am still giving 5 stars because Liquid Life was really easy to work with and answered all of our questions.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Chasity! We are so glad our team was able to help you with your stay and that you enjoyed your vacation. We will be sure to pass along the message about the toilet and chair to the owners. Thank you!

name: Andrew Michael
text: I stayed at Phoenix VIII and it was the nicest and cleanest rental I had been to. It felt like I was the first person to ever stay there. Additionally, the management was extremely friendly and helpful. Despite the large quantity of people staying at Phoenix VIII, it was maintained incredibly well and everything was super smooth including checking in checking out. Overall it was just no hassle and super relaxing and super clean, which is important to me.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Andrew! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Monika Wierdl
text: We love the condo, the location and convenience. The only improvement we would recommend would be to have a light blocking curtain since the pool is right outside the window and once the lights are on everybody can see in. Also, the cleaning personnel should check all dishes, utensils for cleanliness. A small soap in the bathroom just for use at arrival would be also nice.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Monika! We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Unfortunately, we do not control the pool or any other amenities at your complex (the building HOA itself does that), but we will be sure to pass along your suggestions!

name: Stacie Reed
text: Summerchase #406 Enjoyed our week even though the wind was so strong. However there needs to be more towels, especially face cloths for the amount of time a tenant is staying. 2 washcloths per bathroom for 5 days is not enough. Need to provide better soap and shower gel. The washing machine leaked water out the front door to the front balcony. Even though we dealt with a few mishaps the company responded quickly and were very professional. Decent kitchen items also. No Internet was a problem for us also.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Stacie! We are glad you enjoyed your stay even with this. The internet is handled by the actual building itself, but I will be sure to pass along your other suggestions to our housekeeping and maintenance teams. We hope to see you again at the beach!

name: HELEN LEW
text: Booked Turquoise 1501D early February 2021 for 4 families. Received a call just 5 weeks before our July stay that the owner needs to make repairs and fix granite in the condo. Four families out of a place to stay to be told “no worries” by Madison/Ann with Liquid Life. We spent hundreds to thousands of dollars on a baseball event in orange beach to now be without a place to stay. They can not accommodate us for those dates and refuse to email me back with the reason for the cancellation. DO NOT book through this company!!!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Helen, we are incredibly sorry this is happening during your stay. Unfortunately, we had not control over the owners scheduling this repairs in their condo. Our reservations team member Makayla, with whom you spoke with, offered to move you to another of our properties at Phoenix Gulf Shores, but you refused to do so. We also tried to find another property for you elsewhere and were unable to find anything. Once again, we apologize for the situation, but we did offer solutions for you and tried our best to give you alternate accommodations that would sleep everyone in your party.

name: Jenny Tucker
text: Absolutely LOVE this property!  Windward Point #706 This was our 2nd time here and we couldn’t be happier!  The beds are super comfy - the decor is beautiful and the space is roomy with all the conveniences of home.  Love the views from every room and the wrap around patio.  We will tell our friends and be back!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jenny! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: LaTasha Sloan
text: Absolutely beautiful!! We stayed at Regency Isle Condo 1202. Great view of the beach. Spacious and clean.  Accommodations were great. Covered parking, pool, on site grilling area and access to the beach. Owners provided complimentary beach chairs and umbrella. We had an awesome time and will most definitely return.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Latasha! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life at Regency Isle! It definitely is a beautiful location. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation at the beach!

name: Geetha Sarda
text:
We booked - Island Tower - 1902 - 521 West Beach Blvd. AL

If only I could give a negative rating, There customer service is PATHETIC. We had a home booked for 3 families. However 2 days before our trip date we lost our Father. And so one of us spoke to them about this unfortunate incident.
Michela/Makhela spoke to my friend and confirmed that this place will be rented and we could call back to re-book for a later time. And suggested us to cancel for the time being. Also re-booking at this time was costing way more than we would have thought.

So we reached out to them to re-book after a couple weeks, and were told by the "MANAGER" that since you cancelled you will not receive any refund (except the cleaning charges) and I WOULD SAY THAT THE PERSON WAS EXTREMELY RUDE.

We called yet another time spoke to Alex, explained to him the entire reason of cancellation and what we were told before cancelling and why cancellation was done in first place. He wasn't even ready to listen to what we were saying and kept repeating what he had in his notes which did not match with what we were told. (he did not even connect us to the manager) who WAS EQUALLY RUDE TOO and HUNG UP line on OUR FACE.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review about your experience, Geetha. We always want to make sure we are doing our best to take care of each guest that books with Liquid Life. We are aware of the reservation you are speaking of although you are not listed as the primary renter. On the day before this reservation was due to arrive for check-in, our office received a phone call that the guests would not be arriving and would like to move their dates or cancel the reservation. Even though the guest did not purchase travel insurance (which is what helps protect guests financially in situations such as this,) we did offer to move dates for the reservation anyway. Unfortunately, the original condo booked was not open for the new dates, and you (or your primary renter) were offered another condo at the same complex. The future dates were in the peak season of July, which resulted in a higher nightly cost for the stay. The reservations team explained they could move dates, but the guest would be responsible for the difference in price. This was a special offer made to the guest, given the circumstances. The guest did not want to pay the difference, so the reservations team said they could cancel the reservation and try to re-book the condo. If the condo re-booked, Liquid Life would refund the guest for the rent. This was the only other option since travel insurance was not purchased and the guest did not want to pay the price difference. The condo did not rebook with such short notice, but Liquid Life refunded all fees but the rent in order to give back as much as we could to the guest. We understand that once the condo didn’t re-book, and that’s disappointing. Our customer service manager went back and listened to the original calls to make sure all the options were explained very clearly to the guest. We were, in no way, trying to keep money from the guest. Our team was trying to offer any options we could to the guest given the circumstances. We hope that you understand the situation more clearly now. We would have loved to welcome you to the beach and tried our best to do so. Well wishes to you!

name: Carol Duncan
text: This unit is lovely.  Equipped with everything we needed.  Great deck, perfect for reading, dining or just watching the beach.  When we needed AC help Liquid Life was very responsive and resolved the issue. I’ll be back

resp.text: Thank you so much, Carol! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life!

name: Dusty Johnson
text:
AMAZING!!! AMAZING!!! AMAZING!!!
Pelican Point Condo,  Room 904
We have been planning this trip since Christmas.  We had no clue what to do or where to go when we got down there and the agency helped out. They were fast with emailing us stuff to do. The condo and view was perfect.  The staff/ security guards were so nice and helpful. The inside was so clean and it really gave you a home like feeling but in a beachy way. I was torn between staying in the condo or going to the beach. Lol . The balcony was so peaceful watching the sun come up and down.  All and all it was the best trip we have ever taken. I highly recommend staying here. We will be doing this trip every year from here on out. Same condo, same room and same beach.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Dusty! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with Liquid Life at Pelican Pointe. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Laura Wright
text:
Great unit.  The tub in the hall does not drain well and the shower head is not great.
The unit is in a great location at complex, however parking is not great either.

Will look at staying again though.

It was beautifully decorated and very clean.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Laura! We appreciate your feedback about the shower - we will be sure to pass that along to our team! Unfortunately, the condo building itself handles all of the parking. But we look forward to helping you book your next vacation!

name: Connie Gray
text: We stayed at a WONDERFUL condo right on the beach in Gulf Shores over Christmas 2020. The view from the balcony and master bedroom was PERFECT for sunrise and sunset. The condo had EVERYTHING we needed and Liquid Life was very professional and right on target with all the details! We would definitely repeat the trip!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Connie! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: Tricia Theurer
text: Wow! Our stay with Liquid Life blew us away! The staff was more than professional and accommodating - they are also kind and caring. The rental itself felt like a true slice of heaven and was the perfect escape! We lived the celebrities for our stay on the 22nd floor penthouse suite. The unit has SO much space that we could all be together and watch a movie or escape to our own rooms to rest. With a huge family like ours - time together and having our own space is vital and it’s honestly hard to find!! Liquid Life nailed it!!! I will absolutely recommend them to anyone and will absolutely use them again! Thank you!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Tricia! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and that your condo had everything of your vacation dreams. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the beach!

name: Pam W
text: Had a wonderful experience with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals! The condo was huge, beautiful, clean and so convenient to access the beach and covered parking was added bonus! Definitely going to be back!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Pam! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next vacation at the beach!

name: Jyoti Sarkar
text:
We stayed at Casa Del Sol #E1 for 3 nights in March 2021. This kids friendly apartment was in perfect condition in terms of interior decor, beds, couches and kitchen appliances. We found everything in working conditions, rooms/bathrooms were very clean, looked like remodeled recently. Ice maker, toaster, microwave oven, mixer and plenty of utensils made our stay very comfortable. Location was awesome, you can spend hours in balcony with sea-view.
Charcoal grills at the ground floor were very convenient. Property owners kept few trolleys for moving luggage. Swimming pool was always warm, well lit, very clean and well maintained.
We found plenty of grocery stores and restaurants around.
This building offered enough parking but remember to display parking pass on the dashboard to avoid possible towing.
We really had good time and definitely recommend this property.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life and that Casa Del Sol had everything you imagined for your vacation. We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: Sally Cortez
text: We had a great stay at Summerchase. Location was fantastic. The condo was beautiful. Booking all of that was the rest Our biggest complaint was the couch was miserable. We had to prop pillows and sit on pillows and everything to make it where you could actually even sit on the couch. Definitely needs to be replaced before you have more guest. Another item that was weird for us was way to access the beach and access to the indoor pool. Having to go outside to get to the indoor pool was very strange. Not convenient for sure. Overall great stay and we would come back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Sally! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with us at Liquid Life. We will be sure to pass along your suggestions about the couch to the owner of the condo - we appreciate your feedback!

name: Salima Didarali
text:
This is a beautiful condo in a lovely area overlooking the ocean! Actually it’s a paradise!!!! My heart sank when it was time to leave. And than some meltdowns 😢😢

The beach is clean and not crowded at all. People are super friendly. Lots of restaurants in the surrounding area. Spacious and cozy condo on the 11th floor. Huge rooms, nice kitchen, cozy sitting area; and 2 balconies with an amazing view of the ocean. Definitely highly recommended! You can’t go wrong!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Salima! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We can't wait to help you book your next beach vacation.

name: Sara Ahles
text: BE CAREFUL!  BE CAREFUL!  BE CAREFUL!  Entered into an arrangement with Liquid Life for a spring break rental in December 2020.  Notified on 2/26 that they no longer manage the property we had contracted to rent.  Not to worry though, as they will fully refund our deposit.  Was told by Anita Fleming, Customer Service Manager at Liquid Life that the property was listed and sold in 1 day.  On 2/26 Realtor.com shows that property as having been listed for 36 days.  Would have been nice to be notified 30 or so days ago that the property was listed.  We would have cancelled and looked elsewhere.  Now less than 4 weeks before we leave we are scrambling to find a place!  Would have liked to have given them a 0.  Lastly be sure your rental is not under repair from the recent Hurricane.  Ask that up-front before booking.  Anita Fleming commented to me that they are calling customers under contract 1-day before there arrival to let them know the property is not available (still under repair).  This was not the problem with our rental though.  I guess that is supposed to make we feel better about their advanced notice.  Thought these folks being local would be better.  Going through Brett/Robinson now.  Stay away from this group....there is a reason their prices are low!!!.

name: Laren Wimberley
text: We had the best time with our family in Orange Beach! I attribute a lot of that to the stress free planning with the help of Liquid Life! Becky was wonderful and professional. She helped us book with ease. Such an enjoyable vacation! We will book through her again!

resp.text: Thank you, Laren! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and that our team was able to help you plan with ease. We look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach!

name: Ciera Anderson
text: The Property that my family and I stayed in at the Pelican Pointe #403 was everything. It was very nice, update and clean!  The direct access to the beach was a PLUS & the indoor pool & jacuzzi. When I contacted Liquid Life about something’s I wanted to inform them about they were very helpful and informative. I would definitely stay at one of there properties again. Thank you all for everything!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ciera! I'm so glad we could make your vacation with Liquid Life as memorable as can be! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Jamey Wismer
text: From booking the stay to checking out Liquidlife.com was super easy. Our room was very clean and spacious.We loved our time here and will be back!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jamey! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Cody Hildebrand
text: Beautiful Property and Awesome customer service. They are very easy to speak with if you need anything on your stay. The office is conveniently located near the beach incase you need anything, I got an extra parking pass. 10 out of 10 experience

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cody! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Kristi Winebarger
text: Beautiful location with a private beach and very nice condo. Would definitely return.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Kristi! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Gerard O'Connell
text: Liquid Life did a great job. Initial condo was damaged by a storm and Liquid life quickly put us in another condo in the same complex. We had great stay.

resp.text: Thank you, Gerard! We are glad we were able to move you to a condo that allowed you to still have a great beach vacation! We look forward to helping you book your next stay with us.

name: Sarah Borders
text: I would not recommend this company to anyone AT ALL. Booked a vacation through VRBO with them for a trip to Gulf Shores. The listing advertised 💯 refund if I canceled 14 days prior to the trip and I cancelled a month and half before. I only cancelled because I found out a month AFTER I had already booked that now every single pool at the place is going to be closed so I canceled due to having small children and needing a pool as an option. I’m now being charged with a $98 fee ($49-“damage” waiver, and $49 “booking fee”). We go to Gulf Shores every year and have booked with many other companies and never had an issue. Will never use this company again! AWFUL customer service! Would give zero stars if it was an option.

resp.text: Sarah, I believe you are confused with what is happening for your reservation. You booked your reservation through VRBO and read somewhere that the pools would be closed during your stay. As soon as we heard from you regarding this, our team called you to inform you that the pools would in fact BE OPEN for the days of your stay. The information you read somewhere online was incorrect. However, after your troubles with trying to contact VRBO directly, our team informed you that you would be receiving a full refund. You are not being charged our non-refundable fees as you stated here, and that was communicated with you as well. I'm not sure where you were confused, but I hope this clarifies that you will be receiving a full refund on your booking.

name: Molly Morris
text: We loved our stay at 701 Crystal Shores West! It was clean and comfortable. And the views on balcony😍 we loved our week here in Gulf Shores! The indoor pool was so warm. The hot tub was delightful! Awesome trip! Highly recommend this condo!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Molly! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to your next stay at the beach!

name: Cory George
text:
My mom and I rented this condo for an annual Mother/Daughter beach trip.  We only got to stay for 3 days and 4 nights.  I have 2 reviews for the condo experience.

First for the condo owners...The condo was beautiful. Very tastefully decorated.  9/10. The only reason that I didn’t give it a 10/10 is because I am personally not a fan of rain style shower heads and both showers had them.  I am a woman with thick hair and it is impossible to get conditioner completely rinsed out of thick hair with a rain style shower head.  Also, there were 2 Tupperware containers but no lids.  Would have loved to been able to save some left over food for lunch the next day, but hard to do without lids. Otherwise the place itself was perfect! Plenty of dishware  and glassware. King sized comfortable beds in both bedrooms and no carpeting anywhere.  The view is what we came for and it did not disappoint! Love the couch on the balcony!

The next review is for the rental company, Liquid Life.  I would give a 7/10  Most things were easy and handled well.  My reasons for not giving a 10/10 are the following: Not receiving the door code until check in time was a little bit nerve-wrecking. I am a planner, so not having check in details until we arrived made me a little bit nervous. Also, one roll of 1 ply toilet paper per bathroom for 2 women for 4 nights is not enough. We drink coffee in The morning, water all day, and wine in the evening. We pee. And one ply TP doesn’t work very well so you have to use more, then it runs out quick. Also, there was absolutely no hand soap anywhere in the condo. We are at the end of a pandemic and there is no way to wash our hands without going to buy soap. They give you make-up remover wipes and lotion, but no soap.  When paying this much for 3 days/4 nights, I don’t want to have to also go buy TP and soap, Or call the rental company and wait for someone to bring some. Just don’t want to be bothered to have to call someone and ask for TP and soap. The last reason is for cleanliness.  It was pretty good. The linens were clean, no sand in the sheets, the kitchen and bathrooms were clean, no problems there, but I believe the floors (all tile and vinyl, no carpet) must have just been swept or maybe vacuumed, but not mopped or wet swiffered, because after we arrived the first night, we got settled, I took off my shoes and walked around the condo barefoot until I went to bed. I noticed my feet were filthy dirty when getting ready for bed. I had not been outside barefoot at all, just walking around inside the condo for a few hours. The balcony had something that had been spilled on it, maybe coffee? That had been missed by the cleaning crew.

All in all, I would give it an 8/10.  We loved the location because there weren’t any other condos on either side right next to it, so the beach was less crowded.  There was construction going on right next to it, so that could change if they are putting up another building there. Also, I slept in the room closest to the road and hear a lot of loud sirens each night. The young man renting chairs and umbrellas on the beach was super personable and accommodating.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cory! We are glad you enjoyed your beach vacation. We will be sure to pass along all of your feedback to the appropriate teams.

name: Ben Ragsdale
text: We dealt directly with Becky. She was absolutely fantastic! I wish every place we worked with had a Becky! The unit we rented blew away our expectations and we would 100% recommend using Liquid Life for all of your Gulf Coast rental needs!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ben! We are always grateful for guests like you as well! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Amy Beck
text:
We made reservations with Liquid Life, Phoenix West 2 Unit 2309 in a “pet free unit”. I made the reservations by phone to ensure the unit had never had pets and was told the whole building was pet free. When we arrived at the unit, we were greeted by a portrait of dogs and a condo covered in dog hair. Two of our family members had allergic reactions shortly after our arrival. I vacuumed up large bags of pet hair myself. The patio furniture was all inside, the front door stop was broken, and one of the tubs didn’t drain. These were all small nuisances compared to the allergic reactions we were dealing with. I contacted Liquid Life. They would not move us to a comparable unit! We were told they would refund the cleaning fee & one nights rent if we signed a form stating we would not report this to the Better Business Bureau or comment any negativity about them on social media. I could not sign the form! It would be unethical not to warn other allergy suffers of the allergy concerns. Randy, the owner of the Liquid Life company sent me the rudest email I have ever received in my life! I did a Google search and found out Liquid Life had made the news and had a class action lawsuit against them. My family was lied to! My family’s health was put in jeopardy because of Liquid Lies! My money was waisted because my son and sister-in-law could not remain in the condo with the pet hair! Liquid Life is still falsely advertising Phoenix West II unit 2309 as a pet free unit! I regret renting from this unethical company!

I only left one review! I have no clue how it would be possible to leave more than one. I did fill out the survey that Liquid Life sent me, maybe that is what you are referring to. The numerous negative reviews on Google and the Better Business Bureau speak volumes about this company! I am astonished by the lack of customer service the company in showing in their rude replies to their customers’ reviews. Liquid Life blames every complaint on the property owners and takes no responsibility for their company!!!

resp.text: Amy, we are so terribly sorry that this happened to you. This is, in fact, a pet-free unit. However, the owners of the unit brought their pets prior to your stay without our knowledge. We do not control what the actual owners of these properties do on their own time. With that being said, you say that you booked over the phone to ensure it was a pet-free unit. We show in our system that you booked via a hot deal on our website, and it is coded differently than phone bookings. We also do not have any notes under your reservation regarding a call prior to your stay regarding any guests with allergies. We try our very best to accomodate all guests in the best way possible when it comes to these sorts of things, especially if we are informed ahead of time. During your stay, we sent our cleaning team out to you the day after you arrived as you denied them to come on your first evening. We could not move you to another unit at Phoenix West II as we were booked at that time. We did, however, offer to move you to another complex and you refused. You said that you wanted a full refund for your stay as well as a free stay in another unit. We tried to rectify this situation in the best way possible, and you continued to deny our offer. The only reason you received an unpleasant email from our owner is because you sent every staff member in our company a very demanding and hateful email after being given multiple solutions to your issue and you denying them. Once again, we are so sorry this happened to your family. We in no way lied about the unit or intended anyone harm in the process, and we tried our best to make this situation better for you.

name: paul haitsch
text:
This unit is beautiful! Upon entering it is obvious that it is well kept, clean, comfortable and stocked with anything you would ever need! The decor is coastal and calming with plenty of seating to enjoy the gorgeous ocean front views!!
We loved sitting out on the balcony in the morning to watch the sunrise and in the evenings to enjoy the sound of the waves and the ocean breeze.
We will definitely be back!! We had An amazing beach vacation and enjoyed our stay at this immaculate condo!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Paul! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Bonny Greene
text: Exceptional service and a squeaky clean condo. To top it all off, the communication is phenomenal! I will never use another rental company and I have been coming down staying with the "big boys" for 20 years. Liquid Life made me feel so special instead of another stick in the mud.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Bonny! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to your next stay at the beach!

name: Joan Brock
text: We had an amazing week at the beach! The water was beautiful and clear, weather was perfect, and it was easy to keep socially distanced from other families on the beach. Our Liquid Life condo had a million dollar view of the gorgeous ocean. We saw dolphins and rays swimming by multiple times every day. We enjoyed many meals on the balcony and stayed on the beach for incredible sunsets each evening. It was so good to see families taking a break and having fun together! Our condo was so clean and spacious with everything we needed! We were able to go straight to the condo with the door code provided by Liquid Life, so no long check-in procedure. Thanks for making everything so easy - we will be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Joan! We are so glad you enjoy your beach vacation with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next visit!

name: David Brewer
text: What started out to be a great fall family vacation became a nightmare!  After Hurricane Sandy caused all the destruction in Gulf Shores/O.B., we thought there may have been a chance that our vacation would be cancelled.  We understood.  After the Liquid Life team was back up and running, I called to verify the house we had rented would be available.  We were told "as of now" it is good.  I called back a few days later to see if there was a possibility of booking an additional 2 days.  I was told by an extremely nice lady that she would pencil us in for those two days and that if there was a problem with adding those two days, they would let us know.  The week prior to our departure, I never heard anything back so I called to make sure those two extra days were good and to go ahead and pay for them.  They had already taken out my final payment on the rental for the original 5 nights.  After I was forwarded to another clerk, I was told that none of our nights were going to be available.  This information comes to me 5 days prior to our departure.  I feel this is very poor communication on Liquid Life's behalf.  The lady that told me the house was not going to be available was extremely rude!  Then, they proceeded to tell me it would take a week or longer for me to receive my refund. Management was supposed to call me back the following day.  Crickets!  I called L.L. back and they proceeded to tell me that they tried calling.  My phone never rang, had a missed call in the log or a voicemail left.  They wanted to charge me a fee to put it back on my credit card so I had to wait on a check.  As a retail manager for many years, I feel this team failed miserably in communication.  I'm deeply saddened that the residents/owners suffered from this natural disaster.  I just think Liquid Life could have been more prompt in inspections of the properties they manage and updating their clients.

name: betsy parrott
text: Tidewater 303 is a nice, clean, and well-appointed beach condo. The decor is very tastefully done. The unit has nice amenities and a wonderful, unobstructed gulf front view, as well as amazing sunset views. Our kids enjoy swimming in both the indoor and outdoor pools and sleeping in the bunk beds. It is perfect for our family of six! We look forward to coming back!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Betsy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Tidewater. Our Liquid Life team looks forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Andrea Sutton
text: We stayed at Broadmoor 302. It was fantastic!! We will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Andrea! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life!

name: Beach Tweets
text: Do not use liquid life be smart and book directly with Spectrum resorts turquoise place is too nice and it's such a beautiful property and if you rent directly with Spectrum resorts you get an instant response to maintenance issues.  We will never use liquid life again we arrived For our first vacation after Covid shut down and our unit did not have air conditioning.  We are mediately called and they assured if someone would be there later that day at 11o'clock that night we called the emergency number and they said… We didn't realize your unit was the one that needed a part and the part didn't come in so as of Sunday after checking in on Thursday we still have no air-conditioning spent our entire first after Covid vacation with no air.  They said the unit has fans ... lol ????? that was their solution for us ???? however, several of us wear contacts and ceiling fans and other fans dry our eyes out so we can't run fans and wear contacts!  One of the members in our party is eight months pregnant so imagine your first vacation post Covid shut down and you're pregnant about to deliver and your rental company tells you oh by the way your unit has no air-conditioning and it's not going to have for the entire length of your stay.  The best part is they don't tell you till 11 o'clock at night after you already checked in!!!!   We called them to the desk at Spectrum and they assured us that nothing like that would happen if we had rented from them so be smart and don't rent from Liquid life!!!! go directly and rent from Spectrum resorts

name: Sonny Jim
text: My wife and I had booked a week's stay in Orange Beach with this company and were really looking forward to our vacation. 8 days before we were to arrive, I received a call from someone with the company. I could not answer the phone, I was at my doctor. They left a message for me to call the office, but they didn't leave their name. I called back within the hour, but no one could tell me why I was called. I couldn't tell them who called me because they left no name. They pulled up my agreement and said everything looks fine, probably no big deal. The following day, Saturday, we received our email with arrival instructions. With that, we figured everything was fine. No contact from them on Sunday or Monday, but on Tuesday morning we were called and told the reason for the call  on Friday was to inform us the owner had sold the condo and our booking was cancelled. We were left with 3 days to find a replacement when it could have easily have been 8 days with a weekend. Much easier to find a replacement at home than it was while I was at work. And although they knew on Friday the booking was a wash, they did not start the refund process until Tuesday. So, not only were we shopping frantically at work for a new place, but we had no money to shop with. As of now, 7 days after they ripped up our contract, we are still waiting for our money. Lesson learned - don't trust Liquid Life again! We want our money!!!

resp.text: Jim, we are so sorry for the communications issues on our end. However, we have zero control when an owner sells their property. Unfortunately, that is just something that happens, but we did offer you a full refund to be deposited back onto your card. It does take some time for these sorts of refunds depending on your bank, and our manager sent you a receipt showing the money had been refunded. Rest assured, your money is being returned. You can check with your bank on their processing time if you have any questions.

name: Greg Murphy
text:
This was our 2nd time renting through Liquid Life, both in Crystal Shores West in Gulf Shores. With this particular time we stayed in unit 603, and just like the 1st time everything with Liquid Life was amazingly great. Lots of wonderful communication leading up to our vacation to prepare us with what to expect. We were even lucky enough that they had our unit cleaned early, so we got our check-in text and door code even before the normal 3pm check-in time. Receiving the code via text is so much easier than having to stop at an office for keys, as we've had to do on previous trips with other rental companies.

The only "problem" that arose during our stay was that some of our balcony seating was zip tied to the railing because of Hurricane Laura that had just passed through. All it took was a quick text message and Liquid Life put in a maintenance request that was completed before we even got back from dinner! Additionally, we had a possibility of extending our trip an extra day, so I texted about availability and rates, to which I received answers immediately. Unfortunately our situation back home didn't allow us to extend, but I appreciate the prompt help and information provided. We will most definitely be renting through Liquid Life on our next trip to Gulf Shores next summer!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Greg! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. And we are so glad that our team was able to help with your balcony furniture! We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Jessica Taylor
text: Our family stayed at Royal Palms in 704 and LOVED IT! The location is awesome and the view was incredible. The furniture in the living room needs to be updated, but the condo was great! Clean, stocked and comfy. We have a family of 6 and realized 2 rooms would be better than the bunks but we didn’t let it slow us down. We will for sure be back and we will use Liquid Life Vacation Rentals every time! Thank you for a great, easy experience ☀️😎🏝❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jessica! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book again!

name: Trey & Laren
text: We had an incredible experience and it was thanks to Becky! Swift communication and worked around our plans for the weekend. If you’re in the market for a vacation rental, you should 100% ask for her to guarantee your vacation is a success!

resp.text: Thank you, Trey and Laren, for your review! We are so glad we could make your stay all you imagined. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: katie wallace
text: There was a problem with our reservations, it took quite a bit to get Holly on the phone. Once I did Though, she was able to remedy the issue. Looking forward to our stay!

resp.text: Sorry for your experience, Katie! Hollie is our Property Manager and very rarely ever talks to guests due to her schedule. I'm not sure exactly why you were needing to talk to her specifically, but I'm glad you were able to get everything resolved.

name: christine B
text: As my 21 year old said, “this is a sweet spot!” Compared to Hilton Head, (where we typically go)  we just about had the beach to ourselves.  Yes, there were other groups around, but we weren’t on top of each other like HHI. The walk is minimal...literally across the street.  VERY low key on Perdido Key.  However, if you want a little more action, just cross the border to Alabama, and you have Orange Beach and Gulf Shores.  Lots of action there.  Hence, why my son said “Sweet Spot” The condo is amazing!!  It has everything you will need and more.  The views are outstanding from each bedroom, the large living area and the balcony. We will definitely visit again!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Christine! Welcome to the Gulf Coast! :) We are so glad you enjoyed your stay on our beaches, and we look forward to helping you book your next stay!

name: Julie Cantrell
text: Condo Unit 905 at Pelican Pointe was a lovely place to stay and enjoy the beach. It was decorated beautifully, had everything we needed and we felt perfectly safe during Hurricane Sally as it passed over. We will definitely be back for another vacation! Thank you to the owners and Liquid Life for making our stay as comfortable as possible.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Julie! We can't wait to have you again.

name: Maria Holguin
text: The condo is fabulous, light and airy. Perfect location and very spacious. Kitchen was very well stocked has a great stand alone ice machine that kept up with us. We can’t wait to come back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Maria! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life.

name: Jamie Lawson
text: We’ve spent 4 days at Summer House 1106A and have enjoyed every minute here! After reading one of the latest reviews I was a little worried, but after arriving we found very few problems. The balcony is absolutely huge and a great place to sit and watch the ocean waves and dolphins swim up and down the shore line. The hurricane shutters were handy in blocking the evening sun from blinding you while sitting on the balcony.  The bedrooms are perfect sizes and the beds are comfy. The kitchen is stocked with mostly anything you would need food your trip if you cook while there. One issue with the refrigerator was that it doesn’t keep things very cold. I don’t know if it’s the doors or what but water bottles in the freezer won’t freeze, but they do get very cold. We had no issues with the washer and dryer. Everything dried on the first cycle, maybe settings were an issue in the previous review? I would recommend that most of the outlet plugs be replaced as we had several plugs just fall out due to loose connections. Both elevators were operational during our stay and wait times were minimal. Thank you for the opportunity to make memories with friends! Would definitely recommend staying here!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jamie! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the beach with us at Summer House! We look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach!

name: Chris and Kim Jones
text: Facility and unit was nice. Parking is an issue. It states that a unit gets max two parking passes. We were only give one and then told to buy a second pass for $35. After reading papers/signs on the unit, talking with people in other units, and the security guard- EVERYONE stated they received TWO PASSES PER UNIT. How can you have a 10 persons unit and only give out ONE PASS?  When you pay over $2000 for the unit for 7 days and you still want people to pay more to park? That’s ridiculous!!! Another ridiculous part, both of our vehicles had already been parked in the unit for 5 days before one of our vehicles got a “warning will be towed sign” placed on the windshield. The parking lot was only 1/4 full with PLENTY of passes to park. I conveyed this to Liquid Life and it didn’t matter and no exceptions were made. That is terrible customer service. We ended up having to park our second vehicle at Publix for one night, the last night, so it wouldn’t get towed and so we didn’t have to pay $35 for one night. Horrible way to treat customers paying. Would not recommend this facility for this reason. One bad experience like this will lose a customer for life. Is that worth it? You need to re-evaluate how you treat your paying customers!!!

resp.text: Chris and Kim, you booked your stay through Liquid Life Vacation Rentals. We only charge guests for one pass at time of booking for every unit that we manage. Some other companies on the coast charge guests for two passes up-front. The reason your car received a warning is because you did not pay for a second pass. I'm sorry you feel this way, but you were, in fact, charged less than others that booked and automatically got two passes. We do this to be fair to the units that only sleep 5 or 6. We apologize for your frustration with parking on the coast.

name: Sherrone McDonald
text: Condo was in a nice location, great view but was not clean as expected. Deep cleaning of rugs, couch, entire condo is needed. Liquid life kept insisting that my issue was between me and the owner but they are the ones that manage this place. They wanted to shampoo the carpet and furniture during our vacation. It should have been done prior to renting it out.

resp.text: Sherrone, we are very sorry about your experience. The owners of the units are actually the ones that handle deep cleans of rugs, carpets, furniture, etc at the end of the summer season due to wear and tear of summer guests. Unfortunately, the owner of your unit just has not been able to do this for your unit yet. We apologize that the quality of the unit was not up to par for your stay this year.

name: J Minniear
text: We booked a stay at one of their condos.  Nothing in the description stated that the facility was under construction. A week after booking we received a text message to call regarding the reservation. They stated that we needed to sign a waiver because the building was under construction and some amenities, including the pool may not be available. We asked why this was not stated in the listing description and they said it was because we used VRBO to book. Needless to say, we cancelled.

resp.text: We are so sorry for this! The past few months have been very hard on us in our little beach town after Hurricane Sally. As a local business, many of our employees were directly impacted by this terrible storm as well. Unfortunately, many condo buildings are still working on construction projects and working with insurance claims, red tape, and changes of construction schedules - not to mention working around the weather. All of this construction is being handled by the condo buildings and the HOAs of those buildings. Due to the ever-changing construction schedules out of our control, we are not able to include it in the descriptions of the condos we manage. However, we have in our records that you only booked your condo yesterday, and our team reached out immediately to let you know of the potential construction at your condo at the time of your stay. We did this so you would have the opportunity to reschedule somewhere else should you choose.

name: Marcus Vidrine
text: Gave it two stars because we had a great time in Orange Beach, but the condo wasn't what I expected. First got there the kitchen smelled like old alcohol on the floor, there was no curtain on the door going out to the balcony and they only had two wash clothes in the bathrooms one for each bathroom for six people and when we asked for a couple more they said that's all we're allowed to get. Overall we had a great time at the beach but as for Liquid Life, I'll be using using another rental company.

resp.text: We are so sorry you feel this way, Marcus! We would love the chance to give you a better experience at the beach on your next Gulf Coast vacation.

name: Brett Hughes
text:
Sorry not only was the place gorgeous customer service and text responsiveness was excellent!
The master bedroom in condo 614 of The Palms  Faced the ocean Which made it a great place to spend 4 days.
Balcony is huge.
Will stay again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Brett! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Kim Taylor
text: We were very impressed with this Condo. Beautiful view, great beach access and beautiful pool. Everything was wonderful. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back as well as recommend to our friends and family.  Hope to make this a yearly vacation!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Kim! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Ashley Janes
text: Just left from our beach vacation in Orange Beach! We stayed at Pelican pointe, and we had a corner condo. The balcony was SO BIG and wrapped around the condo. Every room had a door to the balcony as well. The property is right on the beach, so we had no issues going back and forth from the condo for food and to relax. The condo is perfect for a family. There’s a king bed, a queen, and 2 twin beds. There might also be a pull out bed, but I’m not sure. We had an awesome time, and we will definitely be back to visit!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Ashley! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Gerard Dickneite
text: The condo was very nice and spacious for our stay.  The beach was awesome and no problems with social distancing.  Upon arrival, our condo was dirtier than expected with the amount of sand on the floods and rugs, but Liquid Life did offer to send cleaning staff to do further cleaning. By booking direct with Liquid Life we were able to save some $$ on booking.  Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Gerard! We are glad you were able to work with our team in sending someone to help with the sand. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the beach!

name: Orellana Rauda
text:
The condo #503 was very welcoming and felt like home until you do a walk through.
Pros:
*New appliances very well kept
*Organized living and kitchen
*Clean patio

Conns:
*Bed was the worst I've ever laid on. (I couldn't tell if I was laying in a hammock or a mattress, my son's (4yr) slightest movement would rock the whole bed side to side, pillows all shifted and not evenly spread.
* the bathrooms smell like mildew,  the s H over curtains we're wrinkled and smell so bad like they washed them and let them sat in a bucket wet for days proline to hanging in bathroom.
* not enough linen

Overall it was ok, there could be better places for the same price.

resp.text: Orellana, we are glad you enjoyed your stay. Although the owners pick out their own bedding, we would have happily addressed your other concerns during your stay. We do not see where you reported any issues, however. We would love the chance to give you a better experience for your next beach vacation!

name: Steve “Speed” Nowell
text: Great location, amenities were as expected and staff was friendly and helpful on all questions.  Other than a dishwasher not able to wash the dishes on the way out and a toilet tank flapper not quite right we had a perfect stay (simple fixes).  It was very clean and ready for us when we arrived.  Will be back for a perfect 5 star stay next time!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Steve! We are so glad you enjoy your beach vacation with Liquid Life. We are so sorry for your minor maintenance issues, but our team is fixing these on the unit as we speak. We look forward to helping you book your next visit!

name: Sarah Dillard
text:
$984 spent and only provided ONE cheap roll of single ply toilet paper for a condo that sleeps 6!

There were only two face cloths provided as well, again for a place that sleeps 6. I expect limited towels and trash bags but one roll of toilet paper for a 4 night stay is CHEAP!

I had to contact the rental company two days prior to arriving because I never received check in or parking instructions. I received an email one day prior which did not include parking details. Again, I had to reach out to the rental company. But yet I received unwanted spam email and text offers to start my trip earlier or extend it.

The company also never bothered to update their checkout instructions left on the table which list a DIFFERENT check out time and had the previous rental property manager's contact information. I can't imagine how many unnecessary calls the previous manager has received because of that oversight.

Stop cheaping out on the small things (paper towels, toilet paper, trash bags, and dish soap).

resp.text: Sarah,  The starter packets of paper goods are standard for the entire condo rental industry.  This post is more about the difference between staying in a full service hotel, vs a vacation rental property.  The win, is you have a full condo with kitchen and over 1100 sq ft of space of Gulf Front views.   Hotel rooms are usually 400 sq ft and they provide what you are looking for in paper goods.   We hope it in the future you will enjoy the extra space and features of the condo, often at the same or lower price than a hotel room.  Best Wishes

name: Sara Metroka
text: The condo was exactly as pictured. Lots of space and seating for our family, with an awesome view from the balcony. Kitchen was fully stocked with crockpot, pans, utensils, everything we could need for the week (and we cooked in most nights)! Would absolutely stay here again!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sara! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next visit to the Gulf Coast!

name: Susan Fowlkes
text: Thank you liquid life for providing a great condo for our 2020 Family trip. Summerhouse 504B was clean, everything worked properly, has nice decor and an awesome view!  Liquid life's communication was excellent. We will use y'all again.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susan! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Gib Ford
text: We stayed at the Palms in Orange Beach( actually we leave tomorrow). Our rental condo is spacious, clean, well appointed and just beautiful. Liquid Life has made it all easy. We are a party of 6, old friends, who last vacationed together in 1977. We came together again 43 years later for this trip. We will come back next year!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Gib! We are so glad we were able to provide a great place for your friends to reunite again! We look forward to helping you book next year's trip as well!

name: JellyRoll6907
text: We were very pleased with this condo. The decor is gorgeous with a luxury feel. The location is near numerous grocery stores and restaurants. Check in was a breeze. The complex as a whole was a nice family environment. Vacationing during COVID was not as bad as we expected. We would just wait for the next elevator and most everyone was respectful with keeping distance in pool. It really was pleasant and would return without question.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Terrah Emmons
text: We had a great time. The condo was perfect and we adore the patio!! The owner had video games and board games so that was a plus on rainy days. The decor was pretty and comfortable. We loved the shower in the master as well as the extra ice maker in the wet bar. We will be staying again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Terrah! We love this condo as well :) We are so glad you had a great time!

name: Jenny Crowe
text:
The Good: The condo we stayed in, Caribe 914C, was bright and spacious, and only showed minimum everyday wear and tear.  The balcony is large with a view of the resort entrance and of the beach. We enjoyed drinking our coffee and eating our breakfast on the balcony each morning. The washer and dryer really came in handy for towels and swimwear and the icemaker was super convenient for making big pitchers of ice water. We had a couple of concerns of which I called Liquid Life about, and they were quick to resolve these issues. Of major concern was that the A/C was not working at all when we arrived, but Liquid Life got maintenance to the condo within a couple of hours and that problem was resolved.

The not so Good: The cleaning staff needs careful monitoring. For the most part, the condo was clean, but there were a couple of glaring issues. The living room furniture is of cloth upholstery and had stains which should be treated with upholstery cleaner by the cleaning staff. There was also some sort of child's cereal, looked like Fruity Pebbles, scattered on the living room sectional and also under the balcony dining table, which I cleaned up. The bedspread in one of the guest bedrooms had a fairly long brown streak running across it. I called Liquid Life and they notified housekeeping to come change out all of the linens in that particular room.
