name: Connie O'Banion
text: We enjoyed our stay at Seacrest 702C. The condo was very comfort and relaxing. It was supplied with all the amenities needed such as beach chairs and umbrella. We were “wow” once we walked through the door. The property was beautiful also. Staff at Liquid Life has not let me down yet, very friendly and have used them for the second time and already planning on our next vacation with them.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Connie! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay - and we are so glad we were able to wow you with the condo and our service! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Karen Wells
text: We hired Liquid Life to manage our property.  THEIR CLEANING CREW WAS SPENDING THE NIGHT IN OUR CONDO WITHOUT OUR PERMISSION AND USING OUR PLACE AS A HOME BASE WHILE THEY WERE CLEANING OTHER CONDOS!!!  We have video evidence from a neighbors Ring doorbell to prove this.   The owner,  Randy, is extremely unprofessional.  If he doesn't like something he will turn on you in a second with aggressive, hostile behavior and order you off his property!!!   We have had multiple problems with their staff regarding getting things done and/or following through with tasks that they are suppossed to manage themselves.  I highly recommend that you do not use this company to manage your property or to rent anything from them!!!

resp.text:
Karen and Robert Pearce from Montevallo, AL,

Our company serves hundreds of owners and investors with complete excellence caring for their condos. We keep our commitments consistently. We perform above market earning maximum rental income, and we have a solid and experienced team of people on our Condo Care Team who are committed to excellence. We have been very successful for over a decade. And we have added 30 - 40 new condos to our rental program every year since we opened our business. We like to work with nice people to develop a trusting relationship.

Conflict with any of our condo owners or vacation rental guests is very very rare. We focus on kindness and our team is positive in every situation where it is possible.

We have learned that some people come to us choosing to do business in a confrontational and demanding manner. We have come to the conclusion that serving hundreds and thousands of people puts us in contact with a certain percentage of people who simply behave in a confrontational or emotional manner as their habit.

This review above is very disappointing. Unfortunately, it's just more.   Your comment above is partial information, taken extremely out of context with significant exaggerations.

Our Condo Care Team worked faithfully to serve you and to provide you with excellent service. When there were issues, we worked overtime to resolve issues immediately. Last week, before your arrival, we had a team of people and managers working in your condo.  Thanks for your acknowledgment during the first minutes of the meeting on how clean and nice everything was for your arrival.

We have done our best in phone calls made to you to manage the emotions we were hearing. We have done our best to manage some testy and adversarial outbursts and demands from you. Before our last meeting, I emailed you and suggested that you might not be a fit for our program, and I gave you a deadline. It would have been best for you to take that hint.

Now here we are where the people who read this know exactly who our company is, but you get to be anonymous in your emotions and exaggerations.

This could have been resolved easily with an ounce of effort.

Respectfully.

name: Vicki McVietty
text: We are snowbirds who’ve been coming to Orange Beach AL for many years.  This was the first time we stayed at Romar Lakes.  This was also the cleanest, most homey condo we’ve stayed in.  The furniture was comfortable and the unit had great decor.  The balcony overlooked the marsh and was very private and relaxing.  Liquid Life was very professional and their customer service was outstanding.  We have booked this condo for same time next year.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Vicki! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Romar Lakes! We look forward to working with you again on your next trip to the Gulf Coast.

name: Mary Saunders
text:
Very clean facility at Caribe Property.
All the staff at Liquid Life were awesome. They were polite, courteous and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Mary! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next stay on our beautiful beaches.

name: kl2328
text: This condo was Amazing! Just like the pictures! The view and sound of the ocean from the balcony simply breathtaking! I’m so glad we went through liquid life, they were just down the road and able to answer questions immediately. We loved it so much we asked to extend our stay an extra day since it wasn’t booked until the following day and we were able to at a special price without any hiccups! Just the best time we have had!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Bryan! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: cindy hudson
text: We have stayed in this same unit 2 years in a roll. Love the unit and the view. Decorated very nice. We love having the bedroom with the bunk beds. That’s a plus for kids/teens. Kitchen is very spacious. We had to call maintenance for the patio door that got off track. Liquid Life had someone out super fast to repair it. Check in was easy and through text so there’s so stopping to get keys and having to worry about returning them. We love The Palms and recommend this unit.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cindy! We are so glad you have continued to enjoy your stays with us! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Lee Ramone
text: I stayed in Romar Tower for a wedding and had a wonderful time. It was perfect setting and the weather was beautiful. There was a Parking issue but Mary helped us with that and found a solution.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Lee! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Christy Buckner
text: Great unit, we loved it. We rented Regency Isle, unit 507. The decor is wonderful and the extra touches are great. They had some toys for the younger kids and an extra net that we needed for crab hunting. My youngest son loved the alligator stuffed animals on the kids bed. I highly recommend this unit. Checking in and out of our unit was super easy. We loved having a code to get in our room instead of a key or card. I highly recommend using Liquid Life to book your condo through!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Christy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at Regency Isle with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: K G
text:
Too many Marketing emails and text messages!!!  Did I really need thirteen emails and six text messages (before and during) our 4 day vacation?

Outside of the initial email confirming reservation, payment, and check in / out instructions, everything else was repetitive and useless.  Put it all in one email!

We spent quite a bit of time looking for the LL location...knowing the office was in a shared location with another business would have helped us locate it faster and a larger sign would have helped!

resp.text: KG, we are sorry you feel like you were given too much communication from our team. It is our job to ensure that you are well informed about every part of your trip, and most of our guests love our clear communication. We hope you still enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life & look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Jennifer Austin
text: Booking with Liquid Life Vacation was super quick and easy. Their fees are so much lower than other places and you get what you think you are getting. They checked on us several times during our stay and made sure our vacation was everything we planned on it being. We will definitely be using them for future vacations!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jennifer! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We love hearing that guests had a great time booking with us! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Peggy Palmer (Peg)
text: My daughter reserved the Phoenix West II condo for us with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals and we were not disappointed. We had a blast from start to finish. Check in was easy and the Condo and Beaches were beautiful and clean! The Customer Service Manager Mary listened to this old women complain about a tiniest issue and she fixed it immediately showing such politeness the whole time. The Front desk gal  was also wonderful when we got lost trying to get to Publix. She even went outside to see if she could see our car. Will be using this fantastic Company again for sure. Thank you Liquid Life Vacation Rentals for an amazing Family Vacation

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Peggy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Melissa Warren
text: I am very disappointed that Liquid Life will not give me a full refund on my reservation that I had to cancel today.  Final payment was not due until Wednesday.  Given our current situation in the US, with travel restrictions, health concerns, and restriction on group sizes it makes it impossible for us to use this reservation at this time.  I have booked with Liquid Life many times in the past and will have to reconsider in the future.

resp.text: Many of our future Liquid Life guests are contacting us asking about their upcoming vacation to our beaches. The best way we can respond to you is by providing you with the information given by our state and local governments. The City of Orange Beach released information this morning as they monitor updates from local, state and federal agencies and health officials about COVID-19. With the lack of travel bans and updated information given from the State of Alabama at this morning's press conference, we have been advised by officials to continue with normal operations at Liquid Life. Should anything change with our government - state or local, things would obviously change at Liquid Life and across the beach at other companies as well. We wish you well.

name: merle Knight
text: I stayed with my Brother this past weekend in Seawind. Liquid Life was extremely helpful when we had a third Vehicle and needed a place to park. They also answered every question we asked about the area and where to eat.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Merle! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

text: We absolutely loved everything about this place! The staff was super helpful and answered all questions we had prior to us arriving. The pictures they posted online were exactly what was in the room. We will defiantly be coming back.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Elizabeth! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the beach with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the Gulf Coast!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We are sorry that you had a bad experience with the on-site property manger. We, unfortunately, do not have any association with them, but we will make sure to pass this along to the appropriate parties. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the beach!

text: We love to stay at the Broadmoor condos. The ladies at Liquid Life are friendly wonderful people. The check in and checkout was easy and fast. They answered all my questions with a very professional attitude. I would recommend going through Liquid Life for any of your vacation needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Patsy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the Gulf Coast!

text: We’ve used Liquid Life Vacation Rentals for the past two years for our winter vacation, and we couldn’t be happier with our experience. They stay in touch via text throughout the rental time. Check in and check out are very simple. We plan to return for a third year!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Rebekah! We are so glad you enjoyed your winter stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

text: Summerhouse 106B. Ground floor unit. Plenty of room. Early check in was allowed and much appreciated. Only reason this is not 5 stars is that we put a call in to maintenance and it was not returned. Communication overall is super fast and they are great to work with. We will be back to this unit again.

resp.text: Hi Leanne! We greatly appreciate you taking time to write us a review! We love feedback from our guests! We do apologize for the maintenance issue you experienced and we will make sure to do everything we can to resolve the matter. We hope we can help you book your next vacation to the beach! Thank you, Guest Services Team at Liquid Life Vacation Rentals.

text: Liquid life was very easy to work with.  Concerns were addressed and corrected the same day.  Easy communication via text message.  Will definitely do business again with liquid life!

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

Liquid Life made the rental experience an easy one. We loved our stay in OBA and will be back there again soon... I hope. When we do return it will be in another vacation rental booked through Liquid Life.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Gordon! We are so glad we could help you have a memorable vacation in Orange Beach. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation! Thank you, Guest Services at Liquid Life Vacation Rentals

text: We stayed at Phoenix X and it was wonderful! The condo was gorgeous and Liquid Life was great to work with.

name: KATHLEEN MORAN-HELLMERS
text: We enjoyed our stay at the Breakers unit 42.  The price was appropriate and for the most part it was lovely.  It is in need of some updating on the furnishings.  All has been well used.  The location was awesome, on the beach, across the street from a Starbucks and Publix grocery store.  Everything worked well in the unit.  Did not like that Liquid Life tried to charge me $28 for an extra parking pass, when I got one from the condo association for $20.  There was garbage that was left for the entire week by the garbage shoot.  Maintenance should have noticed this and taken care of it.  Hangers in the closets would have been nice.  We had to purchase some.

text: Enjoyed our stay! Clean! Clean! Saw dolphins from our balcony!

name: Paula Ashton
text: We stayed with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals at the Phoenix Gulf Shores #1604 and couldn't be happier! The condo was absolutely beautiful...beds were super comfy, rooms were very spacious and the pools were fabulous! Everything we needed to make a memorable family vacation. Thank you Liquid Life.... We will be back next year!

resp.text: Hi Paula! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: Doug B
text: Liquid Life rental was good from all aspects - communication, pricing, customer service.  Crystal Shores West 908 is a very nice condo.  Just a couple notes for potential renters: 1) TVs are on on small size if that matters to you;  2) Master bed is elevated ~8 inches making it more difficult for person with limited mobility - it also has a deep pillowtop;  3) several electrical outlets are taped over not to be used;  4) shower head in queen bathroom is very powerful.  I would not hesitate to rent from LL again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Doug! We appreciate your feedback, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the beach!

name: Sasha Vanderploeg
text: We stayed at Phoenix X and it was wonderful! The condo was gorgeous and Liquid Life was great to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Sasha! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Carrie Blackstone
text: This company is so easy to work with and was kind and caring about my elderly grandma who need a little extra time to get up and going on our checkout day, We will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Carrie! We are so glad we could help out with you and your grandma. We hope you enjoyed your beach vacation!

name: Dawn Thornton
text: Had a wonderful stay! Cooked some great seafood meals. Walked the beaches with cslmnwaters and another time with roaring waves. Relaxed in the deck and painted . Brought the New Years Eve in with a southern warm breeze:) We’ll be back !!!!😎❤️👍

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Dawn! We are so glad you enjoyed your New Years stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Marilyn Richardson
text:
We rented Unit 4023 at Phoenix IV for the Thanksgiving week and we had reserved it at least 9 months in advance.  When we arrived we could see that major construction was going on, yet we were not advised of this, nor were we given an opportunity to switch buildings.  They came on the second day and draped our balcony in plastic sheeting to where we could not sit and look out at the water.  They also put up a large sheet of plywood blocking off over half of what balcony was left.  There was scaffolding going up and down all days from 9 to 5, with loud talking and banging of equipment.  This severely impacted our stay, and when I went to complain to the office they said there was nothing they could do, nor could they give me a discount for the inconvenience when I requested it.
In addition to this, the pool and hot tub in the Phoenix IV building was roped off and out of order for most of the week, so we had to go outside and next door to use the very crowded pool at hot tub at Phoenix III.
Unit 4023 itself was nice and very spacious, which was needed for our group of family and cooking the Thanksgiving dinner.  However, the unit slept 10, but there was only one set of towels for 8, and only one dish cloth and dish towel in the kitchen, and NO hot pads at all.  We just kept washing them over and over.
One other thing:  Due to the construction, our TV reception was intermittently out most of the week.  We could not watch the Parade or football games I had planned.  All in all, it was a VERY disappointing week.

resp.text: Hi Marilyn, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay. We sincerely apologize that you had a disappointing week at the beach. Our goal is to make sure all of our guests have the best vacation possible. So, we take customer service very seriously. We looked in to your reservation and saw that you did come in to our office a few days in to your stay to let us know about the balcony and to see if there were any discounts if you booked with us again next year. Unfortunately, our team was correct and there was nothing they could do about the balcony but we certainly could have done something about the towels and hot pads had we known. Our terms and conditions state that we can not guarantee amenities at the complex because we only manage specific units and not the complex as a whole. We do try to find solutions to these problems when they occur and are very sorry we could not do that for you. Thank you again for your feedback.

name: Eddie Schmidt
text: The condo we rented was very clean, easily accessible to everything and check in and out was easy.  Great beach and facilities and great place for families.  I would highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit Orange Beach!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Eddie! We are so glad you had a great stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: LORI LEO
text: Beware of Liquid Life Vacation Rentals.  We stayed three nights at Caribe Resort 406C.  We rented the unit because it stated that it slept 10 people.  Upon arrival the unit is run down.  The kick plates are missing from the cabinets, the fan in the living room did not work but that is the least of our concerns.  We bought groceries before arriving and put them in the refrigerator only to discover that it did not cool.  We had to put our groceries in a cooler to keep them cold.  Next when we tried to pull out the sleeper sofa it was completely broken.  We called Liquid Life and around midnight they brought us an air mattress and  battery operated pump with no batteries.  We called back and at 1:30 am they brought us the wrong batteries.  So at this point we gave up the first night.  They sent someone the next day but the sofa was never fixed and our guests had to sleep on the floor.  The toilet for one of the bedrooms ran constantly.  The outlets in the master bath did not work.  They sent someone to fix that and on the second try the next day the outlets were repaired.  The microwave was broken and if you did not hold it up the door would fall off the hinge.  Finally,  one of the legs of a dining room chair fell off while a 72 year old man was sitting in it. Keep in mind that someone had to be in the room when some of these issues were trying to be fixed.  We asked Liquid Life to refund a small portion of our money.  Needless to say they would not.  They do not care about you the renter.  Do not rent from them.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We take customer service very seriously, so we took a look at your reservation notes to get to the bottom of the items you mentioned. The reservation was not under your name; however, we believe we know the reservation you are referring to.

On July 6, 2019, at 10:40PM, the after hours service got a call from the guest staying in Caribe 406C that the pull out sofa was broken. At 10:42PM, the after hours service called Liquid Life Maintenance coordinator for guidance. Due to the time of the event, the solution for the situation was to bring an air mattress to the guests so that they could sleep on something for the evening due to it already being late. The after hours service delivered an air mattress to the guests.

We do not show any reports of the guest reporting that the refrigerator was not working properly. A common request we get from guests when they first arrive is that they do not feel like the refrigerator is not cooling. That is because they are loading up an empty refrigerator with a lot of warm groceries. It takes some time to cool down.

The other items in the review mentioned were not turned in by the guests. Our team did not address them, because they did not know about them. The reason we did not refund money was due to the fact that the items that were not reported, we fixed everything in a timely manner. Therefore, the reservation did not qualify for a refund.

name: Dana
text: We have stayed with Phoenix West II for the past 3 years and this is our favorite condo so far. We will definitely try to get this same condo next year. Liquid Life is so easy to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Dana! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at Phoenix West II. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation with Liquid Life! Thank you, the team at Liquid Life Vacation Rentals

text: I would love to put 0 stars but it wouldn’t save my review or they might delete my review.

name: Debra Hall
text: So very pleased with unit A23. Beach not too crowded if you enjoy a little more privacy on the beach, pools are awesome, clean with plenty of lounge chairs and tables, I could not of ask for more. Courtyard is lovely with Palms, Hibiscus, etc. Beautiful decor, clean. Bathroom spacious with shower for 2,  a garden tube,  but did not use. There is a stacked washer,dryer combo, works well. Kitchen is great, pleaty of dishes and silver wear. Also knives, and various kitchen tools for preparing meals. There was a korig, which we didnt expect. We bought a coffee maker at walmart and already had our filters and ground coffee. The Concern is bed could use  a new bedding set, sinks and very noisy.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Debra! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We will be sure to pass along your bedding suggestion to the owner. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Gwen Johnson
text: Great place we go for month every year, this was first time in this condo, nice but carpet is terrible needs replaced , needs paint job and shower had mold all in it. View is beautiful but unless updated would not pick this one next year

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Gwen! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We take feedback from guests very seriously and will be sure to pass these suggestions along to the owner! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Marilyn Richardson
text:
We rented Unit 4023 at Phoenix IV for the Thanksgiving week and we had reserved it at least 9 months in advance.  When we arrived we could see that major construction was going on, yet we were not advised of this, nor were we given an opportunity to switch buildings.  They came on the second day and draped our balcony in plastic sheeting to where we could not sit and look out at the water.  They also put up a large sheet of plywood blocking off over half of what balcony was left.  There was scaffolding going up and down all days from 9 to 5, with loud talking and banging of equipment.  This severely impacted our stay, and when I went to complain to the office they said there was nothing they could do, nor could they give me a discount for the inconvenience when I requested it.
In addition to this, the pool and hot tub in the Phoenix IV building was roped off and out of order for most of the week, so we had to go outside and next door to use the very crowded pool at hot tub at Phoenix III.
Unit 4023 itself was nice and very spacious, which was needed for our group of family and cooking the Thanksgiving dinner.  However, the unit slept 10, but there was only one set of towels for 8, and only one dish cloth and dish towel in the kitchen, and NO hot pads at all.  We just kept washing them over and over.
One other thing:  Due to the construction, our TV reception was intermittently out most of the week.  We could not watch the Parade or football games I had planned.  All in all, it was a VERY disappointing week.

resp.text: Hi Marilyn, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay. We sincerely apologize that you had a disappointing week at the beach. Our goal is to make sure all of our guests have the best vacation possible. So, we take customer service very seriously. We looked in to your reservation and saw that you did come in to our office a few days in to your stay to let us know about the balcony and to see if there were any discounts if you booked with us again next year. Unfortunately, our team was correct and there was nothing they could do about the balcony but we certainly could have done something about the towels and hot pads had we known. Our terms and conditions state that we can not guarantee amenities at the complex because we only manage specific units and not the complex as a whole. We do try to find solutions to these problems when they occur and are very sorry we could not do that for you. Thank you again for your feedback.

name: Bethany Grey
text: We just got back from an amazing Vacation in Orange Beach using Liquid Life and it was the best experience we have ever had!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Bethany! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Josh Holley
text: I write this as I sit in Phoenix West II unit 1205 that we rented through Liquid Life.  We are staying here for 11 nights and paid over $4,000.  We came in on Tuesday which was the day Hurricane Gordon was hitting.  We called the office to ask if we could check in early as we had seen on the calendar that no one stayed in the unit Monday night.  The girl I spoke with was not helpful and just kept telling me their policy.  I knew what the policy was, what I was asking for was at least some effort to see if she could check when we would be able to get in.  She would not do it.  I ask to speak with her boss and she said she was out cleaning condos and did not have her number.  I asked to speak to one of the inspectors and she said she didn't have any of their numbers.  She never once offered to go above and beyond other than telling me what the policy was.  I had 3 kids in a car headed towards a tropical storm growing into a Hurricane and just wanted someone to say "let me see what I can do", but that did not happen.  We got the call at 2:45pm that our condo was ready, which we were waiting in the parking garage at the condo as the tropical storm had already began to hit.  Condo was clean and ready and then we noticed the stand alone ice maker was missing, like was not there and was just a blank space.  This is something that we love and use all the time when we stay at Phoenix West II.  I called Liquid Life and they said it was our for maintenance.  I explained that this is something that we use everyday and could they bring a spare one until the other got fixed.  She said they don't have spare ones and her solution was that if the refrigerator ice maker did not keep up, then I could go to the store, buy bagged ice and then bring them the receipt.  Really????  I just paid $4,000 for 11 nights and you want me to leave the condo to go buy bagged ice every time I need to fill the cooler and then bring you the receipt.....  I then called back and got another girl who said she would have maintenance call me the next day.  No one called and we are still here without a separate ice maker.  This is our 7th year to stay at either Phoenix West and/or Phoenix West II and we really enjoyed it.  Things happen and I realize that, but I don't believe stating policy when there is a Hurricane Warning in place and telling someone to go buy bagged ice is the right things to do in these situations.  I am not saying don't rent through Liquid Life, but I did want to share our current situation so you can make an educated decision.  I even mentioned to the front desk here that we were trying to get checked in early due to the approaching storm and when I told them who I rented through they rolled their eyes like there was a history there with Liquid Life and these kind of issues.

resp.text: Josh,  Thanks for writing.  Really glad that you guys made it safely into Orange Beach early in the day.  I am also thankful that you acknowledged that we got you into your condo before 3:00 p.m. as promised in all of the multiple confirmations.   As you might imagine, on the day of your arrival, every member of our team was out on storm prep.    I am very sorry that your calls for an early arrival came in at a time when we were not able to get extra people on the phone with you to discuss an early arrival.  I apologize for the ice maker being out at your arrival.    We hope to serve you at a higher level of excellence as you continue your stay.  The rain and wind creates a million extra things to do.

name: Gerver Gal
text: Awesome company to work with! Our condo was perfect and Liquid Life was helpful for everything we needed.  I would highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you, Julie! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Kathy St. Lawrence
text: The condo was exactly as advertised! The view was stunning!  There were many restaurants and shopping areas within walking distance!  Would highly recommend this unit.  We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Kathy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the Gulf Coast! Thank you, the team at Liquid Life Vacation Rentals

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Tim! We are glad we could help you have a memorable vacation, and we look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

text: Liquid Life was awesome at responding to the few minor issues we had. They were quick and also communicated with us to make sure things were ok. Condo was clean and check in and check out was easy. Would definitely use them again.

name: Josephine Trasker
text: We stayed in Crystal Shores West and had such a wonderful time, easy check in and check out. We will be back for sure!!

resp.text: Thank you for review, Josephine! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Kayla
text: Disappointing! I think giving a 3 rating is being kind and only because I enjoyed being at the beach. To start when we arrived the code that was given to us to get into the condo was incorrect, we called and they had to reset it so we had to wait outside of our room for 10 mins, wouldn’t have been that big of a deal if we had not already unpacked our vehicle and had our belongings sitting outside the door so we couldn't just go ride around or explore the facility while we waited. Secondly as soon as we walked in we noticed the sand all over the floors, now I understand that we are at the beach but I expect to walk into a clean condo when I first arrive. There was also sand on the counters and on the comforters on each bed, dried food on the floor, and hair in the shower, tubs, and dryer so I do not feel this place was cleaned well/if at all! Granted they did offer to send someone to come clean it again but one if they did that poorly the first time what good is that going to do it is not like they were rushed because there was no one renting the place the entire day prior and secondly we already had all of our belongings unpacked by the time I received a call back the next day. There are a few other things such as not having a WiFi password in the room and having to text back and forth several time to get it, Being told twice it was open, not the case it was locked and required password, the large roach that came out from under the kitchen counter, oil on utensils, plus other disappointing factors. This is not a knock towards SeaChase whatsoever, we have stayed there before and room was great, the facility is wonderful itself! I think had our room been cleaned this would have been a 5 star or very close!

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way, Kayla! The reason you had issues with your code upon arrival was due to it being entered incorrectly, but we are glad we were able to help reset and get you guys in your condo. We apologize for the issues with cleanliness in your condo, but there is not much we could do to resolve the issues without being allowed to send some team members back out to your condo. We hope that despite this that you were able to enjoy your stay with Liquid Life!

name: Paula Ashton
text: We stayed with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals at the Phoenix Gulf Shores #1604 and couldn't be happier! The condo was absolutely beautiful...beds were super comfy, rooms were very spacious and the pools were fabulous! Everything we needed to make a memorable family vacation. Thank you Liquid Life.... We will be back next year!

resp.text: Hi Paula! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: magnolia stevens
text: The condo was cleaned to perfection. Had a great stay and will be back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Magnolia! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Nicole Parrott -Jamrose
text: We rented a unit #1014 at The Lighthouse through Liquid Life Vacation Rentals from 3/24/18-3/31/18. We’ve stayed at this facility in different units previous years and have had no issues. This year was quite different than in past years. The unit was clean and looked to have been somewhat updated in recent months. Unfortunately, the beds were extremely uncomfortable and it made the entire week there somewhat disappointing. Neither my husband nor I are picky with mattresses, but the mattresses provided to us were TERRIBLE!  None of us were able to get any rest at night due to the thin mattresses with lumps and springs poking into our backs. When I reached out to customer service we were told that they would send someone from their Quality Assurance department over to inspect them that day. No one ever came to look at them and when I contacted customer service again I was told that they were waiting for the owner of the unit to approve mattress replacements. That was on Tuesday and we never heard back from anyone with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals. I made three separate attempts to get the issue resolved and they didn’t give the common courtesy to rectify the problem. This was by far the worst customer service we’ve ever experienced while  vacationing in Gulf Shores. My suggestion is to try either Meyer or Kaiser vacation Rentals. We’ve used both in the past and had to request service once with each and they both addresses our concerns immediately. I will update the review when or if Liquid Life decides to acknowledge the problems we experienced.

text: Lighthouse Unit 410 in Gulf Shores was perfect. Easy booking, check in, and check out. Condo was clean and stocked with expected amenities. Beautiful gulf views from the balcony, great location within walking distance of Gulf State Park.

name: Randy Fenrick
text: We stayed in the Phoenix V 812 condo. I'd like to give it 4.5 stars.  We have stayed in various other condos in the Phoenix V complex as well as others in OB, and this particular condo was clean, nicely decorated and priced accordingly.  The furniture was clean and seemed new. The overall amenities were nice(TV, washer/dryer, dishwasher etc). We have been traveling to Orange Beach for 13 of the past 14 years and we really enjoy staying at the Phoenix V. This is the first stay with Liquid Life Rentals, and, I would look to stay at this or another Liquid Life rental in the future. The check in was a breeze and the people working the desk were focused on us.  There were a few improvements that could enhance the stay.  The internet connectivity was sketchy, the main door seal was not very secure so when the wind blew(and it blows constantly) there was a whistling that could be heard in the back two bedrooms and the third bedroom did not have a television at the time of our stay. These are minor issues in my view.  So, if those are the worse things to happen to us on our vacation, we consider ourselves lucky.  * * * * 1/2

resp.text: Hi Randy! Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your condo and staying with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you plan another vacation in the future! -Madison

text: They made our stay very easy. The check in and out process is simple. The condos are maintained very well. Will definitely book with them again! Very nice people ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Heather! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Dan Barton
text:
We stayed at Wind Drift #208. The location of the unit was good and the owners of the unit were thoughtful enough to leave innertubes, boogie boards, chairs etc.. in the closet outside of the unit for guests to use.

The unit itself was decorated nicely. During our visit there were a few minor issues. The cable from the wall to the modem was disconnected so had to sort that out. The toilet paper holder in the master bath was falling off the wall. It was obvious that the housekeeper(s) do not take a great deal of pride in what their work (spatulas, slotted spoons, can openers etc were disorganized in drawers. the AC return was very dirty, glass door on patio had fingerprints on it, hair on the bathroom wall etc...).

The parking at the unit can be a challenge if you are not in by 8 or 9 PM. There are a very limited number of spots for the number of units in the building and if the lot is full, you will have to park across the street. Not a big deal since you can drop your bags and groceries off right at the entrance to the complex and then park and walk across the street. Just be careful crossing the road particularly on a Fri or Sat night as it can be very busy.

resp.text: Dan, we are glad you had a great vacation, but thank you for your feedback on the condition of your unit. We take these reviews very seriously and will be addressing these issues immediately with our Housekeeping team. We hope that you will give Liquid Life another chance to book your vacation in the future!

We stayed at the seachase in room #1105C in july,2019 at Orange Beach..This condo was well decorated and supplied with everything you would need to use to cook with.My family loved the place and being on the 11th floor gave you the best views.The only compliant I had was the balcony floor tiles near the rail need to be sealed back..they move around. And there was a small wall tile in the master bath that needs to be replaced. This place was awesome and we would stay here again.

BW
